text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: Gannaaw nag dee nanu ak Kirist , gëm nanu ne , dinanu dekki it ni moom ,

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: xam ne Kirist mi dekki dootul dee mukk , dee mënatul dara ci moom .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: Dee na benn yoon , ba bàkkaar mënul ci moom dara ; te mi ngi dund léegi , di ànd ak Yàlla ba fàww .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ci noonu nag yéen itam tegleen seen bopp ni ñu dee ak Kirist , ba rëcc ci dooley bàkkaar , di dund , ànd ak Yàlla ba fàww ndax seen bokk ci Yeesu Kirist .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Buleen mayati bàkkaar nag , mu yilif seeni yaram yu néew doole , bay topp ay bëgg - bëggam .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Te buleen jébbalati seeni cér bàkkaar , mu def leen jumtukaayam ngir jëfam yu jubadi ; waaye gannaaw rëcc ngeen ci dooley dee , bay dundaat , jébbaluleen ci Yàlla te jébbal ko seeni cér , mu def leen jumtukaayam ngir jëfam yu jub .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Ndaxte bàkkaar dootu leen manal dara , yéen ñi génn ci yoonu Musaa , dugg ci yiwu Yàlla .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: Lan lanu war a wax nag léegi ? Gannaaw génn nanu ci yoonu Musaa , dugg ci yiwu Yàlla , ndax danoo war a sax ci def bàkkaar ? Mukk !

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: Ndax dangeen a xamul ne , koo jébbalu ci moom te déggal ko , jaamam nga ? Naka noonu , mbaa ngeen nekk jaami bàkkaar , mu jëme leen ci dee , mbaa ngeen déggal Yàlla , mu sóob leen ci yoonu njub .

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Waaye sant naa Yàlla ci lii : yéen ñi doon jaami bàkkaar , bi ngeen déggee mboolem dëgg gi , nangu ngeen ko ak seen xol bépp .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Te ci noonu rëcc ngeen ci nootaangeg bàkkaar te jébbalu ci Yàlla , sóobu ci njub .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Xam naa ne , seen xam - xam ci mbir mii sorewul , moo tax ma yombal wax ji , awale ko ci baat yii . Ni ngeen jële woon seeni cér , jébbal leen , ñu nekk jaami lu selladi ak lu bon , di gën a jur lu bon , noonu itam léegi jébbal - leen seeni cér , ñu nekk jaami njub , ngeen door a sell .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Ndaxte keroog ba ngeen nekkee jaami bàkkaar , séquleen woon dara ak lu jub .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: Ban njariñ ngeen ci jële nag ? Dara lu dul gàcce , ndaxte ci dee la leen doon jëmale .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Waaye léegi Yàlla goreel na leen ci kilifteefu bàkkaar , def leen ay jaamam , ba jural leen sell , jëme leen ci dund gu dul jeex .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ndaxte peyu bàkkaar mooy dee , waaye mayu Yàlla mooy dund gu dul jeex ci Yeesu Kirist sunu Boroom .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Bokk yi , yéen ñi may waxal xam ngeen luy yoon ; xam ngeen kon ne , yoon am na doole ci nit diirub dundam .

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Ci maanaa , mi ngi mel ni jigéen juy séy ; yoon a ngi koy boole ak jëkkëram , ñu ànd seen giiru dund , waaye su jëkkër ji faatoo , buum gi dagg na .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Kon nag su jabar ji àndee ak beneen góor , te fekk jëkkër jiy dund , dees na ko àtte njaaloo . Waaye bu jëkkër ji faatoo , yoon jeexal na seen diggante ; man na séy nag ak beneen góor , te loolu du njaaloo .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Nii laa leen ko man a misaale , samay bokk ; bi Kirist deeyee , dangeen a deeyandoo ak moom , te noonu yoonu Musaa wàcc leen . Léegi nag yéena ngi ànd ak keneen , maanaam Kirist mi dekki , ngir nu amal Yàlla njariñ .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Keroog ba nu daan topp sunu nafsu , yoonu Musaa daan na xamb bëgg - bëgg yu bon , yiy yengal sunuy cér , ba jural nu dee .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Waaye léegi yoon wi wàcc na nu , ci li nu dee , ba rëcc cig buumam . Léegi nag nu ngi jaamu Yàlla , waxumaleen ci sàmm santaane rekk , ndax loolu wees na , waaye ci kàttan gu bees , gi nu Xelum Yàlla di may .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Kon nag lu nu war a wax ? Ndax bàkkaar ci yoonu Musaa la jóge ? Mukk ! Waaye moo ma xamal luy bàkkaar . Ndaxte su ma yoon wi waxul woon : « Bul bëgg yëfi jaambur , » kon duma xam luy xemmem .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Waaye bàkkaar jaare na ci ndigalu Yàlla , daldi ñëw dugg ci man , ba yengal ci man xemmem yu bare . Ndaxte ba ma xamagul woon yoonu Musaa , bàkkaar da ne woon nemm ci man .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Te keroog bi ma xamagul lu yoon wi santaane , maa ngi doon dund dund gu neex ; waaye ba ma ko déggee , bàkkaar dafa daldi fuddu ci man , te man ma daldi dee .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: Noonu gis naa ne , ndigal loolu waroon a jëme nit ñi ci dund , daf maa jëme ci dee .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Ndaxte bàkkaar jaar na ci li Yàlla digle , ba nax ma , rey ma .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Kon nag man nanoo wax ne , yoonu Musaa yoon wu sell la , te ndigalu Yàlla dafa sell , jub te baax .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Ndax kon lu baax moo ma tàbbal ci dee ? Mukk ! Bàkkaar a ko def , ngir jikkoom feeñ ; dafa gis ci lu baax loolu bunt bu mu man a jaar , ba rey ma . Noonu ndigalu Yàlla tax na , bàkkaar fés , bon ba jéggi dayo .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Xam nanu ne , yoonu Musaa ngi jóge ci Yàlla , waaye man yëfi àddina laa fonk , te nekk ci dooley bàkkaar , mel nib jaam .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Ndaxte samay jëf jaaxal na ma ; li ma bëgg a def , duma ko def , waaye li ma bañ rekk , moom laay def .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Kon nag gannaaw li may def du sama coobare , nangu naa ne yoonu Musaa baax na .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Léegi nag du man maay def lu bon loolu , waaye bàkkaar bi dëkk ci man , moo ma ciy jiiñ .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Ndaxte xam naa ne , lu baax dëkkul ci man , maanaam ci sama bindu doom Aadama . Am naa yéeney def lu baax , waaye awma kàttanu yeggale .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Lu baax nag lu may yéene , duma ko def , waaye lu bon lu ma bëggul , moom laay def .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Bu fekkee nag lu ma bëggul , moom laay def , kon dootul sama coobare , waaye bàkkaar bi dëkk ci man , moo ma ci jiiñ .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Gis naa nag lii : saa su ma bëggee def lu baax , lu bon a ngi ma taxawu .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Ndaxte ci sama biir xol yoonu Yàlla wi neex na ma .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Waaye gis naa jeneen doole juy yengu ci samay céri yaram , di bëre ak li sama xol bëgg ; day bëre ba noot ma , def ma jaam ci dooley bàkkaar joojuy yengu ci samay cér .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: Céy maaka torox ! Ana ku may musal ci sama yaram , wii may jëme ci dee ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Maa ngi sant Yàlla ; am na kuy musle , mooy Yeesu Kirist sunu Boroom . Kon nag lii laa gis ci sama bopp : ci sama xel maa ngi topp yoonu Yàlla , waaye ci sama bindu doom Aadama maa ngi topp yoonu bàkkaar .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Léegi nag yoon mënul a dab ñi bokk ci Yeesu Kirist .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Ndaxte kàttanu Xelum Yàlla , tukkee ci Kirist Yeesu , di may nit dund gu bees , goreel na ma ci nootaangeg bàkkaar ak dee .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Lu yoonu Musaa mënul woon a def , ndax néew dooley nit , Yàlla defe na ko nii : dafa yónni Doomam , ngir mu yor sunu jëmm , nun ñiy nekk ay bàkkaarkat , te mu jébbale bakkanam , ngir dindi bàkkaar yi . Noonu la Yàlla tase nguuru bàkkaar ci nit .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Ba tax na léegi njub , gi yoonu Musaa di digle , am na ci nun , ñiy déggal Xelu Yàlla mi te bañ a topp sunu nafsu .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Ñiy topp seen nafsu , seeni bëgg - bëgg rekk lañu fonk , waaye ñiy topp Xelu Yàlla mi , coobareem lañu fonk .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Ndaxte fonk nafsu , ci dee lay jëme ; waaye fonk Xelu Yàlla mi , dund ak jàmm lay joxe .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Ndaxte ku fonk sa nafsu , bañaaleb Yàlla nga , ndaxte doo déggal Yàlla , mbaa ngay sàmm ay santaaneem , te mënuloo koo def sax .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Kuy topp sa nafsu nag , doo man a neex Yàlla .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Waaye yéen nekkatuleen ci topp seen nafsu , waaye yéena ngi topp Xelu Yàlla mi , bu fekkee ne mu ngi dëkk ci yéen . Ku amul Xelum Kirist nag , bokkuloo ci moom .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Bu fekkee ne Kirist dëkk na ci yéen nag , lii moo am : seen yaram mi ngi ci dooley dee ndax bàkkaar bi nekk ci yéen , waaye seen xel mi ngi dund ndax njub gi leen Yàlla jox .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Kon nag gannaaw Xelum Yàlla , mi dekkal Yeesu ca néew ya , dëkk na ci yéen , dina tax seen yaram wi néew doole dund ci kàttanu Xel moomu dëkk ci yéen .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Kon bokk yi , am nanu lu nu war , waaye waxumaleen topp sunu nafsu ak i bëgg - bëggam ;

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: ndaxte kuy topp nafsoom , fàww mu dee , waaye kuy noot jëfi yaramam ci dooley Xelu Yàlla mi , dina dund .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Ndaxte ñépp ñiy déggal Xelu Yàlla mi , ay doomi Yàlla lañu .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Kon nekkatuleen fa kanam Yàlla , ni jaam bu ragal sangam , waaye Xel mi leen Yàlla sol , ay doomi Yàlla la leen def , ba tax nu di wooye Yàlla : « Abba , » maanaam « Baay bi . »

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Ndaxte Xelu Yàlla mi , moom ci boppam , day ànd ak sunu xel ci seede ne , doomi Yàlla lanu .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Te gannaaw ay doomi Yàlla lanu , dinanu moomi lépp li Yàlla jagleel ay doomam , séddu ci ngëneel yi Kirist yelloo . Waaye nag ku bëgg a bokk ak Kirist ndamam ëllëg , war ngaa séddu ci ay fitnaam tey .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Xalaat naa ne sunu naqaru tey , wareesu ko tëkkale ak sunu ndamu ëllëg .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Ndax li Yàlla bind lépp a ngi ne seew a gis doomi Yàlla yi feeñ ci seen biir ndam .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Ndaxte dunyaa bi bépp mu ngi ci yoon wu dul mujj fenn ; teyu ko , Yàlla moo ko ko teg . Waaye teewul ñu am yaakaar ne ,

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: Yàlla dina rengi seen buumi njaam ci dee , boole leen ci jàmmu doomi Yàlla yi ak seen ndam .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Xam nanu ba fi nu tollu ne , li Yàlla bind lépp a ngi metitlu ni jigéen juy matu .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Te du dunyaa bi rekk mooy metitlu , nun it nu ngi metitlu , nun ñi Yàlla sol Xelam , ngir nu ñam añu ëllëg ; nu ngi ne seew Yàlla boole nu ci lépp li nu yelloo ni ay doomam , keroog bés bu Yàllay goreel sunu yaram .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Ndaxte sunu mucc ëmb na yaakaar . Li nga gis ba noppi , nekkatul yaakaar ; li teew , noo koy yaakaare ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Li feek gisagunu nag li nuy yaakaar , dinanu ko séentu ak muñ .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Te it Xelu Yàlla mi moo nuy xettali ci sunug néew doole . Ndaxte xamunu sax naka lanu war a ñaane Yàlla , waaye Xelu Yàlla maa ngi nuy ñaanal fa moom ak i yéene yu làmmiñ mënta takk .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Te Yàlla , miy nattu xol yi , xam na xalaatu Xel mi , ndaxte tinu , gi muy tinul gaayi Yàlla yi , mengoo na ak coobareg Yàlla .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Xam nanu itam ne ñi bëgg Yàlla , maanaam ñi Yàlla woo ci boppam te boole leen ci li mu tëral , Yàlla dina joo loxoom ci lépp lu xew ci seen dund , ngir jural leen lu baax .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Ndaxte ñi mu xamoon lu jiitu , dafa dogaloon ñu nirook Doomam , ngir mu nekk taaw ci biir njaboot gu yaa .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Te ñi mu dogaloon loolu ci ñoom , da leen a woo ; te ñooñu mu woo , da leen a àtte ni ñu jub ; te ñooñu mu àtte jub , da leen a boole ca ndamam .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: Lu nu war a wax nag ci loolu lépp ? Gannaaw Yàlla ànd na ak nun , kan moo nu manal dara ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Yàlla mi nu gàntulul Doomam waaye mu joxe ko , mu dee ngir nun , ndax dina nu bañalati dara ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Ñi Yàlla tànnal boppam , kan moo leen di tuumaal ? Yàlla moo leen àtte ni ñu jub .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Kan moo leen man a teg tooñ ? Yeesu Kirist mi dee , moo dekki itam , te mu nga fa ndeyjoorul Yàlla , di nu fa ñaanal !

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Kan moo nu man a tàggaleek mbëggeelu Kirist ? Xanaa duy nattu , te du njàqare , du it fitna , du xiif walla rafle , du it ay ngaañ walla jaasi sax .

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Moo tax Mbind mi ne : « Ñu ngi nuy rey ngir yaw , ci suba ba jant so ; ñu ngi nuy jàppe ni xar yu ñuy rey . »

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Waaye loolu lépp teewul , nu ngi mel niy ñeyi xare ci dooley Kirist mi nu bëgg .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Ndax wóor na ma ne , dara mënu noo tàggaleek mbëggeelam ; du dee , du dund , du malaaka yi , du seeni kilifa , du tey , du ëllëg , du boroom doole yi ,

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: du li ci kaw mbaa li ci suuf , mbaa leneen lu ñu bind ; dara mënu noo tàggale mukk ak mbëggeel , gi nu Yàlla jox ci Kirist Yeesu sunu Boroom .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Li ma bëgg a wax nag , ci kanamu Kirist laa koy waxe ; dëgg la , du aw fen . Sama xel , mi Xel mu Sell miy leeral , seedeel na ma ne , dëgg laay wax .

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Maanaam , duma noppee am naqar wu réy ci sama biir xol ,

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: ba xaw a bëgg a tàggoo ak Kirist te alku , ngir ñi ma bokkal xeet mucc .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Bànni Israyil lañu , te Yàlla def na leen ni ay doomam ; dëkkaloon na ndamam ci seen biir , fas ak ñoom kóllëre yi . Ñoom la Yàlla dénk yoonu Musaa , ñoom la xamal ni ñu ko war a jaamoo , ñoom la jox i digam .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Maam ya Yàlla tànnoon , ci ñoom lañu bokk , te ci ñoom it la Kirist wàcce , maanaam ci jëmmam , Kirist mi di Yàlla , tiim lépp , te yelloo teraanga ba fàww . Amiin .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Waaye neewuma waxu Yàlla dafa toxu , ndaxte bokk ci bànni Israyil , taxul nga bokk ci Israyil tigi .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Te it du ñi soqikoo ci Ibraayma ñépp , ay doomam dëgg lañu . Ndaxte Yàlla dafa wax Ibraayma ne ko : « Saw askan ci Isaaxa lay jaar . »

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Maanaam , soqikoo ci Ibraayma taxul a nekk doomu Yàlla , waaye juddu ci biir digeb Yàlla mooy tax a bokk dëgg - dëgg ci askanu Ibraayma .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla dafa digoon Ibraayma naan : « Ci waxtu wii déwén dinaa dellusi ci yaw , te Saarata dina am doom ju góor . »

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Te du ci loolu rekk , waaye noonu la it ci lu jëm ci Rebeka ; doom yi mu jur ñoo bokk benn baay , moo di sunu maam Isaaxa .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Waaye Yàlla wax ko ne : « Yanqóoba rakk ji mooy yilif magam Esawu , » fekk xale ya juddooguñu te defaguñu dara , muy lu baax , muy lu bon . Yàlla def na noonu , maanaam tànn kenn ci doom yi , ngir dogalam man a taxaw , te sukkandikuwul ci seeni jëf waaye ci wooteb Yàlla .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Loolu la Mbind mi wax ne : « Bëgg naa Yanqóoba , bañ naa Esawu . »

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Kon lu nu ci war a wax ? Ndax Yàlla àttewul foofu yoon nag ? Mukk !

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Dafa wax Musaa sax ne ko : « Dinaa yërëm ku ma neex , laabiir ci ku ma neex . »

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Dama leen di wax nag , dara ajuwul ci coobareg nit , mbaa ci ñaqam , waaye lépp a ngi aju ci yërmandey Yàlla .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Ndax Mbind mi biral na li Yàlla wax Firawna ne ko : « Def naa la buur , ngir feeñal sama kàttan ci say mbir , te ngir siiwal sama tur ci àddina si sépp . »

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Kon nag Yàlla , la ko neex lay def , muy yërëm nit , mbaa dëgëral xolam ci lu bon .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Waaye xanaa dina am ku may wax ne : « Gannaaw kenn mënul a bañ coobareg Yàlla , lu tax kon muy teg nit tooñ ? »

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Yaw nag nit ki , ak koo man a doon , lu tax ngay werante ak Yàlla ? Ndax mbindeef dina laaj ki ko bind : « Lu tax nga binde ma nii ? »

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: Ndax tabaxkatu ndaa sañul a fab banam , tabax ci ñaari ndaa , benn bi ngir soxla yu am maana , bi ci des ngir soxla yu ndaw ?

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Kon nag looy wax ci lii : Yàlla bëggoon na wone meram , xamle it dooleem ci àddina ; teewul dafa sax ci muñal ñi yelloo meram te taxaw ci sànku .

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Bëggoon na it xamle màggaayam mu ëpp xel , ci boole ñi mu yërëm ci ndamam ; moo tax mu tànn leen ca njàlbéen .

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Te wax ji noo ko moom , nun ñi Yàlla woo ci boppam ci biir Yawut yi ak ci biir xeet yi ci des .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Moom la wax ci téereb Ose ne : « Ñi nekkul woon sama xeetdinaa leen ko def , ñi bokkul woon ci sama mbëggeel , dinaa leen ci boole . »

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: Te : « Fa ñu leen waxe woon : “ Dungeen sama xeet , ” dees na leen fa wooye “ Doomi Yàlla Boroom dund . ” »

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Esayi wax na ci mbirum Israyil ne : « Lu bànni Israyil baree - bare ni suufus géej sax , lu néew rekk a ciy mucc .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Ndaxte li Boroom bi dogal ci àddina , dina ko gaaw a def , te dina mat sëkk . »

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Esayi it waxoon na lu jiitu loolu ne : « Yàlla Boroom kàttan gi , su bàyyiwul woon ci nun lu néew , kon ba tey raat nanu ni dëkki Sodom ak Gomor . »

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Lu nu ci war a wax nag ? Ñi dul Yawut te fonkuñu woon jub ci kanam Yàlla , léegi jub nañu ci kaw ngëm .

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Waaye bànni Israyil , mi bëggoon a sàmm yoon ngir jub , matalu ko .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: Ndax lan ? Ndax dañoo sukkandiku ci seeni jëf , bàyyi ngëm . Dañoo daanu ci « doj wuy fakkatale . »

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Moom la Yàlla wax ci Mbind mi ne : « Dinaa samp ci Siyon doj wuy fakkatale , di xeer wuy daaneel nit ; waaye ku wéeru ci moom , sa yaakaar du tas . »

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Bokk yi , sama coobareg xol ci bànni Israyil ak sama ñaan ci Yàlla , mooy ñu mucc .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: Seedeel naa leen ne , ñu farlu lañu ci jaamu Yàlla , waaye seen njaamu àndul ak xam - xam .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Xamuñu yoon , wi Yàlla tëral ngir nit jub ci kanamam , waaye dañoo wéy ci seen pexey bopp ; ba tax ñu bañ a nangu yoonu njub woowu Yàlla tëral .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Ndaxte ci Kirist la yoonu Musaa dëppe , ba tax ku ko gëm , dinga jub fa kanam Yàlla .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Ku bëgg a jub ci kanam Yàlla ci kaw sàmm yoon , Musaa daf cee wax ne : « Ku ko manoon a matal , dinga dund ba fàww . »

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: Waaye ku jub ci kanam Yàlla ci kaw ngëm , nii lay waxe : « Bul wax ci sa xol ne : “ Kuy yéeg ci kaw ? ” » mel ni dangaa bëgg Kirist wàcc .

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: « Bul wax it : “ Kuy dem ca barsàq ? ” » mel ni dangaa bëgg Kirist dekki .

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: Kon boog lan lay wax ? Lii : « Waxu Yàlla mi ngi ci sa wet , ci sa làmmiñ , ci sa xol . » Te wax jooju lal ngëm lanuy waare .

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Ndaxte soo waxee ak sa gémmiñ ne , Yeesu mooy Boroom bi , te nga gëm ci sa xol ne , Yàlla dekkal na ko , dinga mucc .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Ndax xol la nit di gëme , ba tax mu jub ci kanam Yàlla ; làmmiñ it la nit di waxe ne , mi ngi ci Kirist , ba tax Yàlla musal ko .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Mbind mi dafa wax ne : « Képp ku ko gëm , sa yaakaar du tas mukk . »

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Ndax ñépp a yem ci kanam Yàlla , muy Yawut mbaa ku dul Yawut , ndax kenn rekk mooy sunu Boroom nun ñépp , te ku yéwén la ci képp ku koy ñaan .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Ndaxte bind nañu : « Képp ku woo Boroom bi ciw turam , dinga mucc . »

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Waaye nan lañuy wooye ki ñu gëmagul ? Te naka lañu man a gëme ki ñu déggagul turam ? Te naka lañu man a dégge turam , te kenn xamalu leen ko ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Te it nan lañu man a waaree , su leen kenn yónniwul ? Looloo tax Mbind mi wax ne : « Ñiy yégle xebaar bu baax bi , ni seen ñëw di sedde xol ! »

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: Waaye ñépp nanguwuñu xebaar bu baax bi ; moom la Esayi wax ne : « Boroom bi , ana ku gëm sunu waare ? »

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Kon boog ngëm ci kaw dégg lay juddoo , te dégg sosoo ci xebaaru Kirist .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: Waaye ma ne : xanaa ñépp dañoo déggul ? Aaŋkay ! Mbind mi wax na ne : « Seen baat jolli na ci ñeenti xebla yépp , seen wax wër na àddina sépp . »

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Waaye ma teg ci ne : xanaa bànni Israyil dañoo xamul ? Aaŋkay ! Musaa dafa jëkkoon a wax ne : « Dinaa leen siisloo xeet wu bokkul ci Yàlla , merloo leen ci ñi xamul dara ci Yàlla . »

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Te Esayi takk na fitam , ba wax ne : « Ñi ma wutul woon , gis nañu ma , feeñ naa ci ñi ma laajul woon . »

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: Waaye ci mbirum Israyil dafa wax ne : « Tàllal naa samay loxo , suba ba ngoon , ci xeet wu may bañ tey werante . »

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Ma ne kon , ndax Yàlla bërgël na xeetam ? Mukk ! Ndaxte man itam ci Israyil laa bokk , wàcce ci Ibraayma te bokk ci giiru Ben - yamin .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Yàlla bërgëlul xeetam , wi mu xamoon lu jiitu . Ndax dangeen a xamul li Mbind mi di wax ci mbirum Iliyas ? Dafa doon tawat Israyil ci Yàlla naan :

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: « Boroom bi , rey nañu say yonent , daaneel say bérab yu sell , ba man kenn maa ci des , te ñu ngi may wut a rey . »

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Waaye lii la ko Yàlla tontu : « Dencal naa sama bopp juróom - ñaari junniy nit , ñi jaamuwul Baal . »

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Noonu itam ci jamono ji nu nekk , des na nit ñu néew ñu Yàlla dencal boppam ciw yiwam .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Gannaaw nag yiwu Yàlla rekk a tax mu denc leen , kon du seen peyug ñaq , walla boog yiwu Yàlla dootul yiw .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: Kon lu nu ci war a wax ? Li bànni Israyil doon wut , gisuñu ko . Waaye ñi Yàlla tànn rekk a ko gis , te ña ca des bañ a gëm , ba seen xol dërkiis .

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Looloo tax Mbind mi ne : « Yàlla daf leen a jox xelum nit ku gëmmeentu , bët yu gëlëm ak nopp yu tëx , ba ci bésub tey . »

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Te Daawuda it daf ci wax naan : « Na seeni ñam sax nekk fiir ak i pakk ; nañu ci daanu , te Yàlla mbugal leen .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Nañu gumba ba ne fatuus , nañu tiis te sëgg ba fàww . »

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Ndax kon dañoo tarxiis , daanu ba fàww ? Mukk ! Waaye jéllub Israyil dafa ubbi bunt , ngir xeeti ñi dul Yawut man a mucc , te bànni Israyil siis leen .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Gannaaw seen tooñ nag moo ubbi buntu yiw ci waa àddina si , te seen ñàkk moo meññ barkeb xeet yépp , céy bés bu Israyil gépp delloo ci Yàlla , ndaw barke bu bare !

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Yéen ñi dul Yawut , yéen laay waxal . Ndegam Yàlla daf maa def ndawam , yónni ma ci yéen xeeti àddina si , damay matal samab yónnent .

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: Dama koy def , ngir ñi bokk ak man xeet siis , ba ñenn ñi mucc .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: Ndaxte bi Yàlla génnee Israyil , ubbee na noonu bunt , ngir xeeti àddina juboo ak moom ; kon su Yàlla dugalaatee Israyil , ndax du mel ni ndekkitel néew ya ?

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Damay wax ne , mburu mépp sell na , bu ci Yàlla amee wàll . Naka noonu garab gi Yàlla séddoo reen bi , garab gépp sell na .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Bànni Israyil a ngi mel ni garabu oliw gu ñu jëmbët ci kër gi , waaye mu am car yu ci fàq . Yaw mi dul Yawut , yaa ngi mel ni caru garabu oliw gu àll bu ñu jabtal ci garabu kër googu . Noonu nga jariñoo meen , mi jóge ci reen bi .

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: Kon nag bul bàkku , di xeeb car yooyu Yàlla fàq . Waaye soo bëggee bàkku , xamal ne , reen moo lay yenu , te du yaw miy car yaa koy yenu .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Xanaa dinga wax ne : « Car yooyu dañu leen a fàq , ngir jabtal ma fa ñu nekkoon . »

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Dëgg la ; waaye seen ngëmadee tax ñu fàq leen , wuutal la fa ndax sa ngëm . Bumu tax nag ngay bàkku , waaye nanga moytu .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Gannaaw Yàlla baalul car ya cosaanoo ca garab ga , kon boog yéen itam man na leen a fàq .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Loolu kon wone na ni Yàlla baaxe ak ni muy meree tooñ . Ci ñi daanu , Yàlla wone na ni meram tànge , wone mbaaxam ci yéen , su fekkee yéena ngi ci wéy ; lu ko moy , dees na leen fàq yéen itam .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Te car yooyu fàq , su ñu wéyul ci seen ngëmadi , dees na leen delloo ci garab gi , ndax Yàlla man na leen cee tafaat .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Yaw mi dul Yawut , yaa ngi bokkoon ci garabu oliw gu àll , waaye Yàlla daf la cee jële , ci lu dul faral a am , jabtal la ci garabu kër gi . Kon man nanoo gën a wóor ne , Yawut ya judduwaale nekk ci garabu oliw gu kër gi , Yàlla dina leen ci delloo .

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Bokk yi , dama leen a bëgg a dindi kumpa ci lii , ngir ngeen bañ a yég seen bopp . Dërkiisu xol dab na bànni Israyil ab diir , ba bés ba mboolem waa àddina , ñu war a bokk ci nguuru Yàlla , dugg ca .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Bu loolu amee nag , bànni Israyil gépp dina mucc . Moom la Mbind mi tëral , bi mu naan : « Ab xettalikat dina jóge ci Siyon , dàq weddi ci askanu Yanqóoba .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Loolu mooy kóllëre , gi may fas ak ñoom , bés bu may dindi seeni bàkkaar . »

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Gannaaw bañ nañu xebaar bu baax bi , ay bañaaley Yàlla lañu , ngir ngeen jot barkeem . Waaye gannaaw Yàlla tànn na leen , dafa leen bëgg ba tey ndax seen maam ya .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Ndax li Yàlla maye , dootu ko nangu mukk , te ku mu woo ci boppam , dootu la dàq mukk .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Ñu déggadil Yàlla ngeen woon , waaye ngëmadig Yawut yi tax na , ngeen jot yërmandeem .

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Ñoom itam lànk nañu léegi , ngir man a bokk ak yéen yërmandey Yàlla .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Kon Yàlla tëj na ñépp ci ngëmadi , ngir man a yërëm ñépp .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: Xelum Yàlla ni mu xóote , ak xam - xamam ni mu baree , ba raw xelum nit ! Kan moo muus , ba xam dogalam ? Walla nga am xel , ba nànd ay jëfam ?

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: Mbind mi dafa ne : « Ana ku xam xalaatu Boroom bi ? Ku ko doon digal ? »

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: Te it : « Ku ko mas a jox dara , ba mu war laa delloo ? »

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Ndaxte ci moom la lépp sosoo , ci moom la lépp di jaar , ci moom la lépp di dellu . Moo yelloo ndam ba fàww . Amiin .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Kon nag bokk yi , gannaaw yërmandey Yàlla baree na noonu , maa ngi leen di ñaan , ngeen jébbal ko seen yaram wépp . Na seen dund mel ni sarax su ñuy defal Yàlla , sarax su sell te neex ko . Loolu mooy njaamu , gi leen war .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Bu leen àddina jey , waaye yeesluleen ci seen xel , ba soppiku , ngeen man a xam bu wér coobareg Yàlla , di lépp lu baax , neex ko te mat sëkk .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Gannaaw Yàlla may na ma ciw yiwam , ma nekk ndawam , maa ngi leen di wax lii , kenn ku nekk ci yéen : buleen yég seen bopp , waaye ngeen am xalaat yu yem , mengook ngëm gi leen Yàlla sédd , ku nekk ak wàllam .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Loolu , ci maanaa , mi ngi mel ni yaramu nit : yaram , lu cér yi baree - bare , benn niroowul ak moroomam liggéey .

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: Noonu itam nun ñi bokk ci Kirist , lu nu baree - bare , benn lanu te danoo mànkoo .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Kon gannaaw Yàlla séddale na ay mayam , ku nekk ak sa cér , nanu koy jëfandikoo . Ku Yàlla may , ngay waare kàddoom , nga wax ko kem sa ngëm ;

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: kuy topptoo yëfi mbooloo mi , nga takku ci ; ku Yàlla may , ngay jàngale , nekk ci ;

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: kuy feddali ngëmu nit ñi ci Yàlla , nga sax ci ; kuy séddoo alalam ak nit ñi , nga def ko ak xol bu laab ; kuy jiite mbooloo mi , nga sawar ci ; kuy dimbali ñi néew doole , nanga ci bég .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Na seen cofeel di lu dëggu te bañ a nekk ngistal ; araamal - leen lu bon te sax ci lu baax .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Bëgganteleen ak xol bu leer , niy doomi ndey , te farlu ci teralante .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Sawarleen te bañ a tayel , di jaamu Boroom bi ak seen xol bépp .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Bégleen ci yaakaaru ëllëg te muñ bépp tiis , di sax ci ñaan Yàlla .

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: Dimbalileen gaayi Yàlla yi ci seeni soxla , te saxoo dalal gan .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Ku leen fitnaal , ñaanal - leen ko yiw , te bañ koo móolu .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Bégandooleen ak ñi bég , te jooyandoo ak ñiy jooy .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Bokkleen menn xel , tey bañ a yékkatiku , di yóotu daraja , waaye ngeen fonk ñi suufe ; buleen teg seen bopp boroomi xel .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Buleen feyante lu bon , waaye sàkkuleen seede su rafet ci kanam ñépp .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Wutleen a juboo ak ñépp , ba fa seen kàttan yem .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Samay soppe , buleen di feyantoo , waaye bàyyileen lépp ci loxoy Yàlla , mi yelloo àtte ; ndax Yàlla nee na ci Mbind mi : « Man maay àtte , maay fey jëf . »

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Waaye defleen lii : « Bu sa noon xiifee , may ko mu lekk ; bu maree , may ko mu naan . Ndax boo ko defee , dinga ko rusloo . »

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Bu leen lu bon ëpp doole , waaye nootleen ko ci def lu baax .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Gannaaw loolu na nit ku nekk déggal ñi yore baat ci kanamam ; ndaxte amul njiit lu fi Yàlla sampul . Njiit yépp nag Yàlla moo leen fi teg .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Kon ku leen bañ a déggal , ndigalu Yàlla nga lànk , te ku def loolu , yoon dina la dab .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Kuy def lu baax warul a ragal njiit li , kuy def lu bon moo ko war a ragal . Soo ko bëggee bañ a ragal nag , kon defal lu baax , te dina la tagg .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Ndax Yàllaa ko dénk liggéey boobu ngir sa jàmm . Waaye sooy def lu bon , war ngaa ragal , ndax du cig neen la ame jaasiy àtte ; jawriñu Yàlla la ngir wàcce meru Yàlla , ci fey ku def lu bon .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Kon fokk ngeen déggal ko , waxuma sax ndax sañ - sañam boobu , waaye it ngir seen xel dal .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Gannaaw Yàllaa sas njiit yi liggéey boobu , te ñi ngi ci , kon fàww ngeen fey galag .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Joxleen ku nekk céram ; ku ngeen war a fey galag , feyleen ko ko ; ku ngeen war a fey juuti , feyleen ko ko ; ku ngeen war a weg , wegleen ko ; ku ngeen war a teral , teral - leen ko .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Buleen ameel kenn dara , lu dul mbëggeel ; ndax ku bëgg sa moroom , wàccoo nga ak yoonu Musaa .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ndaxte ndigali Yàlla yépp , yi deme ni : « Bul njaaloo , bul rey nit , bul sàcc , bul bëgge , » walla leneen ndigal lu mu man a doon , wax jii moo leen ëmb : « Nanga bëgg sa moroom , ni nga bëgge sa bopp . »

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: Ku bëgg sa moroom , doo ko tooñ ; kon ku wéy ci mbëggeel matal nga yoonu Musaa .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: Te lii itam am na : xam ngeen bu baax jamono ji nu tollu ; jamonoy yeewu jot na , ndax léegi sunu mucc gën na noo jege , ca ba nu dooree gëm .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: Guddi gi màggat na , bët a ngi bëgg a set . Nanu bàyyi nag jëf yu lëndëm te ràngoo gànnaay yi nu Yàlla jox , ngir dund ci leer .

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: Gannaaw nu ngi ci leer , na sunug dund rafet . Bunu naan sangara ba màndi tey bànneexu ; bunu njaaloo tey def i ñaawteef ak sunuy cér ; bunu xuloo mbaa nuy ñeeyante .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: Waaye gànnaayooleen Yeesu Kirist Boroom bi , te bañ a topp seen bakkan ciy bëgg - bëggam yu bon .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Gannaaw loolu ku ngëmam néew nangeen ko nangu , te bañ a werante ak moom ci lu lënt .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Ndax am na ku xalaat ne , man na lekk ñam wu nekk , fekk ku ngëmam néew du lekk yàpp , waaye léjum rekk lay lekk .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Kiy lekk lu nekk , bumu xeeb ki ko dul def . Naka noonu itam ku dul lekk yàpp , bumu teg tooñ ki koy lekk ; ndax Yàlla nangu na leen ñoom ñaar .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: Koo teg sa bopp , ba di ko teg tooñ ? Jaamu jaambur la ! Mu taxaw ci liggéeyam , mbaa mu sàggane ko , moom ak sangam la . Waaye dina jub , ndax Boroom bi am na dooley taxawal ko ci njub .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Noonu itam am na ñiy tànn bés ak ñiy yemale bés yépp . Na ku nekk xam bu wér li muy def , te jàpp ci .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Ndaxte kuy tànn bés , mu ngi koy def ngir màggal Boroom bi . Kiy lekk lu nekk it , mu ngi koy def ngir màggal Boroom bi ; loolu leer na ndax day sant Yàlla . Te it ki bañ a lekk yàpp , mu ngi koy def ngir màggal Boroom bi , di ko sant .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Kenn ci nun dundul ngir boppam , kenn deewul it ngir boppam .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: Danuy dund ngir màggal Boroom bi , dee it ngir màggal ko . Kon nag nuy dund mbaa nu dee , noo ngi ci Boroom bi .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Loolu sax moo waral Kirist dee te dundaat , ngir man a nekk Boroomu ñi dee ak ñiy dund .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Yaw nag lu tax ngay teg sa moroom tooñ ? Lu tax nga koy xeeb ? Xanaa nun ñépp , danu dul dajeji fa kanam Yàlla , ngir mu layoo ak nun ?

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Ndaxte Mbind mi tëral na lii : « Boroom bi nee na : “ Ni mu wóore ne maa ngi dund , ni la wóore ne , ñépp dinañu ma sukkal , te ku nekk seede ne maay Yàlla . ” »

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: Noonu ku nekk ci nun dinga làyyi fa Yàlla ci lépp loo mas a def .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Kon nanu bàyyee tegante tooñ , waaye nu fas yéenee moytu lépp lu nekk fiir guy yóbbe sunu moroom bàkkaar .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Xam naa ne , amul wenn ñam wu sellul , ndax Yeesu Boroom bi xamal na ma loolu . Waaye loo yaakaar ne sellul , ci yaw la sellul .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: Soo dee lekk luy indil sa moroom tiis , génn nga ci mbëggeel . Yaw nag bul réeral sa moroom ci sa ñam , ndax Kirist dee na ngir moom .

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: Bu sa njariñ jur wax ju ñaaw .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ndaxte bokk ci nguuru Yàlla jotewul dara ak lu nuy lekk mbaa lu nuy naan . Nguuru Yàlla mooy jub ci kanam Yàlla , te am mbég ak jàmm ci dooley Xel mu Sell mi .

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: Kiy jaamoo noonu Kirist moo neex Yàlla ak nit ñi .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Kon nag nanu wut luy indi jàmm , tey yékkati ngëmu sunu moroom .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Bu sa ñam yàq jëfu Yàlla . Bépp ñam sell na ci kanam Yàlla . Ci lu wér ! Waaye képp ku lekk luy yàq sa ngëmu moroom , def nga lu bon .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: Liy sa warugar mooy nga bañ a fiir sa moroom ci yàpp mbaa ci biiñ mbaa ci leneen lu mu man a doon .

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: Su fekkee sa ngëm dëgër na , wone ko ci sa diggante ak Yàlla . Kiy nangu , te du ci sikkal boppam , kooku barkeel na .

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: Waaye kuy lekk ñam te am ci xel ñaar , def nga bàkkaar , ndax sa ngëm yemu fa . Ndaxte jëf ju àndul ak ngëm , bàkkaar la .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: Nun ñi dëgër ci sunu ngëm , war nanoo nangu ñi seen ngëm néew te am ci lu ñuy sikki - sàkka , te bañ a yem ci wut sunu bànneex .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: Na ku nekk ci nun di wut lu neex moroomam ngir jariñ ko , ba mu gën a dëgër ci ngëmam .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Ndaxte Kirist musul a wut bànneexu boppam . Loolu la Mbind mi wax ne : « Lor yi ñu la saagaa , ci sama kaw lañu dal . »

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: Ndaxte lépp lu ñu waxoon ci Mbind mi lu jiitu tey , dañu koo tëraloon , ngir nu sàkku ci xam - xam , xam - xam bu nuy may fit ak muñ , ak di feddali sunu yaakaar .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: Kon nag Yàlla miy maye muñ ak fit , na leen may , ngeen déggoo te nekk benn bu yellook li Kirist Yeesu wone .

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ba tax nu bokk benn xalaat ak benn baat ci màggal Yàlla , Baayu Yeesu Kirist sunu Boroom .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Moo tax nangoonteleen , bay màggal Yàlla , ni leen Kirist nangoo .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Lii laay wax : Kirist ñëw na liggéeyal Yawut yi , ngir wone kóllëreg Yàlla ci matal dige , ya mu digoon maam ya .

text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy ; as it is written , For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles , and sing unto thy name .
text2: Ñëw na itam ngir ñi nekkul Yawut man a màggal Yàlla ndax yërmandeem . Moo tax Mbind mi ne : « Dinaa la màggal tey tagg saw tur , ci kanamu xeet yépp . »

text: And again he saith , Rejoice , ye Gentiles , with his people .
text2: Mbind mi nee na it : « Yéen xeeti àddina , ñëwleen bànneexuak xeet wi Yàlla tànnal boppam . »

text: And again , Praise the Lord , all ye Gentiles ; and laud him , all ye people .
text2: Mu dellooti ne : « Santleen Boroom bi , yéen waa àddina , te ñëw màggal ko , yéen xeet yépp . »

text: And again , Esaias saith , There shall be a root of Jesse , and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles ; in him shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Te it Esayi wax na ne : « Am na sëtu Yese buy ñëw , dina yilif xeeti ñi dul Yawut , te ci moom lañuy wékk seen yaakaar . »

text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that ye may abound in hope , through the power of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Kon Yàlla miy maye yaakaar , na def ci seen xol mbég mu réy ak jàmm ju yaa ci seen kaw ngëm , ba ngeen am yaakaar ju mat sëkk ci dooley Xel mu Sell mi .

text: And I myself also am persuaded of you , my brethren , that ye also are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge , able also to admonish one another .
text2: Bokk yi , wóor na ma ne , baax ngeen ba fa mbaax man a yem , fees dell ak xam - xam , ba man a jàngaleente mbiri Yàlla ci seen biir .

text: Nevertheless , brethren , I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort , as putting you in mind , because of the grace that is given to me of God ,
text2: Bu sama kàddu diisee nag ci bataaxal bii , dara taxul lu dul bëgg a yeesal seen xalaat , ndaxte Yàlla ci kaw yiwam daf maa sas ,

text: That I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles , ministering the gospel of God , that the offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable , being sanctified by the Holy Ghost .
text2: ma nekk jawriñu Kirist Yeesu , yebal ma ci àddina ci xeeti ñi dul Yawut . Liggéey bu sell laay def ngir Yàlla , ci xamle xebaaram bu baax bi , ngir xeeti àddina sell ci dooley Xel mu Sell mi , ba neex Yàlla , mel ni sarax su ñu koy jébbal .

text: I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God .
text2: Kon nag maa ngi bànneexu ci Kirist Yeesu ngir liggéey boobu ma Yàlla dénk .

text: For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me , to make the Gentiles obedient , by word and deed ,
text2: Awma fitu wax leneen nag , lu dul li Kirist jëf jaarale ko ci man , ngir xeeti àddina jébbalu ci moom ; jëf na jaarale ci samay wax ak samay jëf ,

text: Through mighty signs and wonders , by the power of the Spirit of God ; so that from Jerusalem , and round about unto Illyricum , I have fully preached the gospel of Christ .
text2: ci ay tegtal ak i kéemaan , sukkandikoo ci dooley Xelu Yàlla mi . Ba fi mu nekk nag yégle naa fu nekk xebaaru Kirist , li dale ci Yerusalem , jaar ci gox yépp , ba àgg diiwaanu Iliri .

text: Yea , so have I strived to preach the gospel , not where Christ was named , lest I should build upon another man ' s foundation :
text2: Sama yéene mooy xamle xebaaru turu Kirist fa mu eggagul , ndax bëggumaa yeggale sas wu keneen daloon .

text: But as it is written , To whom he was not spoken of , they shall see : and they that have not heard shall understand .
text2: Li ma def nag , dëppoo na ak li Mbind mi wax ne : « Ñi yégagul mbiram dinañu ko yég , te ñi ko musul a dégg , xam ko . »

text: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you .
text2: Bëggoon naa ñëw seetsi leen , fekk ay téq - téq ñoo ma téye ba tey .

text: But now having no more place in these parts , and having a great desire these many years to come unto you ;
text2: Waaye nag léegi bey naa sama sas ci gox yii .

text: Whensoever I take my journey into Spain , I will come to you : for I trust to see you in my journey , and to be brought on my way thitherward by you , if first I be somewhat filled with your company .
text2: Bu may dem Espaañ nag , bëgg naa faa jaar , nuyu leen ; ndaxte ay at a ngii maa ngi am yéene ju tar ci ñëw seetsi leen . Bëgg na maa nekk ci seen biir , ngir am bànneexu sotteente ak yéen xalaat ab diir , te it ngeen waajalal ma sama yoonu Espaañ .

text: But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints .
text2: Waaye nag fi mu nekk maa ngi dem nii Yerusalem , ngir dimbaliji gaayi Yàlla yu sell ya fa nekk .

text: For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem .
text2: Ndaxte waa Maseduwan ak waa Akayi ñi gëm , fas nañu yéeney sàkk ci seeni alal , yónnee ko , ngir dimbali ñi néew doole ci gaayi Yàlla yu sell , yi nekk Yerusalem .

text: It hath pleased them verily ; and their debtors they are . For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things , their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things .
text2: Yéene nañu ko , te it ci dëgg - dëgg bor la , bu ñu war a fey . Ndaxte gannaaw ñi gëm ci Yerusalem séddoo nañu ak ñi dul Yawut seen ngëm , kon xeet yooyu itam war nañoo séddoo ak ñoom seen alal .

text: When therefore I have performed this , and have sealed to them this fruit , I will come by you into Spain .
text2: Kon nag waxtu wu ma noppee ci liggéey boobu , teg may gu tedd gii ci loxoy boroom , dinaa dem Espaañ , tey jaar fi yéen .

text: And I am sure that , when I come unto you , I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ .
text2: Te wóor na maa ne , bu ma agsee ci yéen , dinaa indaale barkeb Kirist bu mat sëkk .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , for the Lord Jesus Christ ' s sake , and for the love of the Spirit , that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me ;
text2: Gannaaw loolu bokk yi , maa ngi leen di ñaan ci turu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist ak ci bëggante , gi Xelu Yàlla mi def ci nun , ngeen defal ma lii : àndleen ak man , nu tuur sunu ñaq ci ñaan Yàlla .

text: That I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judaea ; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints ;
text2: Ñaanal - leen ma , ngir ma mucc ci ñi gëmul ci waa Yude ; te it gaayi Yàlla yu sell yu nekk ci Yerusalem nangu ndimbal , li ma leen di yóbbul .

text: That I may come unto you with joy by the will of God , and may with you be refreshed .
text2: Dolli ci , Yàlla may ma , ma ñëw seetsi leen ak xol bu sedd , nu booloo yeeslu fa kanam Yàlla .

text: Now the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Na Yàlla Boroom jàmm ànd ak yéen ñépp . Amiin .

text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister , which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea :
text2: Bu nu weesoo loolu , maa ngi leen di dénk sunu jigéen Febe , miy liggéeyal mbooloom ñi gëm ci dëkku Señsere .

text: That ye receive her in the Lord , as becometh saints , and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you : for she hath been a succourer of many , and of myself also .
text2: Nangeen ko jàpp ci turu Boroom bi , ni ko gaayi Yàlla yi yelloo , te dimbali ko ci lépp lu mu aajowoo ; ndaxte moom itam wax dëgg , dimbali na ñu bare , ba ci man mii di wax ak yéen .

text: Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus :
text2: Nuyul - leen ma Pirsil ak Akilas , samay nawle ci liggéeyu Kirist Yeesu .

text: Who have for my life laid down their own necks : unto whom not only I give thanks , but also all the churches of the Gentiles .
text2: Ñoom ñaar dem nañu , bay bëgg a jaay seen bakkan ngir man ; maa ngi leen di gërëm ci loolu , du man rekk sax , waaye itam mboolooy ñi gëm ci xeeti àddina sépp .

text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house . Salute my wellbeloved Epaenetus , who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ .
text2: Nuyul - leen ma it ñiy booloo ci seen kër . Maa ngi nuyu it Epaynet , mi jëkk a gëm Kirist ci diiwaanu Asi ;

text: Greet Mary , who bestowed much labour on us .
text2: ak Maryaama , mi sonnoon lool ci yéen .

text: Salute Andronicus and Junia , my kinsmen , and my fellowprisoners , who are of note among the apostles , who also were in Christ before me .
text2: Nuyul - leen ma it Andoronikus ak Yuñas , sama bokk , yi ñu ma booleeloon tëj ; am nañu tur ci ndawi Yàlla yi , te ñoo ma jiitu sax ci gëm Kirist .

text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord .
text2: Te fàttewuma Ampilyaatus , mi ma bëgg ci sama xol ngir Boroom bi .

text: Salute Urbane , our helper in Christ , and Stachys my beloved .
text2: Nuyul - leen ma it Urban , sunu nawle ci liggéeyu Kirist , ak sama soppe Estakis ;

text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ . Salute them which are of Aristobulus ' household .
text2: ak it Apeles , mi ngëmam dëggu , ba yelloo kóolute . Nuyul - leen ma it waa kër Aristobul ,

text: Salute Herodion my kinsman . Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus , which are in the Lord .
text2: ak Erojon sama mbokk , ak waa kër Narsis , ñi ci Boroom bi .

text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa , who labour in the Lord . Salute the beloved Persis , which laboured much in the Lord .
text2: Maa ngi nuyu Tirifen , moom ak Tirifos , jigéen ñi sonn ci liggéeyu Boroom bi , ak it sama soppe Persidd , mi ci jeex tàkk .

text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord , and his mother and mine .
text2: Maa ngi nuyu it Rufus , waa ji xolam seey ci Boroom bi , ak yaayam , mi ma féete woon it cérub ndey .

text: Salute Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes , and the brethren which are with them .
text2: Te fàttewuma Asànkirit , Felegon , Ermes , Patarobas , Ermas , ñoom ak mboolem bokk yépp .

text: Salute Philologus , and Julia , Nereus , and his sister , and Olympas , and all the saints which are with them .
text2: Nuyul - leen ma it Filolog ak Yuli , Nere ak jigéenam . Te fàttewuma Olimpas ak gaayi Yàlla yiy booloo ak ñoom ñépp .

text: Salute one another with an holy kiss . The churches of Christ salute you .
text2: Te yéen bokk yi , saafoonteleen ak xol bu laab . Mboolooy ñi gëm Kirist yépp a ngi leen di nuyu .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned ; and avoid them .
text2: Bokk yi , maa ngi leen di dénk , ngeen moytu ñi leen di féewale , ba di leen jàddloo yoon wi , ciy wax lu juuyoo ak dëgg gi ngeen jàng . Dawleen leen ba sore .

text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ , but their own belly ; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple .
text2: Ndax ñu deme noonu liggéeyaluñu Kirist sunu Boroom ; seen bopp lañuy liggéeyal . Ñu ngi ñëw ak làmmiñ yu neex , di jey xol yu woyof yi , ba nax leen .

text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men . I am glad therefore on your behalf : but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good , and simple concerning evil .
text2: Waaye seen dégg ndigal bir na ñépp , ba sama xol sedd lool ci yéen . Teewul nag damaa bëgg ngeen am xam - xam bu leer ci lu baax , te bañ a laal dara ci lu bon .

text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly . The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Su ko defee Yàlla Boroom jàmm dina noot Seytaane ci seeni tànk léegi . Na yiwu Yeesu sunu Boroom ànd ak yéen !

text: Timotheus my workfellow , and Lucius , and Jason , and Sosipater , my kinsmen , salute you .
text2: Timote sama nawle bi may jàpple ci liggéey bi , mu ngi leen di nuyu , ak samay bokk Lusiyus , Yason ak Sosipater .

text: I Tertius , who wrote this epistle , salute you in the Lord .
text2: Man Tersiyus mi bind bataaxal bii nag , maa ngi leen di nuyu ci turu Boroom bi .

text: Gaius mine host , and of the whole church , saluteth you . Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you , and Quartus a brother .
text2: Gayus mu ngi leen di nuyu ; moo may ganale ci këram , te foofa it la mbooloo mi di dajaloo . Erast miy topptoo mbiri xaalisu dëkk bi it , nuyu na leen , ak sunu mbokk Kartus .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Na yiwu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist ànd ak yéen ! Amiin .

text: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel , and the preaching of Jesus Christ , according to the revelation of the mystery , which was kept secret since the world began ,
text2: Santleen Yàlla , mi leen man a saxal bu wér ci dëggu xebaar bu baax , bi may waare ci mbirum Yeesu Kirist ! Nekkoon na kumpa gu làqu diirub ay ati at ,

text: But now is made manifest , and by the scriptures of the prophets , according to the commandment of the everlasting God , made known to all nations for the obedience of faith :
text2: waaye léegi nag Yàlla dindi na nu ci kumpa . Te santaane na , nu yégle xebaar boobu ci xeeti àddina sépp , ci firi Mbindi yonent yi , ngir nit ñi man koo gëm , ba jébbalu .

text: To God only wise , be glory through Jesus Christ for ever . Amen .
text2: Yàlla mi jagoo xam - xam bépp , moom rekk moo yelloo ndam ba fàww , jaar ci Yeesu Kirist ! Amiin .

text: Paul , called to be an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God , and Sosthenes our brother ,
text2: Man Pool , ndawul Kirist Yeesu ci coobareg Yàlla , man ak Sosten sunu mbokk ,

text: Unto the church of God which is at Corinth , to them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus , called to be saints , with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord , both theirs and ours :
text2: noo leen di bind , yéen mbooloom Yàlla , mi dëkk Korent . Nu ngi leen di nuyu , yéen ñi Yàlla sédde boppam jaare ci Kirist Yeesu , yéen ñi Yàlla woo , ngeen sell , boole leen ak ñi nekk ci àddina sépp tey tudd turu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist , miy seen Boroom , di sunu bos .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Na leen Yàlla sunu Baay ak Yeesu Kirist Boroom bi may yiw ak jàmm .

text: I thank my God always on your behalf , for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ ;
text2: Duma jóg ci di sant Yàlla sama Boroom ci seen mbir ndax yiw , wi mu leen may ci seen bokk ci Kirist Yeesu .

text: That in every thing ye are enriched by him , in all utterance , and in all knowledge ;
text2: Ndaxte ci yiwi Yàlla yépp ngeen woomle ci Kirist , muy ci wax , muy ci xam - xam .

text: Even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you :
text2: Ndaxte li nu doon seedeel Kirist , Yàlla dëggal na ko ci yéen .

text: So that ye come behind in no gift ; waiting for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Noonu nag ñàkkuleen genn may léegi bi ngeen di séentu waxtu , wi sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist di feeñ ci biir ndamam .

text: Who shall also confirm you unto the end , that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Kirist dina leen dooleel ba ca muj ga , ngir ngeen bañ a am wenn ŋàññ bés bu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist dellusee .

text: God is faithful , by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Yàlla kuy sàmm kóllëre la , moom mi leen woo , ngir ngeen bokk ak Doomam Yeesu Kirist , sunu Boroom .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye all speak the same thing , and that there be no divisions among you ; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment .
text2: Waaye bokk yi , maa ngi leen di dénk ci turu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist , ngeen juboo te bañ a féewaloo ci seen biir . Waaye nangeen ànd te booloo , bokk xel , bokk xalaat .

text: For it hath been declared unto me of you , my brethren , by them which are of the house of Chloe , that there are contentions among you .
text2: Ndaxte bokk yi , waa kër Kelowe xamal nañu ma ne , dangeen di xuloo .

text: Now this I say , that every one of you saith , I am of Paul ; and I of Apollos ; and I of Cephas ; and I of Christ .
text2: Maa ngi ñëw ca wax ja : kenn ku nekk ci yéena ngi naan : « Man ci Pool laa bokk ! » « Man ci Apolos ! » « Man ci Sefas ! » « Man ci Kirist ! »

text: Is Christ divided ? was Paul crucified for you ? or were ye baptized in the name of Paul ?
text2: Ndax Kirist dafa xaajoo ? Ndax Pool lañu daajoon ca bant ba , mu dee ngir yéen ? Ndax sóob nañu leen ci ndox , ngir wone ne bokk ngeen ci Pool ?

text: I thank God that I baptized none of you , but Crispus and Gaius ;
text2: Maa ngi sant Yàlla ci li ma sóobul kenn ci yéen , ku dul Kirispus ak Gayus ,

text: Lest any should say that I had baptized in mine own name .
text2: ngir kenn bañ a wax ne , ci sama tur lañu ko sóob .

text: And I baptized also the household of Stephanas : besides , I know not whether I baptized any other .
text2: Aaŋkay ! Sóob naa it ci ndox waa kër Estefanas . Waaye ci sama pàttaliku sóobuma keneen .

text: For Christ sent me not to baptize , but to preach the gospel : not with wisdom of words , lest the cross of Christ should be made of none effect .
text2: Ndaxte Kirist yebalu ma ngir may sóobe ci ndox , waaye da maa yebal , ngir may yégle xebaar bu baax bi , te ma bañ koo def ak waxi xam - xamu nit , ngir bañ a ñàkkal faayda deewu Kirist ca bant ba .

text: For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness ; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God .
text2: Ndaxte yégleb deewu Kirist ca bant ba , ag ndof la ci ñiy sànku . Waaye ci nun ñi aw ci yoonu mucc gi , dooley Yàlla la .

text: For it is written , I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , and will bring to nothing the understanding of the prudent .
text2: Ndaxte Mbind mi nee na : « Dinaa folli xam - xamu boroom xam - xam yi , lem xalaati ñi am xel . »

text: Where is the wise ? where is the scribe ? where is the disputer of this world ? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of this world ?
text2: Ana boroom xam - xam bi ? Ana kaaŋ mi ? Ana boroom làmmiñ wu neex , wi ci àddina sii ? Xanaa Yàlla wonewul ne , xam - xamu àddina si ag ndof la ?

text: For after that in the wisdom of God the world by wisdom knew not God , it pleased God by the foolishness of preaching to save them that believe .
text2: Gannaaw àddina si ci xam - xamam demul ba xam Yàlla - - te Yàllaa dogal loolu ci xam - xamam — soob na Yàlla mu musal ñi gëm , jaar ci yégleb xebaaru Kirist , fekk ag ndof la ci bëti nit .

text: For the Jews require a sign , and the Greeks seek after wisdom :
text2: Ndaxte Yawut yi ñu ngi laaj ay firnde ; Gereg yi di wut xam - xam .

text: But we preach Christ crucified , unto the Jews a stumblingblock , and unto the Greeks foolishness ;
text2: Waaye nun nu ngi yégle Kirist , mi ñu reyoon ca bant ba , te loolooy téq ngëmu Yawut yi , di ag ndof ci ñi dul Yawut .

text: But unto them which are called , both Jews and Greeks , Christ the power of God , and the wisdom of God .
text2: Waaye ci ñi Yàlla woo , ñuy Yawut mbaa di Gereg , Kirist mooy dooley Yàlla , di xam - xamu Yàlla .

text: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men ; and the weakness of God is stronger than men .
text2: Li ñuy wax ag ndof ca wàllu Yàlla moo gën a tedd xam - xamu nit . Te li ñuy wax ñàkk dooley Yàlla moo ëpp kàttan dooley nit .

text: For ye see your calling , brethren , how that not many wise men after the flesh , not many mighty , not many noble , are called :
text2: Bokk yi , seetleen seen nekkin , bi leen Yàlla di woo . Barewul woon ci yéen , ñi ñuy tudde ay boroom xam - xam mbaa ay boroom doole mbaa ñu rafet ab juddu .

text: But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise ; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty ;
