text2: ndaxte Yàlla du Yàllay lëj - lëj waaye Yàllay jàmm la . Ci mboolooy gaayi Yàlla yépp ,

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: na jigéen ñi noppi ci ndaje mi , ndaxte sañuñu faa wax . Nañu doon jigéen ñu nangu , ni ko yoon wi tërale .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Te su ñu bëggee laaj dara , nañu ko laaj seen jëkkër ca kër ga , ndaxte jigéen di wax ci ndajem mbooloom ñi gëm , gàcce la .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Ndax ci yéen la kàddug Yàlla sosoo ? Walla ndax ci yéen rekk la agsi ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Su kenn xalaatee ne , mooy wax ci kàddug Yàlla , walla mu xalaat ne , Xelum Yàlla jagleel na may , na nangu ne lii ma leen bind ndigalu Boroom bi la .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Te su ko xeebee it , ñu xeeb ko .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Kon nag bokk yi , farluleen ci di wax ci kàddug Yàlla , te buleen tere kenn muy wax ay làkk .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Waaye nag , na lépp di dox ciy teggin te aw yoon .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Léegi nag bokk yi , maa ngi leen di fàttali xebaar bu baax bi ma leen yégal . Xebaar bu baax boobu , nangu ngeen ko te yéena ngi ciy sax .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Ci moom ngeen jaare , ba mucc , bu ngeen téyee bu dëgër njàngale mi , ni ma leen ko yégale . Walla xanaa boog gëm ngeen ko cig neen ?

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Li ma jotoon , jottali naa leen ko , te moo jëkk ci maana yi : Kirist dee na ngir dindi sunuy bàkkaar , ni ko Mbind mi tërale ,

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: suul nañu ko , mu dekki ca ñetteelu fan ba , ni ko Mbind mi tërale .

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Feeñu na Sefas , teg ca fukki taalibe ya ak ñaar .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Gannaaw ga feeñu na lu ëpp juróomi téeméeri bokki taalibe ci benn yoon . Te ñu bare ci ñoom ñu ngi dund ba léegi , waaye am na ci ñu nelaw .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Ba noppi feeñu na Saag ak ndawi Kirist yépp .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Man nag la mujj a feeñu , ma mel ni liir bu judduwul ci jamonoom .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Ndaxte maa gën a ñàkk solo ci ndawi Kirist yi , te yeyoowuma sax , ñu may wooye ndaw , man mi doon fitnaal mbooloom Yàlla .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Waaye nag yiwu Yàlla moo tax ma doon li ma doon , te yiw , wi mu wone ci man , du cig neen . Waaye sax maa gën a liggéey ñi ci des ñépp : du ci man , waaye yiwu Yàlla , wiy jëf ci man , moo tax .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Noonu nag muy man muy ñoom , dénkaane boobu lanuy yégle , te moom ngeen gëm .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Waaye su nu yéglee ne , Kirist dekki na , nan la ñenn ñi ci yéen man a waxe ne , néew yi duñu dekki ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Su fekkee ne ñi dee duñu dekki , kon Kirist it dekkiwul .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Te su Kirist dekkiwul , sunu waare day neen , te it seen ngëm day neen .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Rax - ca - dolli gis nañu ne , seedeel nanu Yàlla ay fen , ndaxte seede nanu ci mbiram ne , dekkal na Yeesu , te fekk dekkalu ko , su néew yi dul dekki .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Su néew yi dul dekki , Kirist moom it dekkiwul .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Te su Kirist dekkiwul , seen ngëm du am solo , ba tey yéena ngi ci seeni bàkkaar .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Te it ñi dee ba noppi ci Kirist sànku nañu .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Su fekkee ci giiru dund gii rekk la sunu yaakaar ci Kirist ame solo , kon noo gën a mat a yërëm ñépp .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Waaye léegi Kirist dekki na , di ku jëkk a dekki , ni gub yi ñu jëkk a tànne ci ngóob mi , jagleel leen Yàlla .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Gannaaw ci nit la dee jaar , dugg àddina , kon it ci nit la ndekkite jaar .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Kon ni ñépp deeye ci seen bokk ci Aadama , noonu la ñépp di dundaate ci seen bokk ci Kirist .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Waaye ku nekk ak ayam . Kirist moo jëkk , mel ni gub yi ñu jëkk a tànne ci ngóob mi , ba noppi , bu Kirist dellusee , ñi bokk ci moom jël seen ay .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Gannaaw ga , mujug jamono taxaw , te Kirist dina noot gépp kilifa ak bépp sañ - sañ ak doole , ba noppi delloo nguur gi kiy Yàlla di Baayam .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Ndaxte fàww Kirist nguuru , ba kera Yàlla di daaneel noonam yépp ciy tànkam .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Noon bu mujj , bi mu fiy jële , mooy dee .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Ndaxte Mbind mi nee na : « Yàlla nootal na ko lépp , mu teg ci tànk . » Waaye bu Mbind mi nee , « noot na lépp , » wóor na ne , moom mi ko nootal lépp , génne na ci boppam .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Léegi bu ñu ko nootalee lépp nag , moom Kirist muy Doom ji dina delloo kilifteef gi Yàlla , mi ko nootal lépp , ngir Yàlla nekk buur ci lépp .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Su ndekkite amul , kon ñi ñu sóob ci ndox ngir ñi dee , lu mu leen di jariñ ? Su dekki amul , kon lu tax ñu leen di sóob ngir ñi dee ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Te nun it lu tax fu nu tollu nu jaay sunu bakkan ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Bokk yi , ni ma damoo ci yéen ndax Yeesu Kirist , ni la ma wóore ne , bés bu nekk ma riisu dee .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Su fekkee ne ci ni ñu ko waxe , xeex naa ca dëkku Efes ak rabi àll , kon ban njariñ la may amal ? Su néew yi dul woon dekki , am na lu ci léeb wax : « Nanu lekk di naan , ndaxte ëllëg dinanu dee . »

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Bu leen ko réere mbir : « Ànd bu bon dina yàq nit ku baax . »

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Delloosileen xel yi te bàyyi bàkkaar , ndaxte am na ci yéen , ñu umple Yàlla . Kon war ngeen a rus !

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Waaye dina am kuy naan : « Nan la néew yi di dekkee ? Wan yaram lañuy dellusee ? »

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Yaa gàtt xel ! Li ngay ji , du jebbi dund gu bees , fi ak deewul ba noppi .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Te li ngay ji du jëmmi gàncax giy ñëwi , waaye pepp kese la , maanaam dugub , walla weneen jiwu .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Noonu Yàlla jox ko jëmm ju ko neex , jiwu wu nekk ak jëmmam .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Jëmmi mbindeef yépp a wuute : nit ak jëmmam , mala , picc , jën — yu ci nekk ak sa jëmmi bopp .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Am na itam ay jëmm ca asamaan ak ay jëmm ci suuf . Leeru jëmm ca asamaan wuute na ak gi ci suuf .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Jant bi , weer wi ak biddiiw , lu nekk ak sag leer . Te it leeru biddiiw bu nekk dina wuute ak moroomam .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Noonu la ndekkitel néew yi di deme . Bu ñu suulee néew bi , dañoo ji lu yàqu . Bu dekkee , du yàqooti ba abadan .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Lu ñàkk solo lañuy suul ; mu dekki ak ndam . Lu néew doole lañuy suul , mu dekki ak kàttan .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Bu ñu koy suul , yaram lay doon wu soloo woon ruu . Bu dekkee , doon yaram wu soloo ndamu Xelum Yàlla . Ndegam am na yaram wu soloo ruu , kon dina am yaram wu soloo ndamu Xelum Yàlla .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Mbind mi nee na : « Nit ku jëkk ka , Aadama , doon na boroom ruu , » waaye Aadama mu mujj mi doon na Xel muy joxe dund .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Yaram wi soloo ndamu Xelum Yàlla jiituwul ; yaramu doom Aadama moo jiitu ; yaramu ndam li moo ci topp .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Nit ku jëkk ka pëndu suuf la woon ; ñaareelu nit ki di Kirist , mi ngi jóge asamaan .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Waa àddina yor nañu jëmmi nit , ki ñu sàkke ci suuf ; noonu it ñi bokk ci asamaan dinañu yor melokaanu ki jóge ci asamaan .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Te ni nu yore melokaanu ki ñu sàkke ci suuf , noonu lanuy yoreji melokaanu ki jóge ca asamaan .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Li may wax nag bokk yi , moo di ne , sunu yaram wii mënul a am wàll ci nguuru Yàlla , te lu yàqu mënul a am wàll ci liy sax abadan .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Lii ma leen di xamal , mbóotu Yàlla la . Dégluleen , dunu jaar ci dee nun ñépp , waaye nun ñépp dinanu soppiku ,

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: ci saa su gàtt , ci xef - ak - xippi , bu liit gu mujj gi jibee . Ndax liit gi dina jib , néew yi dekki , di dund abadan , te nun dinanu soppiku .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Yaram wu yàqu war na sol jëmm ja dul yàqooti , te yaram wiy dee sol dund gu sax abadan .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Bu li yàqu solee melokaanu li dul yàqu , te liy dee sol melokaanu liy sax abadan , kon lii ñu wax ci Mbind mi mat : « Yàlla noot na dee , ba labal ko ci ndamam .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: Céy yaw dee ! Ana sa ndam ? Céy yaw dee ! Ana sa daŋar ji ngay fitte ? »

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Daŋaru dee mooy bàkkaar , te dooley bàkkaar mooy Yoon wi .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Waaye jërë - jëf yaw Yàlla , ji nu jox ndam li jaarale ko ci sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist !

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Kon nag sama bokk yi ma sopp , nangeen takku , sampu ba dëgër , te gën a sawar ci liggéeyu Boroom bi , xam ne seen liggéey , bi jëm ci Boroom bi , du neen .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Léegi nag ci li jëm ci ndimbal , li ñuy sàkkal gaayi Yàlla yi , defleen li ma tëral ci mboolooy ñi gëm te nekk ci diiwaanu Galasi .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Bés bu jëkk ci ayu - bés yi , na ku nekk ber lu mu àttan , denc ko , ngir saa yu ma dikkee , ñu bañ di wër di laaj xaalis .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Su ma dikkee , dinaa dénk seen xaalis ñi ngeen tànn , yónni leen Yerusalem , boole ko ak bataaxal .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Su aajoo ma demal sama bopp , kon dinañu ànd ak man .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Gannaaw bu ma jàllee diiwaanu Maseduwan , dinaa ñëw ci yéen , ndaxte fas naa ko yéenee jàll .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Man na am ma yàgg ci yéen , jombul sax ma lollikoo fi yéen . Noonu dingeen taxawu sama yoon , fu ma man a jëm .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Ndaxte fi mu ne bëgguma leen a gis rekk , jàll , waaye yaakaar naa ne , dinaa toog ci yéen ab diir , bu neexee Boroom bi .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Ba tey dinaa toog fii ci dëkku Efes ba màggalu Pàntakot ,

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: ndaxte Yàlla ubbil na ma bunt , ba mu ne làññ , ngir may def liggéey bu man a am muj gu rafet , te noon yu bare bëgg a gàllankoor liggéey bi .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Bu leen Timote ganesee , fexeleen ba bumu am njàqare ci seen biir , ndaxte dafay liggéeyal Boroom bi ni man .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Kon bu ko kenn xeeb . Nangeen taxawu yoonam , ba mu dellusi ci man ci jàmm , ndaxte maa ngi koy xaar ak bokk yi .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Naka Apolos sunu mbokk mi nag moom , xiir naa ko ay yooni yoon , mu ñëw ci yéen , ànd ak bokk yi . Waaye fi mu ne dëppoowul ak coobareem . Dina ñëw saa su ko manee .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Farluleen te dëgër ci ngëm , di góor - góorlu te am pasteef .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Lépp li ngeen di def , defleen ko ak mbëggeel .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Xam ngeen ne , Estefanas ak njabootam ñoo jëkk a nangu xebaar bu baax bi ci diiwaanu Akayi , te ñoo joxe seen bopp , ngir liggéeyal gaayi Yàlla yi . Kon nag bokk yi , maa ngi leen di ñaan ,

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: ngeen nangul nit ñu mel noonu , ñoom ak képp ku ànd ak ñoom ci liggéey bi .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Bi ma Estefanas ak Fortunatus ak Akaykus seetsee , bég naa ci lool . Taxawal nañu leen ci topptoo , bi ngeen yéene woon ci man te tële ko .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Seral nañu sama xol ak seen yos itam . Kon fonkleen nit ñu mel noonu .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Mboolooy ñi gëm te nekk diiwaanu Asi ñu ngi leen di nuyu . Akilas ak Pirsil , ñu ngi leen di nuyu bu baax ci Boroom bi , ñoom ak mbooloom ñi gëm tey daje seen kër .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Bokk yépp ñu ngi leen di nuyu . Saafoonteleen ak xol bu laab .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Man Pool maa bind nuyoo bii ci sama loxob bopp .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Képp ku bañ Boroom bi , Yal na ko Yàlla alag . Boroom bi , ñëwal !

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Na yiwu Boroom bi Yeesu ànd ak yéen .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Bëgg naa leen yéen ñépp ndax sunu booloo ak Yeesu Kirist .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Man Pool , ndawul Kirist Yeesu ci coobareg Yàlla , man ak Timote sunu mbokk , noo leen di bind , yéen mbooloom Yàlla mi nekk dëkku Korent , ak gaayi Yàlla yu sell , yi nekk ci diiwaanu Akayi gépp .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Na leen Yàlla sunu Baay ak Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist may yiw ak jàmm .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Cant ñeel na Yàlla , Baayu sunu boroom Yeesu Kirist , di Baay biy Aji Yërmande tey Boroom lépp luy dëfël xol yi .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Mooy dëfël sunu xol ci sunu tiis yépp , ngir nun ci sunu bopp nu man a dëfël xolu ñépp ñi nekk ci tiis , di leen sédd ci noflaay , bi Yàlla def ci sunu xol .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Ndaxte ni coonoy Kirist di baawaane ci nun , noonu it la Kirist nekke buntu noflaay bu yaa , biy dëfël sunu xol .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Su nuy jaar ci tiis , seen noflaay a tax ak seen mucc . Bu dee Yàlla dëfël na sunu xol , seen noflaay a tax , ngir ngeen man a dékku naqar yu mel ni yu nuy am , nun itam .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Te sunu yaakaar ci seen mbir dëgër na , xam ne , ni ngeen bokke ak nun naqar , noonu ngeen di bokke ak nun noflaayu xol .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Ndaxte bokk yi , bëggunu ngeen umple tiis , wi nu daj ci diiwaanu Asi . Yen bi diisoon na lool ba weesu sunu kàttan , ba amatunu yaakaar sax ci dund .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Demoon nanu ba defe ne , dogalees na sunug dee . Loolu amoon na , ngir nu bañ a wéer sunu yaakaar ci sunu bopp , waaye nu wéer ko ci Yàlla , miy dekkal néew yi .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Moo nu musal ci dee gu metti googu te dina nu musalaat . Ci moom lanu wékk sunu yaakaar ne , dina nu musalati ,

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: bu ngeen nu jàpplee di ci boole seeni ñaan . Noonu ñu bare dinañu gërëm Yàlla ci yiw , wi mu nu may te muy tontul ñaanu ñu bare .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Li nuy tiitaroo moo di sunu xel day seede ne , ci kanamu àddina si , rawatina sax ci seen kanam , aw nanu ci tànk yu jub , ànd ak xol bu laab fa kanam Yàlla . Jëfewunu ci pexem nit , waaye ci yiwu Yàlla lanu jëfe .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Bindunu leen nag leneen lu dul li ngeen jàng te xam ko . Fi mu ne seen xam - xam ci nun matagul , waaye yaakaar naa ne , bu matee , dingeen man a tiitaru ci nun , ni nu koy defe ci yéen , bu bésu Boroom bi Yeesu ñëwee .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Kon ni ma ame woon kóolute googu , naroon naa jëkk a jaar ci yéen , ngir ganesi leen ñaari yoon .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Bëggoon naa jaar ci yéen , dem diiwaanu Maseduwan , te bu ma jógee Maseduwan , dikkaat ci yéen , ngir ngeen waajal sama tukki ca Yude .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Ba may mébét loolu nag , ndax dama cee boolewul pasteef ? Te ndax samay yéene yéeney nit kese la , ba may xel ñaar , naan « waaw » ak « déet ? »

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Wóor na Yàlla ne , li nu leen di wax , du « waaw » ju ànd ak « déedéet . »

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Ndaxte Doomu Yàlla ji , Yeesu Kirist , mi nu doon yégle ci seen biir , man ak Silwan ak Timote , nekkul woon « waaw » ak « déedéet ; » « waawi » Yàlla la mas a nekk .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Te lépp lu Yàlla dige woon fekk na « waawam » ci moom . Noonu kon ci Kirist lanuy waxe : « Amiin , » ngir yékkati ndamu Yàlla .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Te Yàlla moo nuy dëgëral ci Kirist , nun ak yéen , te sol nu Xelam .

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Moo nu màndargaal ni ay gaayam , def Xelam ci sunu xol , muy dawal ci cér , bi mu nu dencal .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Man nag Yàlla seede na ma , te giñ naa ci sama bakkan ne , yërëm leen rekk moo tax delluseeguma Korent .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Du caageen nag noo leen bëgg a noot ci lu jëm ci seen ngëm , waaye nu ngi liggéeyandoo ak yéen ngir seen mbég , ndaxte ci ngëm ngeen sax .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Man nag fas yéene naa lii : duma dellusi ci yéen ci naqar .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Ndaxte su ma leen tegee naqar , kuy seddal sama xol ku dul yéen ñi ma teg aw naqar ?

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Looloo tax ma binde noonu , ngir bañ a agsi , am naqar ci ñi ma waroon a bégal . Am naa kóolute ci yéen ñépp ne , sama mbég mooy seen mbég .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Ci biir tiis ak xol bu jeex laa leen bind , samay bët taa ak ay rangooñ . Binduma leen ngir teg leen naqar , waaye ngir ngeen xam xóotaayu mbëggeel gi ma am ci yéen .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Su kenn tegee moroomam naqar , du man la ko teg , waaye man nanu ne , yéen ñépp la ko teg — matul may réyal mbir mi .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Àtte bi ko mbooloo mi teg , doy na .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Léegi nag baal - leen ko te dëfël xolam , ngir bañ mu sóobu ci naqar wu ëpp .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Kon maa ngi leen di ñaan , ngeen feddali seen mbëggeel ci moom .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Nattu leen moo tax ma bind leen it , ngir seet ba xam dingeen dégg ndigal ci lépp .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Ku ngeen baal , ma baal ko itam . Man nag , su ma baalee - - fekk am lu ma war a baale — yéena tax ma def ko ci kanamu Kirist ,

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: ngir Seytaane bañ a am bunt bu mu jaar ba nax nu , ndaxte réerewunu mbir ay pexeem .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Ba ma àggee Torowas nag , ngir yégle fa xebaar bu baax bi ci Kirist , Boroom bi ubbil na ma ci bunt .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Waaye sama xel dalul benn yoon , ndax li ma fa fekkul sama mbokk , Tit . Noonu nag ma tàggu leen , daldi dem diiwaanu Maseduwan .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Waaye cant ñeel na Yàlla ! Ci sunu booloo ak Kirist , daf nuy yóbbaale saa su nekk ci gawari ndamam , tey jaar ci nun ngir turu Kirist jolli fu nekk , ni xetu latkoloñ di tasaaroo .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Ndaxte ci Yàlla , xetu Kirist gu neex lanu , di gilli jëm ci ñiy mucc ak ñiy sànku ;

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: ci ñu mujj ñii , xet gu sedd lanu , guy jëme ci dee ; ci ñu jëkk ñi , xetu dund lanu , guy jëme ci dund . Kon ku man a àttan yen boobu !

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Nun nag melunu ni ñu bare , ñiy baana - baana ci kàddug Yàlla , waaye ci sunu booloo ak Kirist , nu ngi waare ak xol bu laab fa kanam Yàlla , ni yonenti Yàlla .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: Mbaa du danoo tàmbalee tëgguwaat nag ? Mbaa du danoo soxla ni ñenn ñi ay dénkaane yu ñu nuy gërëme , te ñuy bataaxal yu jóge ci yéen walla yu jëm ci yéen ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Déedéet , yéenay sunu bataaxal , te ci sunu xol lañu ko bind , di bataaxal bu nit ñépp man a xam te jàng ko ;

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: ndaxte leer na ne , bataaxal bu jóge ci Kirist ngeen , bu mu jaarale ci nun . Bindeesu ko daa , waaye ci Xelum Yàlla miy dund lees ko binde ; te du ci àlluway doj lañu ko rëdd , waaye ci xolu doom Aadama .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Googu kóolute lanu am fa kanam Yàlla ndax Kirist .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Du caageen nag ne , àttan nanu dara ci sunu man - man , ba nu yaakaar dara ci sunu bopp , waaye sunu kàttan ci Yàlla lay jóge .

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: Moo nu jox kàttan , nu nekk ndaw yuy xamle kóllëre gu bees gi . Te kóllëre googu ajuwul ci ay sàrti diine , waaye mi ngi aju ci jëfu Xelum Yàlla . Ndaxte sàrti kese day jëme ci dee , waaye Xelum Yàlla dafay joxe dund .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: Ba ñu bindee arafi sàrt yi ciy àlluway doj , leeraayu ndamu Yàlla nekk fa . Xar - kanamu Musaa di leer , ba bànni Israyil duñu ko man a xool , fekk leer ga di wéy . Ndegam sàrti yoon yooyuy jëme ci dee , ñoo ànd ak ndam ,

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: rawatina nag ne , jëfu Xelum Yàlla dina gën a ànd ak ndam .

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Su fekkee ne tëralin , wiy teg nit tooñ , àndoon na ak ndam , rawatina ci tëralin wiy àtte nit jub .

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Ndaxte ndam li amoon keroog suux na ci ndam li ko raw léegi .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Te it ndegam li wéy dafa amoon ndam , astemaak li fi sax .

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Kon nag gannaaw wékku nanu ci yaakaar ju mel noonu , danuy waare ak kóolute gu mag .

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: Dunu def ni Musaa , mi daan muur xar - kanamam , ngir bànni Israyil bañ a gis jeexug leer googu saxul .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Waaye seen xel dafa daldi gumba . Ba tey jii sax , bu ñuy jàng téereb kóllëre gu jëkk gi , muuraay moomu dafay des ; deñul , ndaxte ci Kirist rekk la man a deñe .

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: Waaw , ba tey jii , su ñuy jàng yoonu Musaa , seen xol dafay muuru .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: Waaye saa su kenn walbatikoo ci Boroom bi , muuraay gi daldi muriku .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: Fekk nag Boroom , bi ñuy wax foofu , moo di Xelum Yàlla , te fu Xelu Boroom bi nekk , foofa yaatu gu mat am na fa .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Te nun ñépp nag , danuy lerxat ndamu Boroom bi ak xar - kanam bu muuruwul , bay soppiku ci melokaanam , ànd ak ndam luy yokku te sax ci dooley Boroom biy Xelum Yàlla .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Kon nag ndegam Yàlla ci yërmandeem sas na nu liggéey boobu , dunu bayliku .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Lànk nanoo ànd ci mbir , yi ñuy nëbb te ñu gàccelu . Sunuy tànk du yu njublaŋ te dunu dëngal kàddug Yàlla . Waaye nu ngi biral dëgg , di sàkku kóoluteg ñépp fa kanam Yàlla .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Su fekkee ne sax , xebaar bu baax bi dafa muuru ci ñenn ñi , dafa fekk ñoom ñu aw yoon wu jëm ci sànkute .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Ñoom la yàllay jamono ji gëlëmal seen xel , ngir ñu bañ a gis leeru xebaar bu baax , biy wone ndamu Kirist , mi di melokaanu Yàlla .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Ndaxte Yeesu Kirist Boroom bi lanuy waare , waaye waarewunu lu jëm ci sunu bopp . Nun seeni jaam lanu ndax Yeesu .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla mi ne : « Na leer leer ci biir lëndëm , » moo leer ci sunu xol , ngir leeral nu ak xam - xamu ndamu Yàlla , liy feeñ ci xar - kanamu Kirist .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Leer googu ci sunu xol mi ngi mel ni alal , waaye ñu ngi ko def ci nun ñi néew doole niy njaq kese , ngir kàttan gu ëpp xel gi , bawoo ci Yàlla te du ci nun .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Dañu nuy sonal fu nekk , waaye kenn tancu nu . Dañu nuy dugal ci ruq yi , waaye dinanu ci génn .

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: Dañu nuy fitnaal , waaye Yàlla du nu wacc mukk . Tër nañu nu , waaye kenn doggaliwu nu .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Fu nu tollu noo ngi gàddu ci sunu yaram dee gi Yeesu dee woon , ngir dundu Yeesu moom it feeñ ci sunu yaram .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Bés bu nekk , nun ñiy dund , ñu ngi nuy jébbal dee ndax Kirist , ngir dundu Kirist moom itam feeñ ci sunu yaram wiy dee .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Noonu dee mu ngi jëf ci nun , dund di jëf ci yéen .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Mbind mi nee na : « Damaa gëm , moo tax ma wax . » Nun it nag , ndegam am nanu menn xelu ngëm moomu , danoo gëm , ba tax nuy wax .

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: Ndaxte xam nanu ne Yàlla , mi dekkal Boroom bi Yeesu , dina nu dekkal nun itam ak Yeesu , te dina nu yóbbu ak yéen , taxawal nun ñépp ci jataayam .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Ndaxte lépp li nuy daj , seen njariñ a tax , ngir yiwu Yàlla , wiy yokku ci nit ñu gën a takku , yokkaale ngërëm lu jëm ci Yàlla , ngir jollil ndamam .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Loolu moo tax sunu yaakaar du tas . Bu fekkee sax sunu yaram day yàqu jëm cig mag , sunu ruu moom , bés ak bés muy gën a yeesaat .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Ndaxte sunu coono bu woyof bi dul yàgg , dafa nuy jural ndam lu bare , ba suul coono bi , tey sax abadan .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Kon diirunu li ñuy gis waaye li ñu dul gis . Ndaxte li ñuy gis day wéy , waaye li ñu dul gis day sax ba fàww .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Yaram wi nu soloo ci kaw suuf dafa mel ni ab tànt . Su daanoo , xam nanu ne , Yàlla jagleel na nu am taax ci asamaan , mu loxol nit defarul , di taax muy sax ba fàww .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Fi mu ne nu ngi wonk , di yàkkamtee féete ak sunu dëkkukaayu asamaan , sol ko ni koddaay , xam ne ,

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: bu nu ko solee , dunu def yaramu neen .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Nun ñi nekk ci tànt bii , nu ngi wonk ndax coono . Du caageen ne , danoo bëgg a summi sunu yaramu àddina , waaye danoo bëgg a sol sunu yaramu asamaan , ngir liy dee sóobu ci biir dund .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Ki nu waajal ngir loolu moo di Yàlla , moom mi nu jox Xelam , di dawal ci cér bi mu nu dencal .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Noonu kon nu ngi fees ak kóolute fu nu tollu ; te xam nanu ne , fi ak nu ngi dëkk ci yaram wii , àggagunu sunu màkkaan ci wetu Boroom bi —

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: ndaxte doxewunu ab gis , waaye ngëm lanuy doxe .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Kon fees nanu ak kóolute , te yéenee jóge ci dëkkukaayu yaram wii , dem dëkk ci wetu Boroom bi .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Kon nag des fi walla jóge fi , li nuy faaydaal moo di neex Boroom bi .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Ndaxte nun ñépp fàww nu teew ci kanamu Kirist , mu àtte nu , ngir ku nekk jot peyu li mu def ci yaramam , muy lu baax walla lu bon .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Gannaaw xam nanu ragal Yàlla nag , nu ngi fexee gëmloo nit ñi , waaye li nu nekk leer na Yàlla te yaakaar naa ne , leer na leen it , ba ne fàŋŋ .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Jéemunoo waxati lu ngeen nuy nawe , waaye danu leen a bëgg a may yoonu tiitaru ci nun , tey tontu ñooñuy tiitaroo col te du xol .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Su fekkee danoo tàggalikoo ak sunu sago , ngir Yàlla la . Su nu àndee ak sunu sago , ngir yéen la .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Ndaxte mbëggeelu Kirist moo nuy jiite , ndax wóor na nu ne , ndegam kenn rekk a dee ngir ñépp , kon ñépp a dee .

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: Te dee na ngir ñépp , ngir ñiy dund dootuñu dund ngir seen bopp , waaye ngir ki dee ci seen wàll te dekki .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Kon nag gannaawsi tey xoolatunu kenn ci gis - gisu àddina . Su fekkee mas nanoo xool Kirist ci gis - gisu àddina , léegi xooleetunu ko noonu .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Kon bu nit bokkee ci Kirist , mbindeef mu bees la . Li jëkk wéy na , lu bees a fi teew .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Te loolu lépp a ngi sosoo ci Yàlla , mi nu jubale ak boppam jaare ko ci Yeesu Kirist , te sas nu nuy waare juboo googu :

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: maanaam , Yàlla jaar na ci Kirist , di jubale waa àddina ak boppam te sëfu leen seeni tooñ . Kàddug juboo googu , Yàlla dénk na nu ko .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Ay ndaw lanu , yu Kirist yónni , te Yàllaa ngi woo nit ñi jaare ko ci nun . Kon nag ci turu Kirist , nu ngi leen koy ñaan : nanguleen a juboo ak Yàlla .

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Kirist mi musul a def bàkkaar , Yàlla def na ko bàkkaar ci sunu wàll , ngir ci sunu bokk ci moom , nu man a doon njubteg Yàlla .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Nun nag ñiy liggéeyandoo ak Yàlla , nu ngi leen di ñaan : jariñooleen yiw , wi ngeen jote ci Yàlla , ngir mu bañ a neen ci yéen .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla nee na : « Ca jamono ja mu jekke , nangu naa sa ñaan ; ci bésu mucc gi laa la wallu . » Tey jii la jamono ju jekk ji ; tey la bésub mucc gi .

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Bëggunoo lëmbaaje xelu kenn ci dara , ngir kenn bañ a sikk sunu liggéey .

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: Li nu bëgg moo di rafetal sunu tur ni jawriñi Yàlla ci fànn gu nekk ; danuy muñ coono yi , tiis yi , njàqare yi ;

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: ñu nuy dóor , di nu tëj ci kaso , dëkk yi di yengu ndax sunu mbir ; nuy liggéey ba sonn , di fanaanee xool , di woor .

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: Nu ngi rafetal sunu yen ci dund gu sell , ci xam - xam , muñ ak laabiir , ci Xel mu Sell mi ak ci mbëggeel gu raxul njublaŋ ,

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: ci kàddug dëgg ak ci kàttanu Yàlla , nu ngi yor gànnaayi njubte ci loxol ndeyjoor ak lu càmmooñ .

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: Ñu bàkk nu , jéppi nu , sant nu , xas nu . Ñu di nu jiiñ réeral , moona niti dëgg lanu .

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: Ñuy xeeb sunu tur , moona tur yi siiw nañu . Nu mel ni ñu loof , moona nu ngi dund . Ñu yar nu , teewul nu rëcc ci dee .

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: Danuy dékku tiis , waaye di bég fu nu tollu . Nu tumurànke , waaye di woomal ñu bare ; amunu dara , fekk noo moom lépp .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Yéen bokki Korent , wax nanu leen sunu biir ak sunu biti , di leen ubbil sunu xol .

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: Ubbiku nanu ci yéen , waaye yéen ubbikuwuleen ci nun .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Maa ngi wax ak yéen ni samay doom ; feyleen nu bor bi , yéen itam ; ubbileen seen xol !

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Buleen likkoo ak ñi gëmul . Gan àndandoo moo man a am diggante njubte ak ndëngte ? Gan booloo moo man a am diggante leer ak lëndëm ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: Gan déggoo moo man a am diggante Kirist ak Beliyar ? Gan jaxasoo moo man a am diggante ki gëm ak ki gëmul ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: Nan la këru Yàlla man a mànkoo ak xërëm yi ? Ndaxte nun nooy këru Yàlla Aji Dund ji , ni ko Yàlla waxe : « Dinaa dëkk ci seen biir , tey dox ànd ak ñoom , ma nekk seen Yàlla , ñuy samay gaay . »

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Kon nag Boroom bi nee na : « Génnleen biir ñooñu te beru . Buleen laal dara lu am sobe , kon dinaa leen teeru .

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: Dinaa nekk baay ci yéen , ngeen di doom ci man , muy góor , di jigéen . Moom la Aji Kàttan ji wax . »

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Ndegam nag jot nanu ci dige yu mel nii , samay soppe , nanu sellal sunu bopp ci bépp sobeb yaram walla bu xel , dund dund gu sell , ba mat ci ragal Yàlla .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Yaatal - leen nu ci seen xol . Tooñunu kenn ; lorunu kenn ; naxunu kenn , jël alalam .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Teg leen tooñ taxul may wax lii , ndaxte wax naa ba noppi ne , yéena ngi ci sunu xol ci dund ak ci dee .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Kóolute gi ma am ci yéen réy na . Tiitar bi may jële ci yéen réy na . Sama xol sedd na guyy . Damaa fees ak mbég ci bépp coono bu nuy daj !

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Ba nu àggee diiwaanu Maseduwan , noppaluwunu , waaye coono bu ne daj nanu ko : xeex ci biti , njàqare ci biir .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Waaye Yàlla miy dëfël xolu ñiy yoggoorlu ndax tiis , dëfël na sunu xol ci ñëwu Tit ,

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: te du ci ñëwam rekk sax waaye ci li ngeen dëfël xolam . Yégal na nu seen nammeel ci nun , seen réccu ak seen farlu jëm ci man , ba sama mbég gën cee yokku .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Su fekkee ne sax , bataaxal bi ma leen bind dafa leen naqare , réccootuma ko . Ci lu jëkk réccu naa ko , ndaxte gis naa ne , bataaxal boobu teg na leen tiis , doonte sax ci diir bu néew .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Waaye sama xol sedd na léegi , du ndax seen tiis , waaye ci li mu tax ngeen réccu . Tiis wu jóge ci Yàlla ngeen tegoo , te àndul ak benn loraange bu bawoo ci nun .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Ndaxte tiis wu jóge ci Yàlla dina jur réccu guy jëme ci mucc , te réccu googu laajul gëstu . Waaye tiisu àddina day jëme ci dee .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Seen tiis wi jóge ci Yàlla , gisleen nag li mu jur : ndaw njaxlaf ak lay ak mer ak ragal ak nammeel ak farlu , ak bëgg a yar ki tooñ ! Ci seen jëf yépp wone ngeen ne , set ngeen wecc ci mbir moomu .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Kon nag su ma leen bindee , ki tooñ taxul , ki ñu tooñ it taxul , waaye dama leen a bind , ngir ngeen man a gis ci kanam Yàlla cawarte , gi ngeen am ci nun .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Te loolu seral na sunu xol . Sunu xel dal na , rawati ci li nu ànd ak Tit ci mbégam , ci li ngeen seral xolam , yéen ñépp .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Su fekkee ne tiitaru woon naa ci seen mbir ci kanamu Tit , rusuma ci . Dëgg rekk lanu leen mas a wax ; noonu it la Tit gise ne , li nu leen doon seede lépp , dëgg la .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Te mbëggeelam ci yéen gën na yokku , buy fàttaliku ni ngeen ko déggale yéen ñépp , ci li ngeen ko teeru , ànd ak ragal ak weg .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Bég naa , ndaxte xam naa ne , man naa leen a wóolu ci lu nekk !

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Gannaaw loolu bokk yi , danu leen a bëgg a xamal li yiwu Yàlla jur ci biir mboolooy ñi gëm te nekk ci diiwaanu Maseduwan .

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Nattu yi ñu jaar ëmb nañu coono yu réy ; waaye seen mbég mu tar ak seen ñàkk gu metti ñoo jur ci ñoom yéwén gu jéggi dayo .

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Seede naa ne , ñoom ci seen bopp joxe nañu ba fa seen man - man yem , ba weesu ko sax .

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: Saraxu nañu nu lool , ngir bokk ci ñiy yónnee ndimbal gaayi Yàlla yi .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Te yemuñu sax ci li nu séentu woon ci ñoom , waaye dañoo jébbal seen bopp Boroom bi jëkk , gannaaw loolu ñu jébbal nu seen bopp ci coobareg Yàlla .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Looloo tax nag nu sant Tit , mu ñëw àggale ci yéen , ni mu tàmbalee woon , seen jëfu ndimbal .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Gannaaw nag wone ngeen cawarte gu tollu noonu , ci ngëm , ci wax , ci xam - xam , ci farlu gu mat , ak ci seen mbëggeel ci nun , sawareleen noonu it ci jëfu ndimbal lii .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Du ndigal lu ma leen di jox , waaye dama leen di yégal cawarteg ñi ci des , ngir natt fu seen mbëggeel tollu .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Ndaxte yiwu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist umpu leen , ni mu futtee am - amam , ba ñàkk ngir yéen , ndax ngeen woomle cig ñàkkam .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Kon lii laa xalaat ci lu baax ci yéen : yéen ñi nga xam ne tàmbaliwuleen a jëf rekk , waaye yéena jëkk a am yéene jii daaw ,

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: yeggaleleen ko léegi . Noonu li ngeen mottali ci seen man - man tolloo ak yéene , ji ngeen amoon ci seen mébét .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Ndaxte joxe , bu àndee ak yéene , Yàlla dina ko nangu , di seet li nu am te bañ a seet li nu amul .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Bëgguma leen a teg soxla , ngir woyofal ñi ci des , waaye na ñépp tolloole .

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: Tey jii nag man ngeen sàkk ci li ngeen barele , faj soxlay ñeneen , ngir ëllëg it bareleg ñooña faj seen soxla . Noonu ñépp tolloole .

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: Moom la Mbind mi tëral ne : « Ki dajale lu bare ëpplewul dara , te ki dajale tuuti ñàkkul . »

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Cant ñeel na Yàlla , moom mi def ci xolu Tit cawarte gu mel ni sunu gos ci yéen !

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Bi nu ko laajee , mu ñëw ci yéen , nangu na , te rax - ca - dolli cawarteem tollu na , ba nu man a wax ne , ci coobarey boppam la jóge , jëm ci yéen .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Yónniwaale nanu ak moom mbokk , mi am tur wu rafet ci mboolooy ñi gëm ñépp ndax li muy waare xebaaru Kirist .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: Te sax mbooloo yi ñoo ko tànn , ngir mu ànd ak nun , bu nuy yóbbu ndimbal li ngir ndamu Boroom bi , te mu firndeel sunu yéene ju rafet .

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Def nanu noonu nag , ndax kenn bañ noo ŋàññ ci ni nuy topptoo ndimbal lu yaatu loolu .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Danuy fexee def li jub , du ci kanam Yàlla rekk , waaye it ci kanam nit ñi .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Yónniwaale nanu it sunu mbokk , mi nu seetlu cawarteem ay yooni yoon ci fànn yu bare , te mu gën koo fésal bii yoon ndax kóolute gu réy , gi mu am ci yéen .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Noonu kon ci lu jëm ci Tit , sama nawle la ci liggéey , bi ci seen biir . Ci lu jëm ci sunu bokk , yi ànd ak moom nag , ndawi mbooloom ñi gëm lañu , ñuy wone ndamu Kirist .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Na seen teeru firndeel nag seen mbëggeel ci kanamu mboolooy ñi gëm , te dëggal leen ne , noo yey wóolu leen .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Ci mbirum ndimbal loolu jëm ci gaayi Yàlla yi , matul ma leen di bindaat ,

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: ndaxte xam naa seen yéene ju rafet , te maa ngi ciy damu ci kanamu waa Maseduwan , naan leen : « Daaw fekk na waa Akayi jekk . » Te seen cawarte xamb na ñu bare ci ñoom .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Maa ngi yónni nag bokk yooyu , ngir damu gi nu doon damu ci yéen ci mbir mii bañ a neen , te ngeen jekk , ni ma ko waxe woon .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Danoo bañ rekk waa Maseduwan , ñiy ànd ak man , fekk jekkaguleen ; te kon kóolute googu nu am ci yéen dina nekk sunu gàcce , waxaalewuma nag seen bos .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Moo tax ma xalaat ne , li gën mooy yónni bokk yooyu , ñu jiitu ma ci yéen , topptoo mbiri ndimbal lu yaatu loolu ngeen dige woon . Loolu di may gu tàlli , te bañ a nekk yëfi nay .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Te lii moo am : ku ji tuuti , góob tuuti ; ku ji lu bare , góob lu bare .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Kon na ku nekk joxe , ni mu ko nase ci xolam , te bañ cee am réccu walla sañul - bañ , ndaxte kiy joxe ak mbég moo neex Boroom bi .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Te Yàlla man na leen a woomal ci bépp yiwam ba ci fépp ak ci lépp , ngeen faj seen soxla yépp te sakkanle it ngir bépp jëf bu baax .

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: Moom la Mbind mi wax ne : « Tabe na , ba may baadoolo yi ; njubteem day sax ba fàww . »

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Yàlla miy jox beykat bi jiwu ak nit ab dund , dina leen jox jiwu wu ne gàññ , te sakkanal li seen njub meññ .

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Noonu dingeen woomle ci lépp , ba yéwén ci bépp anam , ba tax ñu bare gërëm Yàlla ndax li ngeen maye jaarale ko ci nun .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Ndaxte njaamu , gi ngeen di jaamu , yemul rekk ci faj soxlay gaayi Yàlla yi , waaye dina tax it ngërëmu ñu bare baawaan , jëm ci Yàlla .

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: Ci li ngeen firndeel seen mbëggeel ci joxe ndimbal lii , dinañu màggal Yàlla , ndaxte wone ngeen ni ngeen déggale xebaar bu baax bu Kirist bi , ak ni ngeen yéwéne ci seen ndimbal jëme ci ñoom ak ñépp .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Rax - ca - dolli dinañu sant Yàlla ak xol bu fees ak cofeel ci yéen ndax yiw wu mag , wi Yàlla def ci yéen .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Jërë - jëfati yaw Yàlla ndax sa may googu weesu dayo !

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Ci lu jëm ci samay mbir nag , maa ngi leen di ñaan — man Pool , mi ñu ne , ci seen biir « ragal » laa , bu ma leen soree , « ñeme , » — maa ngi leen di ñaan ndax woyof ak lewetaayu Kirist , ngir bu ma ñëwee , ma bañ a ànd ak ñeme gi may dencal ñenn ñiy xalaat ne , gis - gisu nit lanu topp .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Dëgg la ne nit rekk lanu , waaye dunu xeexe ni nit .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: Ndaxte gànnaay , yi nuy xaree , jógewuñu ci nit , waaye ca Yàlla lañu jóge , te ànd ak kàttan , ngir daaneel ay tata . Danuy daaneel xalaat yi dul dëgg

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: ak bépp tiitar buy jànkoonteek xam - xamu Yàlla , te danuy noot bépp xalaat , ba mu déggal Kirist .

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Te fas yéene nanoo jubbanti képp ku déggadi , bés bu seen dégg ndigal matee .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Xool - leen mbir mi ne fàŋŋ . Bu amee ku mu wóor ne , ci Kirist la bokk , na jàpp it ne , su bokkee ci Kirist , nun itam ci Kirist lanu bokk .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Awma lu may rus , su may damu lu ëpp ci sañ - sañ bi nu Boroom bi jox , di sañ - sañu yokk seen ngëm , te du ngir seen kasara .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Ba tey bëgguma ngeen xalaat ne , maa ngi leen di xëbal ci samay bataaxal .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Ndaxte am na ku naan : « Ay bataaxalam dañoo ñagas te am doole , waaye bu teewee dafay ñàkk fulla , di wax waxi picc . »

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Kiy wax loolu na xam lii : ni sunuy kàddu mel ci sunuy bataaxal , bu nu fa nekkul , noonu it lanuy mel ci sunuy jëf , bu nu teewee .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Ñemewunoo féetele walla mengale sunu bopp ak ñooñu naw seen bopp . Ci li ñuy sàkk ab natt ngir natt ak mengale seen bopp ak seen bopp , ñàkk xel a tax .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Nun nag dunu damu ci lu weesu dayo . Nu ngi damu ci liggéey bi nu Yàlla sas , ba may nu , nu agsi ci yéen .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Bu sunu sas agsiwul woon ba ci yéen , kon man nanoo ne , génn nanu sas wi nu Yàlla sas . Waaye agsi na ba ci yéen , te indil nanu leen xebaar bu baax bi jëm ci Kirist .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: Kon nag dunu jéggi dig yi Yàlla rëdd , bay damu ci liggéeyu ñeneen . Waaye am nanu yaakaar ne , su seen ngëm yokkoo , dinanu gën a màgg ci seen biir , des ba tey ci dig yi nu Yàlla rëddal .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Noonu dinanu man a yégle xebaar bu baax bi ci bérab , yi leen féete gannaaw , te bañ a damu ci li ñeneen ñi def ci seen sas .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Waaye ni ko Mbind mi waxe : « Kuy damu , na damu ci Boroom bi . »

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Ndaxte ki neex Yàlla , du ki naw boppam , waaye ki Yàlla gërëm .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Céy bu ngeen ma manoon a muñal , ma wax leen tuuti waxi dof ! Waaw muñal - leen ma sax .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Dama leen di fiire ak fiiraange gu jóge ca Yàlla , ndaxte dama leen a bëgg a jébbal jenn jëkkër kepp , muy Kirist , ngeen set ni janq .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Waaye ni jaan ja naxe woon Awa ci pexeem , ragal naa yéen itam ñu lëmbaaje ni seen xel , ba ngeen dëddu xol bu laab , bi ngeen amoon ci seen diggante ak Kirist .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Ndaxte bu kenn ñëwee , di leen waar ci Yeesu ci lu juuyoo ak li nu leen yégal , walla ngeen jot meneen xel mu wuute ak Xel mi ngeen jot , walla ngeen nangu beneen xebaar bu wuute ak bi ngeen dégg , dingeen ko dékku bu baax .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Moona foog naa ne , seen ndaw yooyu ngeen yékkati , ba ñu ëpp ndaw sax , ëpplewuñu ma dara .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Bu ma dul jàmbaari wax it , néewuma xam - xam , te won nanu leen ko ci bépp mbir ak ci bépp fànn .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Walla boog ndax dama leen a tooñ ci li ma suufeel sama bopp ngir yékkati leen , ba ma leen di yégal xebaar bu baax bi te laajuma leen genn pey ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Xanaa kay damaa tooñ ci li ma dunde alalu yeneen mboolooy ñi gëm , ba futti leen , ngir dimbali leen , yéen .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Te ba ma nekkee ci yéen te soxla dab ma , wéeruwuma ci kenn ci yéen , ndaxte bokk ya jóge Maseduwan ñoo ma indil li ma soxla woon . Ci lépp moytu naa nekk yen ci yéen , te dinaa ko gën a def .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Ni mu wóore ne , dëggug Kirist nekk na ci man , ni la wóore ne loolii may damoo , kenn du ko teggi ci diiwaanu Akayi gépp .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: Lu tax ? Ndax dama leen a bëggul ? Yàlla xam na ne , bëgg naa leen !

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Noonu may doxale nag dinaa ci sax , ngir ñiy damu , di wut yoon wu ñu aw ba yemale seen bopp ak nun , duñu ko am .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Ay ndawi naaféq lañu , di ay liggéeykat yu njublaŋ yuy mbubboo turu ndawi Kirist .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Te loolu jaaxalu nu , ndaxte Seytaane moom ci boppam day mbubboo malaakam leer .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Kon nag ay ndawam mbubboo ndawi njub , loolu du nu jaaxal . Dees na leen fey seeni jëf .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Maa ngi leen koy waxaat : bu ma kenn jàpp nib dof . Walla boog bu ngeen ma ko jàppee , séddleen ma céru dof , ngir ma damu tuuti , man itam .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Loolu may wax nag , waxuma ko ci turu Boroom bi . Bu ma ñemee damoo nii , maa ngi wax ni dof .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Ndegam ñu bare dañuy damu ni nit kese , man itam kon dinaa damu .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Yéen boroom xel yi , aka ngeen a man a muñal ñi dof ,

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: nde yéena ngi muñ ñi leen di jaamloo , di lekk seen alal , di leen nax , di leen xeeb , di leen talaata !

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Sunu néew doole mayu nu , nu dem ba jëfe noonu ; rus naa ci lool de ! Ma wax waxi dof ; moona lépp lu waay ñemee damoo , ñeme naa ko , man it .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: Ndax Ibrë lañu ? Man it Ibrë laa . Ndax bànni Israyil lañu ? Man itam ci laa . Ndax sëti Ibraayma lañu ? Man itam moom laa .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: Ndax surgay Kirist lañu ? - - maa ngi wax waxi ku tàggoo ak sagoom nag — maa leen ko gën a doon . Bu dee ci liggéey , maa leen ci man . Bu dee ci li ñu nu tëj ci kaso , maa leen ko gën a miin . Bu dee ci li ñu nu dóor ay yar , maa leen ëpple . Leru naa dee ba tàyyi .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Juróomi yoon Yawut yi dóor nañu ma fanweeri yar ak juróom - ñeent .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Ñetti yoon dóorees na ma ay yet , te mas nañu maa sànni ay xeer , bëgg maa rey . Ñetti yoon dugg naa gaal , mu suux . Mas naa yendu ci ndox , fanaan ci .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Ci sama tukki yu bare yi daan naa faral di daje ak musiba ci dex yi , ak musiba ci sàcc yi , musiba mu jóge ci sama xeet walla ci ñi dul Yawut , musiba ci biir dëkk yi , ci màndiŋ yi , ci géej gi , ci biir bokki taalibe yu naaféq yi .

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Sonn naa , di ñaq , di fanaane xool , di xiif ak a mar tey fande , di dékku liw te rafle ,

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: waxaalewuma li ci des nag : bés bu nekk maa ngi xalaat mboolooy ñi gëm .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Ana ku ci néew doole , te wàlluma ko ? Ana ku ci bàkkaar , te awma naqar wu tiis ?

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Su ma damu waree kon , ci sama néew doole laay damoo .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Yàlla Baayu sunu Boroom Yeesu , moom mi màgg ba fàww , xam na ne , du ay fen ci man .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Ba ma nekkee dëkku Damas , boroom dëkk ba , di jawriñu buur ba Aretas , dafa santaane woon ñuy wottu dëkk ba , ngir man maa jàpp .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Waaye dugalees na ma ci dàmba , jaarale ma ci palenteeru miiri dëkk ba , yoor ma ci suuf . Noonu ma rëcc ko .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Damu amul jariñ , ba tey war na ma . Kon ma jàll ci nettali gis - gisi Boroom bi ak i peeñu .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Xam naa taalibeb Kirist boo xam ne yékkati nañu ko ba ca asamaan , si gën a kawe , booba ak léegi mat na fukki at ak ñeent . Xawma ndax ànd na ak jëmmam walla déet . Yàlla rekk a xam .

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: Xam naa ne , nit kooku yékkati nañu ko ba fa Yàlla nekk . Bu dee ci jëmmam mbaa ci xelam , xawma ; Yàllaa xam . Mu dégg fa baat yu ñu mënul a nettali te yu ñu mayul doom Aadama , mu ŋaaŋ ko .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Dinaa damu ci nit ku mel noonu . Waaye duma damu ci sama bopp , lu dul liy wone sama néew doole .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Su ma bëggoon a damu , du doon yëfi dof , ndaxte dëgg laay wax . Waaye damay moytoo damu , ngir kenn bañ a foog ci man lu weesu li mu gis , may def , te muy dégg , ma di ko wax .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Te it ngir ma bañ a yég sama bopp ndax peeñu yooyu wees xel , mayees na mbir dal ma ci sama yaram , di ma metital ni dég , muy malaakam Seytaane mu may sonal , ngir ma bañ a yég sama bopp .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Ñaan naa Boroom bi ñetti yoon ci mbir moomu , ngir mu taqale ma ak moom .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Waaye mu ne ma : « Sama yiw doy na la ; sama kàttan a ngi mate cig néew doole . » Kon nag dëgg - dëgg , gën na maa bég ci damu ndax sama néew doole , ngir kàttanu Kirist dëkk ci man .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
