text2: Looloo tax may bég ci néew doole , yi may wéye ngir turu Kirist , ciy tiis , ciy njàqare , mbaa ñu saaga ma , mbaa ñu fitnaal ma . Ndaxte bu ma néewee doole , booba laay am kàttan .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Ci dëgg - dëgg wax naa waxi dof te yéena ma ci dugal , fekk yéen ci seen bopp sax yéena ma waroon a sargal , ndaxte su ma dul dara sax , seen ndaw yooyu ngeen naw ëpplewuñu ma dara .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Kéemaan yi , jaloore yi ak jëf yu màgg , yiy firndeel ndawul Kirist , feeñ nañu ci seen biir , ma ànd ci ak muñ gu mat .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Lan laa defal yeneen mboolooy ñi gëm te defaluma leen ko , xanaa rekk li ma wéeru ci ñoom te wéeruma ci yéen ? Baal - leen ma googu tooñ !

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Maa ngi leen di waaj a ganesi ñetteel bi yoon , te duma wéeru ci yéen . Wutsiwuma seen alal , yéen laa soxla . Ndaxte du gune moo war a yor waajuram , waaye waajur moo war a yor gune yi .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Man nag nangu naa joxe li ma am lépp ak xol bu sedd , ba joxe sama bopp sax , ngir dimbali leen . Gannaaw bëgg naa leen nii , xanaa kay seen mbëggeel ci man warul a wàññiku ?

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Kon noonu la , nekkuma woon yen ci yéen . Waaye man na am ñu naan , dama leen a nax , ba réeral leen ci sama njublaŋ .

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: Mbaa du damaa lekk seen alal , jaare ko ci kenn ci ñi ma yónni woon ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Sant naa Tit , mu ñëw ci yéen , te yebal naa sunu mbokk moomu ak moom . Ndax Tit dafa lekk seen alal ? Man ak moom , ndax bokkunu woon xel mu nu yékkati ak tànk yu nuy dox ?

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: Xanaa diirub li ngeen di jàng lii , defe ngeen ne , nu ngi wut aw lay ci seen kanam . Samay xarit , nu ngi leen di wax ci kanam Yàlla ak ci turu Kirist ; te lépp ngir seen njariñ la .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Ragal naa , bu ma ñëwee ci yéen , fekk leen nu ma neexul , te yéen it ngeen fekk ma nu leen neexul . Ragal naa fekk ay xuloo ci seen biir , ak ñeetaane , xadar ak diiroo mbagg , xas ak jëw , réy - réylu ak yengu - yengu .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Ragal naa , bu ma leen ganesiwaatee , Yàlla sama Boroom suufeel ma ci seen biir , ma naqarlu ci ñu bare ñu bàkkaaroon te dëdduwuñu seen yàqute , seen njaaloo ak seen ñaawteef , gi ñu doon def .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Bii mooy ñetteel bi yoon , ma di leen ganesi . « Bépp àtte dina aju ci seedes ñaar walla ñetti nit . »

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Li ma waxoon ci sama ñaareelu ngan , ci ñi bàkkaaroon bu yàgg ak ñi ci des , maa ngi koy waxaat léegi , bala maa dikkaat : su ma dellusee , duma yërëm kenn .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Bu fekkee ne dangeen a bëgg firnde juy wone ne , Kirist mooy wax jaarale ko ci man , dingeen ko am . Digganteem ak yéen du ànd ak néew doole , waaye dafay feeñal kàttan ci seen biir .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Néewoon na doole , ba ñu koy daaj ca bant ngir rey ko , waaye mi ngi dund ci kàttanu Yàlla . Nun itam néew nanu doole ci sunu bokk ci moom , waaye dinanu dund ak moom ci kàttanu Yàlla , bu nuy jëfante ak yéen .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Xool - leen seen bopp bu baax , ba xam ndax ngëm a ngi ci yéen . Seetluleen seen bopp . Xanaa xamuleen ne , Yeesoo ngi ci yéen ? Walla boog ngeen gis ne , ay naaféq ngeen .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Waaye yaakaar naa ne dingeen gis ne , man nanoo wone nun , firndeg ngëm .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Nu ngi ñaan Yàlla , ngeen bañ a def dara lu bon . Waxuma ne danoo bëgg a wone noonu sunu firndeg ngëm , waaye sunu yéene mooy ngeen jëf lu baax , boo yaboo sax ñu jiiñ nu ag naaféq .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Ndaxte manalunu dara dëggu Yàlla gi ; mënunu lu dul taxawal ko .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Bu nu néewee doole , fekk am ngeen doole , bég nanu ci . Te sax nu ngi ñaan , ngeen jublu cig mat .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Looloo tax ma leen di binde nii , bala maa ñëw ; bëgguma leen a duma ci sañ - sañ bi ma Boroom bi jox . Jox na ma ko , ngir ma yokk seen ngëm , waaye du ngir seen kasara .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Kon nag bokk yi , bégleen , jublu cig mat , di déglu soññante bi ma leen di dénk , am benn xalaat te dëkk ci jàmm ; noonu Yàlla miy mbëggeel te di Yàllay jàmm dina ànd ak yéen .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Saafoonteleen ak xol bu laab .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Mboolem gaayi Yàlla yépp ñu ngi leen di nuyu .

text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love of God , and the communion of the Holy Ghost , be with you all . Amen .
text2: Na yiwu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist , ak mbëggeelu Yàlla ak booloo , gi nu am ak Xel mu Sell mi , ànd ak yéen ñépp .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Man Pool , ndawul Yeesu Kirist - - nit falu ma ko , te jaarewul it ci nit , mi ngi jaare ci Yeesu Kirist ak Yàlla Baay , bi ko dekkal —

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: man ak bokk yiy ànd ak man yépp , nu ngi leen di bind , yéen mboolooy ñi gëm te dëkk ci diiwaanu Galasi .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Na yiw ak jàmm féete ak yéen , jóge ci Yàlla sunu Baay ak Yeesu Kirist Boroom bi ,

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: moom mi joxe bakkanam ngir dindi sunuy bàkkaar , te musal nu ci àddina su bon , si nu nekk , dëppook coobareg Yàlla sunu Baay ,

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: bi yelloo ndam ba fàww . Amiin .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Man de jaaxle naa ! Yàlla woo na leen ci boppam jaarale ko ci yiw , wi nu Kirist defal , waaye yéena ngi koy gaawantoo bàyyi , ngir topp beneen xebaar ,

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: fekk du xebaar bu baax bi . Dafa am rekk ci seen biir ay nit ñiy nëxal xel yi , te bëgg a dandal xebaar bu baax bu Kirist .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Waaye su fekkee kenn ci nun ñëw , walla malaaka sax mu jóge asamaan , di yégle beneen xebaar bu mengoowul ak bi nu leen yégal , kooku Yal na alku !

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Wax nanu ko , maa ngi koy waxaat : bu leen kenn yégalee beneen xebaar bu dul bi ngeen nangu , kooku Yal na alku !

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Ndax kon nit laay wut a gëmloo , am damay fexee yey Yàlla ? Mbaa damay wut a neex nit ñi ? Su ma doon wut a neex nit ñi ba tey , kon duma nekkati jaamu Kirist .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Bokk yi , maa ngi leen di xamal ne , xebaar bu baax bi ma yégle , jógewul ci nit .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Jëlewuma ko ci nit , te kenn jàngalu ma ko , waaye Yeesu Kirist moo ma ko won .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Dégg ngeen ni ma doon jëfe , bi ma nekkee ci diiney Yawut yi , di fitnaal bu metti mbooloom Yàlla , di ko jéem a tas .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Bokkoon naa ci ñi gën a farlu ci diiney Yawut yi , te sawar it ci sàrti yoon , yi fi samay maam bàyyi , ba raw sama maas , gi ma bokkal askan .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Waaye Yàlla mi ma tànn lu jiitu sama juddu te woo ma ci boppam ci kaw yiwam , bi mu ko soobee , xamal na ma kan mooy Doomam , ngir ma yégal ñi dul Yawut xebaar bu baax bi ci mbirum Kirist ; booba nag diisoowuma ci ak kenn .

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Demuma sax Yerusalem seeti ñi ma jëkk a nekk ay ndawi Kirist , waaye réewu Arabi laa dem , te gannaaw loolu ma dellusiwaat Damas .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Ba ñu ca tegee ñetti at , ma sog a dem Yerusalem , ngir xamante ak Sefas , dal fa moom lu mat ñaari ayu - bés .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Waaye gisuma keneen ci ndaw yi ku dul Saag , doomu ndeyu Boroom bi .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Lii ma leen di bind nag , Yàllaa may seede ci ne , du ay fen .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Bi loolu wéyee dem naa réewu Siri ak réewu Silisi .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Waaye ba tey mboolooy ñi gëm Kirist ci diiwaanu Yude xamuñu ma woon .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Dañu déggoon ñu naan rekk ne : « Ki nu daan fitnaal bu jëkk te daan jéem a far yoonu ngëm wi , léegi mi ngi koy yégle ! »

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Te ñuy sant Yàlla ci man .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Ba ñu ca tegee fukki at ak ñeent , ànd naa ak Barnabas , dellu Yerusalem , yóbbaale Tit .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Dem naa fa , ndaxte Yàllaa ma fa yebal ci kaw peeñu . Ba ma demee , daje naa ak ñi ñu gën a fonk ca mbooloo ma , ma wéetoo ak ñoom , won leen xebaar bu baax , bi may yégal ñi dul Yawut ; ngir ragal sama coonob démb mbaa tey neen .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Te Tit mi ma gunge woon sax de , li mu bokk ci xeetu Gereg , taxul ñu sonal nu ci xarafal ko .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Fekk na mbir moomu nekk coow ndax naaféq , yi yoxoosu ci sunu biir ak mébét mu bon , ngir seet yaatu gi nu am ci Yeesu Kirist , ba fexe noo defaat ay jaam .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Waaye yaatalunu leen benn yoon , ngir dëggug xebaar bu baax bi man a sax ci yéen .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Waaye ñi ñu gën a fonk - - ak lu man a doon seen sag xooluma ko , ñépp a yem fa kanam Yàlla — waaye ñooñu ñu teg njiit boog , bi ma dajee ak ñoom , yokkuñu dara ci sama sas .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Gis nañu ne , Yàllaa nu yebal , muy man di Piyeer , ngir nu yégle xebaar bu baax bi ; ma féetewoo ñi dul Yawut , Piyeer féetewoo Yawut yi .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Ndaxte ni Yàlla jëfe ci Piyeer , miy ndawam ci Yawut yi , noonu it la jëfe ci man , may ndawam ci ñi dul Yawut .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Te Saag , Sefas ak Yowaana nag , ñi ñu teg kenuy mbooloo mi , bi ñu ràññee yen bi ma Yàlla jagleel ci yiwam , ñu fekksi nu ci , ba jox nu loxo , man ak Barnabas , nu liggéey ca ña dul Yawut , ñoom ñu liggéey ca Yawut ya .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Li ñu doon laaj rekk moo di , nuy fàttaliku seen aji néew doole yi , fekk sax laxasu woon naa ci def ko .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Waaye bi Sefas ñëwee dëkku Ancos , yedd naa ko ci kanamu ñépp , ndaxte li mu def jaaduwul .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Ndaxte laata ndaw yi Saag yónni di ñëw , da daan bokk di lekk ak ñi dul Yawut . Waaye bi ñu agsee , te mu ragal kureel boobu faaydaal xaraf , mu dellu gannaaw , di sore ñi dul Yawut .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Yeneen Yawut yi it daldi ànd ak Sefas ci naaféqam , ba yóbbaale sax Barnabas .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Bi ma seetee nag ne , awuñu woon ci dëgg , gi xebaar bu baax bi di jàngale , ma yedd Sefas ci kanamu ñépp ne ko : « Yaw miy Yawut , gannaaw dëddu nga aaday Yawut yi , ba dund ni ku dul Yawut , lu tax nga bëgg a sëf diiney Yawut ci ñi dul Yawut ? »

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Nun danoo cosaanoo ci xeetu Yawut , te bokkunu ci xeet , yi xamul Yàlla tey bàkkaar .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Teewul nu xam ne , Yàlla du àtte kenn ni ku jub ci kaw sàmm yoon , waaye ci gëm Yeesu Kirist . Kon nun itam gëm nanu Kirist Yeesu , ngir Yàlla àtte nu jub ci kaw gëm Kirist , te du ci sàmm yoon . Ndaxte du caageenug sàmm yoon mooy tax Yàlla àtte kenn ni ku jub .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Waaye ba tey su fekkee ne nu ngi wut a jub ci kaw gëm Kirist , fekk nu ne fàŋŋ di ay bàkkaarkat , ndax nag Kirist moo sas bàkkaar ? Mukk !

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Waaye su ma delloo di sàmm ndigali yoon , yi ma bàyyi , dëgg - dëgg dinaa wone noonu ne , moykatu yoon wi laa .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Ci li jëm ci yoonu Musaa , dee naa , fekk yoon wi ci boppam moo ko waral , ngir ma man a dund , ba amal jariñ Yàlla .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Daajaale nañu ma ak Kirist ca bant ba , te noonu du man may dundati , waaye Kirist mooy dund ci man . Dundu mbindeef , gi may dund nag , maa ngi koy dund ci gëm Doomu Yàlla ji , moom mi ma bëgg , ba joxe bakkanam ngir man .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Duma neenal yiwu Yàlla , ndaxte su sàmm yoon doon tax a jub fa kanam Yàlla , kon Kirist dee na cig neen .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: Yéen waa Galasi , yéena ñàkk xel ! Ku leen fàbbi , gannaaw bi ma leen yégalee ci lu leer ni ñu daaje Yeesu Kirist ca bant ba ?

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Lenn rekk laa bëgg , ngeen wax ma ko : ndax sàmm yoon wee tax , ngeen jot Xelum Yàlla ? Déedéet ! Dangeen a dégg xebaar bu baax bi te gëm ko .

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Mbaa du nii ngeen ñàkke xel , ba tàmbalee ci Xelum Yàlla , ba noppi yaakaar a mate ci seen jëfi bopp ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Mbaa du fitna , yi ngeen daj yépp , dafa nar a neen ? Mënuma koo gëm !

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Bu leen Yàlla di may Xelam , di leen won jalooreem , ndax li ngeen sàmm yoon a tax , mu def ko , mbaa li ngeen dégg xebaar bu baax te gëm ko ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Xool - leen ci Ibraayma ; Mbind mi wax na ne : « Ibraayma gëm na Yàlla , te Yàlla jàppe ngëmam ni njub . »

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Xamleen boog ne , boroom ngëm yi rekk ñooy doomi Ibraayma .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Mbind mi tëral na lu jiitu ne , Yàlla dina àtte jub ñi dul Yawut ci kaw ngëm . Kon looloo tax mu yégal Ibraayma lu jiitu xebaar bu baax bi ne ko : « Xeeti àddina yépp dinañu barkeel ci yaw . »

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Kon ñi gëm , Yàlla dina leen barkeel , sukkandikoo ko ci seen ngëm , ni mu defal Ibraayma , boroom ngëm .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Ñiy wékku ñépp ci jëfi yoon wi , ñu alku lañu , ndaxte bind nañu ne : « Képp ku dul topp lépp lu ndigali yoon wi santaane , Yal na alku . »

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Bir na sax ne , sàmm yoon du tax kenn jub fa kanam Yàlla , ndaxte Mbind mi tëral na ne : « Ku jub ci kaw ngëm dinga dund . »

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Waaye yoon wi laajul ngëm . Mbind mi nee na : « Ku manoon a matal li yoon wi wax , kon dinga dund ba fàww . »

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Waaye Kirist jot na nu ci alkande , ji yoon wi indi ; mu gàddul nu ko , ba far alku moom ci boppam , ndaxte Mbind mi nee na : « Képp ku ñu rey , wékk ko ci bant , alku nga . »

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Noonu barke bi Yàlla dig Ibraayma baawaan na , ba daj ñi dul Yawut te gëm Kirist Yeesu , te nu jot ci kaw ngëm Xel mu Sell , mi Yàlla dige .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Bokk yi , maa ngi misaal wax ji ci jëfi doom Aadama . Xam ngeen ne , kóllëre gu ñu fas ba noppi , waruñu koo fecci , walla ñu ciy rax dara .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Léegi nag Yàlla am na lu mu dig Ibraayma ak askanam . Mbind mi waxul : « Ak i sëtam , » mu mel ni ñu bare , waaye kenn la wax : « Ak sa askan , » maanaam Kirist .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Li ma ci bëgg a wax mooy lii : ndegam Yàlla fas na kóllëreem , yoonu Musaa , wi feeñ ñeenti téeméeri at ak fanweer gannaaw ga , du ko man a fecci , ba tebbi digeb Yàlla .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Ndaxte xéewal , yi Yàllay dige , bu ñu doon jóge ci yoon wi , kon ajootuñu ci dige bi , fekk ci kaw dige la ko Yàlla maye Ibraayma .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Waaw kon yoonu Musaa , luy jariñam ? Dañu koo wàcceel nit ñi , ngir seen jàdd yoon ne fàŋŋ . Looloo doon wàllu yoon wi , ba kera Sët biy ñëw , moom mi ñu digoon dige bi . Yoon wi nag , Yàlla tëral na ko jaare ci ay malaaka , te am na ku ko jottali .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Waaye aajowul jottalikat , su fi kenn rekk teewee , te Yàlla kenn la .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Ndax kon yoonu Musaa wi dafa juuyoo ak li Yàlla dige ? Mukk ! Su amoon yoon wu nit man a sàmm , ba mu jural ko dund gu sax , kon sàmm yoon dina tax nit jub fa kanam Yàlla .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Waaye yoon wi tëj na ñépp ci dooley bàkkaar , ngir ñi gëm Yeesu Kirist jot li Yàlla dige woon ci seen kaw ngëm .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Bi ngëm Yeesu Kirist feeñagul nag , yoon wi da noo tëjoon ràpp , ba kera ngëm di feeñ .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Ci noonu la nu yoon wi doon noote , ba Kirist di ñëw , ngir Yàlla àtte nu jub ci kaw ngëm .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Waaye léegi , bi jamonoy ngëm ji ñëwee , nekkatunu ci kilifteefu yoon wi .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Yéen ñépp doomi Yàlla ngeen ndax li ngeen bokk ci Kirist Yeesu ci kaw ngëm .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Yéen ñépp , ñi ñu sóob ci ndox ngir wone seen bokk ci Kirist , soloo ngeen Kirist .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Kon nag amul xaajale ci diggante Yawut ak ki dul Yawut , ci diggante jaam ak gor , ci diggante góor ak jigéen . Yéen ñépp benn ngeen ci seen bokk ci Kirist .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Bu ngeen bokkee ci Kirist , kon bokk ngeen ci askanu Ibraayma , te jot ngeen xéewal , yi ko Yàlla dig .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Li ma leen di wax , mooy lii : doom ji war a donni baayam , fi ak mu ngi cig ndaw , ak lu ko alal jiy lew lépp , du wuute dara ak jaam .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Ñi ko yore tey sàmm alalam ñoo koy yilif , ba jamono ji ko baayam àppaloon mat .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Nun itam naka noonu , laata nuy mat , aaday àddina ñoo nu nootoon , ba def nu ni ay jaam .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Waaye bi àpp bi Yàlla tëraloon matee , yónni na Doomam , mu juddoo ci jigéen , ci biir yoonu Musaa ,

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: ngir jot ñi yoon wi nootoon , ndax Yàlla jàpp nu ni ay doomam .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Gannaaw doomi Yàlla ngeen nag , Yàlla yónni na Xelu Doomam ci sunu xol , mu koy wooye nii : « Abba , » maanaam « Baay . »

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Noonu dootuloo jaam , doom nga . Te ndegam doom nga , Yàlla jagleel na la cér ci xéewal , yi mu dencal ay doomam .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Bu jëkk , bi ngeen xamagul Yàlla , yéena ngi doon jaamu yeneen yu ñu daan bokkaaleel Yàlla .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Waaye léegi nag bi ngeen xamee Yàlla , walla boog bi leen Yàlla xàmmee , nan ngeen man a def , bay delluwaat ca aaday àddina ? Aada yooyee ñàkk doole te ñàkk njariñ , lu tax ngeen bëgg , ñu nootaat leen ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Yéena ngi fonk bés yi , weer yi , màggal yi ak at yi !

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Sama xel dalul ci yéen , ngir ragal sama coono ci yéen neen .

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Bokk yi , dama leen di ñaan , ngeen mel ni man , ndaxte man itam fekksi naa leen ci seen xalaat . Tooñuleen ma .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Xam ngeen ne , sama wopp moo taxoon , ma yégal leen xebaar bu baax bi .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Coono , gi leen sama wopp tegoon , taxul ngeen bañ ma , taxul ngeen séexlu ma . Waaye teeru ngeen ma , ni bu ngeen doon teeru malaakam Yàlla walla Yeesu Kirist .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Waaw , fan la seen mbég jaar ? Ndaxte seedeel naa leen ne , su ngeen ko manoon , kon luqi ngeen seeni bët , jox ma .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Ndax dëgg , gi ma leen wax , moo tax ngeen def ma ab noon ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Nit ñooñu leen di farle , seen mébét baaxul . Dañu leen a bëgg a tàggale ak nun , ngir ngeen far ak ñoom .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Farle baax na , bu àndee ak mébét mu baax . Waaye bu sama jëmm rekk tax ngeen koy def .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Sama doom yi ! Yéena tax may dellu ci metit ni kuy matu , ba kera jikkoy Kirist di mat ci yéen .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Léegi bëggoon naa nekk ci seen biir , ngir man a jubbanti sama kàddu , ndaxte xamatuma nu may doxale ak yéen !

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Yéen ñi bëgg a topp yoon wi , xanaa xamuleen li yoonu Musaa wi wax ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Mbind mi nee na : Ibraayma am na ñaari doom ; ki jaam bi jur ak ki gor si jur .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Doomu jaam bi juddu na ni bépp doom , waaye doom , ji mu am ak jabaram , juddu na ci kaw digeb Yàlla .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Loolu nag am na lu muy misaal . Ñaari jigéen ñi dañoo bijji ñaari kóllëre . Benn bi di Ajara , mooy wone kóllëre , gi Yàlla fasoon ca tundu Sinayi . Ay jaam lay jur .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Ajara moomu mooy tundu Sinayi , wi nekk ca réewu Arabi . Te it mooy misaalu dëkku Yerusalem , bi fi nekk tey . Ndaxte moom ak ay doomam yépp ay jaam lañu .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Waaye Yerusalem , ga ca kaw , mooy gor si . Moom mooy sunu ndey .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Ndaxte Mbind mi nee na : « Bégal , yaw jigéen ji dul jur , te musul a am doom . Reeyal te bànneexu , yaw mi musul a xam coonob mat , ndaxte jigéen ji ñu faalewulmoo gën a jaboot ki nekk ak jëkkëram . »

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Yéen bokk yi , yéenay doom yi ñu dige woon , niki Isaaxa .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Waaye doom ji juddoo ni bépp doom , dafa daan sonal doom ji juddoo ci dooley Xelum Yàlla . Te loolu mooy law ba léegi .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Lu ci Mbind mi wax nag ? Nee na : « Dàqal jaam bi ak doomam , ndaxte doomu jaam bi warul a bokk cér ak doomu gor si ci ndono . »

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Kon nag bokk yi , nun dunu doomi jaam , ay doomi gor lanu .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Kirist a nu daggal sunu buumi njaam , ngir goreel nu . Kon dëgërleen ci seen ngor te bañ a delluwaat ci njaam .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Dégluleen ! Man Pool maa leen koy wax : bu ngeen itteelee xaraf , kon Kirist dootu leen jariñ dara .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Te maa ngi dellu di waxaat ne , képp kuy farataal xaraf , fàww nga sàmm lépp lu yoon wi santaane .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Yéen ñiy fexee jub fa kanam Yàlla ci kaw sàmm yoon , tàggalikoo ngeen ak Kirist ; dëddu ngeen yiwu Yàlla .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Waaye njub , gi nu Yàlla dencal ëllëg , nu ngi koy séentu ci kaw ngëm ak ci ndimbalu Xelum Yàlla .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Ndaxte bu nu bokkee ci Kirist Yeesu , xaraf ak bañ a xaraf , dara amu ci solo ; li am solo mooy ngëm , giy jëf ci mbëggeel .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Ni ngeen jógtee woon de baax na ! Waaw ku leen dog , ba ngeen bañ a déggal dëgg ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Li ñu leen xiir jógewul ci Yàlla , mi leen woo .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Dees na ne : « Tuuti lawiir day tax tooyalu fariñ bépp funki . »

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Waaye teewul Boroom bi jox na ma kóolute ci yéen . Biral na ma ne , dingeen bokk ak man xalaat . Léegi nag , kiy nëxal seen xel , ku mu man a doon , Yàlla dina ko mbugal .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Man nag bokk yi , bu ma doon faaydaal xaraf ci sama waare , kon duñu ma fitnaale nii ; te it li may yégle ci deewu Kirist ca bant ba dootul naqari kenn .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Ñi farataal xaraf te di leen dëpp , nañu gën a sore ci seen réer : bu yaboo sax ñu dagg seen ngóora , ba dara du ci des !

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Yéen nag bokk yi , Yàlla woo na leen , ngeen nekk i gor . Waaye nag buleen ci sukkandiku , bay topp seen nafsu , waaye dimbaleenteleen ci kaw mbëggeel .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ndaxte yoon wépp , ndigal lii a ko tënk : « Nanga bëgg sa moroom , ni nga bëgge sa bopp . »

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Waaye moytuleen ! Bu ngeen dee màttante ak a lekkante , dingeen yàqante .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Li ma leen di wax mooy lii : dundleen ci Xelum Yàlla , kon dungeen topp seen nafsu .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Ndaxte sunu nafsu am na ay bëgg - bëgg yu mengoowul ak yu Xelum Yàlla . Te Xelum Yàlla itam am na ay bëgg - bëgg yu mengoowul ak yu sunu nafsu . Ñoom ñaar dañoo juuyoo ci bépp fànn , ba tax lépp lu ngeen bëggoon a def , dungeen ko man .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Waaye bu ngeen toppee Xelum Yàlla , nekkatuleen ci kilifteefu yoon wi .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Kuy topp sa nafsu , nii ngay jëfe : njaaloo , xalaat yu bon , def i ñaawteef ak say cér ,

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: xërëm , luxus , noonoo ak xuloo , ñeetaane , xadar , diiroo mbagg , féewaloo ak xaajaloo ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: kiñaan , màndite ak xawaare ak yeneen yu ni mel . Léegi nag maa ngi leen di artu , ni ma ko defe woon : ñiy jëfe noonu duñu am cér ci nguuru Yàlla .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Waaye li Xelu Yàlla mi di meññ mooy : mbëggeel , mbég , jàmm , muñ , laabiir , mbaax , kóllëre ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: lewetaay ak maandute . Yoon wi terewul yu ni mel .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Léegi ñi bokk nag ci Yeesu Kirist , daaj nañu seen nafsu ca bant ba , wacc ko fa , moom ak ay xemmemam ak ay bëgg - bëggam .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Gannaaw nag nu ngi dund léegi ci Xelum Yàlla , kon nanu ko topp .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Bu nu tiitaru di dëkkante , di iñaanante .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Bokk yi , ku ñu fekk muy def lu Yàlla bëggul , yéen ñi topp Xelum Yàlla , nangeen ko jubbanti ak xol bu lewet . Waaye nanga sàmm sa bopp , ngir bàkkaar bañ laa fiir , yaw itam .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Jàppalanteleen , noonu dingeen sàmm yoon wi Kirist tëral .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Ndaxte kuy naagu te fekk doo dara , dangay nax sa bopp .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Na ku nekk seetlu ni muy beye sasam . Bu ko defee dina man a naw boppam , tey bañ di diirante mbagg ak ñi ci des .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Ndaxte ku ci nekk dangaa war a yenu sab yen .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Kiy jàng kàddug Yàlla war na sédd ki koy jàngal ci alalam jépp .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Bu leen ci dara nax ; kenn du fontoo Yàlla , ndaxte lu waay ji , moom ngay góob .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Ku ji ngir sa nafsu , dinga góob li sa nafsu meññ , maanaam ag yàqute . Waaye ku ji lu soloo ak Xelum Yàlla , li Xel mi meññ ngay góob , maanaam dund gu dul jeex .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Bunu tàyyi ci def lu baax , ndaxte bu nu ci sawaree , bu waxtu wi jotee dinanu jariñu .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Noonu fi ak nu koy man , nanuy defal ñépp lu baax , rawatina nag sunu bokk yi gëm .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Seetleen araf yu mag yii ma leen bind ci sama loxob bopp !

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Ñiy gistal ci seen yaram , ñooñoo bëgg ngeen xaraf , ngir ragal a daj fitna ci yégle deewu Kirist ca bant ba .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Kureel gi faaydaal xaraf , ñoom ci seen bopp sax , duñu topp yoon wi . Dañoo bëgg a ngeen xaraf , ba ñu man a bàkku ci seen yaram , yéen .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Man ci sama wàllu bopp , duma bàkku mukk su dul ci deewu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist , ba ñu ko daajee ca bant ba . Deeyam moo tax ma mel ni ku dee ci yëfi àddina ; yëfi àddina dee ci man .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Xaraf ak bañ a xaraf dara amu ci solo . Li am solo mooy nekk mbindeef mu bees .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Ñiy topp ndigal lii nag , na Yàlla wàcce jàmm ak yërmande ci ñoom , ak ci Israyilu Yàlla .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Léegi nag , bu ma kenn lëjalati , ndaxte yor naa ci sama yaram ay leget yuy màndargaal ne , jaamu Yeesu laa .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Bokk yi , na yiwu Yeesu Kirist sunu Boroom ànd ak seen xel . Amiin .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Man Pool , ndawul Kirist Yeesu ci coobareg Yàlla , maa leen di bind , yéen gaayi Yàlla yu sell yi te gëm Kirist Yeesu ci dëkku Efes .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Na leen Yàlla sunu Baay ak Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist may yiw ak jàmm .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Cant ñeel na Yàlla Baayu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist , mi nu sotti ci sunu bokk ci Kirist lépp luy barkeel ci baatin te nekk ca bérab yu kawe ya .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Ndaxte ba àddina sosoogul , tànn na nu ci Kirist , ngir nu man a teew fa kanamam , sell te ñàkk sikk . Ci kaw mbëggeelam

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: séddoo na nu lu jiitu , def nu ay doomam jaarale ko ci Yeesu Kirist , ndaxte looloo doon yéene ju rafet , ji mu tëral ci coobareem .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Na ndamam jolli ndax yiw wu réy , wi mu nu sotti ci Soppeem bi .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Moom jot na nu ak deretam ji ñu tuur , maanaam baal nu sunuy bàkkaar , ci kaw yiw wu yaatu ,

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: wi mu nu baawaanal . Te Yàlla sol na nu xel mu mat ak dégg ,

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: ci feeñal nu mbóoti coobareem , dëppook yéeneem ju rafet , ji mu jaarale ci Kirist .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Mu tëral ne , bu jamono yi wéyee ba lépp mat , dina dajale lépp ci kilifteefu Kirist , muy ci kaw , muy ci suuf .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Te am nanu cér ci moom bu nu Yàlla sédd lu jiitu ci dogalam , moom miy doxal lépp ci ni mu ko àttee ci coobareem .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Noonu nuy jollil ndamam , nun ñi jëkk a wékk sunu yaakaar ci Kirist .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Te yéen itam , bi ngeen déggee kàddug dëgg gi , di xebaar bu baax , bi leen tegtal yoonu mucc , te ngeen gëm ko , Yàlla tàmpe na leen ni ñoñam ak Xel mu Sell , mi mu dige woon .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Te Xel mi mooy dawal gi nu Yàlla jox ci cér , bi mu nu dencal , ba kera muy goreel ñi mu jotal boppam , te ñépp jollil ndamam .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Bi ma déggee nag seen ngëm ci Boroom bi Yeesu ak seen mbëggeel ci gaayi Yàlla yu sell yépp ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: duma noppee sant Yàlla , di leen boole ci samay ñaan .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Te li may ñaan Yàllay sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist , di Baay bi yelloo ndam , mooy lii : mu sol leen xel mu xóot , te xamal leen boppam

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: ci leeral seeni xol . Noonu dingeen xam yaakaaru ëllëg , ji leen Yàlla wooye , di ndam lu xel mënta daj , li nekk ci cér , bi mu dencal gaayam yu sell yi .

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Ngeen xam it , ni kàttanam màgge ba jéggi dayo , jëm ci nun ñi gëm , dëppook dooleem ju ràññiku ,

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: ji mu jëfe ci Kirist , ci li mu ko dekkal , dëël ko ci ndeyjooram ca bérab yu kawe ya ,

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: mu tiim lu sore malaaka yépp , muy kilifa , boroom sañ - sañ , boroom doole mbaa buur , te gën a màgg wépp tur wu ñu man a tudd , muy tey , muy ëllëg .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Yàlla suufeel na lépp fi kanamam , def ko kilifag lépp ci mbooloom ñi gëm ,

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: miy jëmmam , di matug Kirist , mi fees mbindeef mu ne ci fànn gu ne .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Te yéen itam Yàlla dekkal na leen , yéen ñi doon ndee fa kanamam ci seeni moy ak seeni bàkkaar .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Ci biir yooyu ngeen doon dund démb , topp doxalinu àddina , tey déggal kilifag boroom sañ - sañ yi ci jaww ji , di xel mu bon miy jëf ci kureelu ñi déggadil Yàlla .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Te nun it booba àndoon nanu ak ñoom ca seen dund ga , di topp sunu bakkan ciy wut bànneexi yaram ak coobarey xel . Noonu ci sunu bindu nit yeyoo nanu meru Yàlla , ni ña ca des .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Waaye Yàlla mi bare yërmande , ci kaw mbëggeel gu réy , gi mu am ci nun ,

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: dundalaat na nu ak Kirist , fekk ndee lanu woon fa kanamam ci sunuy bàkkaar — ci kaw yiwu Yàlla ngeen mucce .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Te dekkal na nu ak Kirist Yeesu , dëël nu ak moom ca bérab yu kawe ya .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: Noonu ba fu jamono yem , dina lañal fi sunu kanam yiwam wu réy wi xel mënta takk , jaar ci baaxaay gi mu nu won ci Kirist Yeesu .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Ndaxte ci yiwu Yàlla ngeen mucce ci kaw ngëm , te loolu jógewul ci yéen , mayu Yàlla la ;

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: du peyu jëf , ngir kenn du ci kañu .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Ndaxte jëfu Yàlla lanu ; moo nu bind ci Kirist Yeesu , ngir nu wéy ci jëf yu rafet , yi mu nu fàgguloon ca njàlbéen ga .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Kon nag yéen ñi dul Yawut cib juddu , yéen ñi xaraful , te ñi xaraf ci seen yaram ci loxol nit ñoo leen teg ay yéefar , fàttalikuleen lii :

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: booba amuleen woon benn cér ci Kirist , mbaa benn baat ci kureelu bànni Israyil . Bokkuleen woon ci kóllëre , gi Yàlla fas ak ñoom , te ëmb dige ya . Amuleen woon jenn yaakaar mbaa benn xam - xamu Yàlla ci àddina .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Waaye léegi ci seen bokk ci Kirist Yeesu , yéen ñi sore woon jege ngeen ndax deretu Kirist ji ñu tuur .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Ndaxte mooy sunu jàmm , moom mi jël Yawut ak ki dul Yawut , def nu benn . Ñag bi doxoon sunu diggante te sosoon sunu dëngoo , moo ko màbb ci li mu joxe yaramam ,

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: far noonu yoonu Musaa , muy ndigal ya ak dogal ya . Noonu la nu jële , Yawut ak ki dul Yawut , def nu benn ci moom , ba nu jàmmoo .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Te nun ñaar , ñi def benn jëmm , jubale na nu ak Yàlla ci dee , gi mu dee ca bant ba ñu ko daajoon , dindee noonu sunu tongoonte .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Bi mu ko defee mu ñëw , yégalsi nu xebaaru jàmm fa kanam Yàlla , yéen ñi sore woon ak nun ñi jege .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Ndaxte nun ñaar ñépp am nanu bunt ci Yàlla Baay bi , jaar ci Kirist , ci ndimbalu menn Xel mu Sell mi .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Noonu dootuleen ay doxandéem mbaa ay gan , waaye am ngeen baat ci kureelu gaayi Yàlla yu sell yi , te waa këram ngeen .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Yéena ngi sukkandikoo ci fondamaa , bi ndawi Kirist yi ak yonent yi tabax , te Kirist Yeesu ci boppam di doju dalil wa .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Ci moom la doj yépp ràbbloo , ba tabax bi jóg , di màggalukaay bu sell ngir Boroom bi .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Te ci seen bokk ci Kirist , Yàlla boole na leen tabax yéen itam , ba ngeen nekk dëkkukaayam , jaar ci Xel mu Sell mi .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Kon nag maa ngi leen di ñaanal , man Pool mi ñu tëj kaso ci turu Kirist ndax sas wi may bey ci yéen , xeet yi dul Yawut .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Wóor na ma ne , dégg ngeen yenub xamle yiwu Yàlla , bi mu ma jagleel jëm ci yéen .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Yàlla feeñu na ma , xamal ma mbóoti mbir mi mu tëral , ni ma leen ko binde ci kàddu yu néew .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Bu ngeen jàngee loolu , dingeen man a xam bu wér dégg , gi ma am ci mbóoti mbiri Kirist .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Ci jamono yu weesu , loolu kumpa la woon ci doom Aadama , waaye léegi Yàlla feeñalal na ko ay ndawam ak yonentam yu sell yi , jaarale ko ci Xel mu Sell mi .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Mbir mi nii la tëdde : léegi xeet yi dul Yawut dañoo bokksi cér ak Yawut yi , bokk ak ñoom jenn jëmm , bokk wàll ci xéewal yi Yàlla dige ci Kirist Yeesu , te xebaar bu baax bi xamle ko .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Xamle xebaar bu baax boobu nag , Yàlla fal na ma ci jawriñ ci kaw yiwam , te di ma dooleel ci kàttanam .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: May na ma , man mi gën a tuuti ci gaayi Yàlla yu sell yi , may xebaar xeeti àddina barkeel yu xel dajul yi ci Kirist ;

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: te it may sulli melokaanu mbir mu xóot mi Yàlla tëral , te doon kumpa njàlbéen ga ba tey ci moom , mi sos lépp .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Waaye léegi nee na fàŋŋ , ngir kilifa yi ak boroom sañ - sañ yi ca bérab yu kawe ya man a xam ni Xelum Yàlla xóote , jaar ci li ñu gis ci mbooloom ñi gëm Kirist .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Mooy dogal bi sax dàkk , te Yàlla tëral ko ci Kirist Yeesu sunu Boroom .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Ci turam am nanu kóolute fa kanam Yàlla , ak bunt bu yaatu ci moom ci kaw ngëm .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Maa ngi leen di ñaan nag , ngeen bañ a yoqi ndax coono , yi may jële ci bey sama sas ci yéen , xam ne coono yooyu ñoo leen di jural ndam .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Moo tax maa ngi sukk , jublu ci Yàlla Baay

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: biy cosaanul njaboot gépp , muy ci kaw , muy ci suuf .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Ma di ko ñaan , mu may leen , ci kaw ndamam lu amul kem , Xel mu Sell mi feddali seen baatin ak kàttan gu mag ,

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: ba Kirist dëkk ci seeni xol ci kaw ngëm . Te ngeen sax noonu te sampu ci mbëggeelu Yàlla ,

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: ba jagoo , yéen ak gaayi Yàlla yu sell yépp , guddaay ba , yaatuwaay ba , kawe ga ak xóotaay ba ,

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: te xam mbëggeelu Kirist , gi raw mépp xel . Noonu dingeen fees dell ak matug Yàlla .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Léegi nag , na ndam li féete ak Yàlla , mi man a yeggale lépp luy ñaan mbaa yéene , ba weesu ko fuuf , dëppook kàttan giy jëf ci nun ;

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: moo yelloo ndamul mbooloom ñi gëm jamonoy jamono ba fàww , jaar ci Kirist Yeesu . Amiin .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Man mi ñu tëj kaso ngir Boroom bi nag , maa ngi leen di dénk , ngeen dund dundin wu yellook wooteb Yàlla .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Ngeen woyof toyy te lewet , di muñalante tey baalante ci mbëggeel ,

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: te dem ba fu seen kàttan yem , ngeen likkoo ci jàmm , bay sàmm booloo gi leen Xelum Yàlla may .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Jenn jëmm moo am , menn Xel , ak jenn yaakaaru ëllëg ju wooteb Yàlla ëmb .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Benn Boroom it a am , genn ngëm , ak benn seedeb ngëm ci li ñu leen sóob ci ndox .

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Te jenn Yàllaa am , di Baayu ñépp , mu tiim ñépp , fees ñépp , te dëkk ci ñépp .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Waaye ku nekk ci nun ak mayam , ni nu ko Kirist séddalee .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Looloo tax Mbind mi ne : « Yéeg na ba ca fa gën a kawe , yóbbaale mbooloom noon mu bare , mi mu noot , tey séddale nit ñi ay may . »

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Su nu waxee ne « yéeg na , » li moo ci génn : daa jëkk a wàcc ba ca bérab ya gën a suufe .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Ki wàccoon moo yéegaat , ba tiim asamaan yépp , ngir fees lépp .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Moo may ñii di ay ndawam , ñii ay yonent , ñii ay taskati xebaar bu baax bi , ak ñeneen ñuy sàmm mbooloom ñi gëm te di ko jàngal .

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Maye na leen , ngir ñu waajal gaayi Yàlla yu sell yi , ñu man a bey seen sas ci taxawal mbooloom Kirist , di jëmmam .

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: Noonu nu mànkoo ci sunu ngëm ak ci xam Doomu Yàlla ji , ba kera nuy egg ci nekk nit ku sotti , te taxaw taxawaay bu dëppook matug Kirist .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Noonu dootunu ay gune yu njàngalem nit ku ñëw di fàbbi ci seeni làqarci ak seeni pexe , nu mel ni ay gaal yu duus yi ak ngelaw li di baaje .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Waaye dinanu wax dëgg , ëmb ko ci mbëggeel , bay màgg ci fànn gu ne ci sunu bokk ci Kirist . Mooy bopp ,

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: te jëmm jépp ci moom lay dunde , di jëmm ju ràbboo te déggoo ci bépp tenqoo , te cér bu nekk di def warugaram . Noonu jëmm ji di yokku ak a màgg ci biir mbëggeel .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Maa ngi leen di wax lii nag , te di ko dëggal ci kanamu Boroom bi : buleen dundeeti ni xeeti àddina yi , ci seeni xalaati neen

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: ak seen xel mu lëndëm . Dañoo génn ci dundu Yàlla , ndax umple gi ñu am ci moom , ak li ñu ko tëjal seen xol .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Seen xol dafa dërkiis , ba ñu bayliku ciy topp seen nafsu , di sóobu ci bépp sobe te xér ci .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Waaye du dundin woowu ngeen jàng ci Kirist .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Ndax yaakaar naa ne , dégg ngeen Kirist te jàng ngeen ci moom , ba xam dëgg gi Yeesu ëmb .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Maanaam ngeen yulli seen jikko ju bon , ji ngeen judduwaale te daan fés ci seeni jëf , te muy gën a yées , moom ak i bëgg - bëggam yuy naxe kese .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Te ngeen yeeslu ci seen biir xel ,

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: te soloo jikko ju bees , ji Yàlla sàkk ci njub ak sell yu dëggu .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Kon nag bàyyileen di fen , tey wax dëgg kenn ku nekk ci moroomam , ndax ku nekk sa genn - wàllu moroom nga .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Ku mer , bu mu jàll aw kaañ ; bu jant bi sowaale seen mer ,

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: ba ngeen may Seytaane bunt .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Ku daan sàcc , na ko dëddu te jublu ci liggéey lu baax ci ay loxoom , ngir mu man a dimbali ñi néew doole .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Bu genn kàddu gu ñaaw génn ci seen gémmiñ , waaye su wax yegsee , nangeen wax lu rafet , ba faj soxlay seeni moroom , te teg ñi leen di déglu ci yoonu yiw .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Buleen yóbbe tiis Xelu Yàlla mu Sell , mi leen tàmpe ngir bésu goreel ba .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Dëdduleen lépp luy wex mbaa tàng bopp , luy mer mbaa coow , lépp luy xaste mbaa coxor .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Te ngeen baax ci seen diggante , di laayante biir tey baalante , ni leen Yàlla baale ci turu Kirist .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Yéen nag ñiy guney Yàlla , yi mu bëgg ci xolam , royleen ko ci loolu .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Ngeen wéer seen dund ci mbëggeel , mel ni Kirist mi nu bëgg , ba joxe bakkanam ngir nun , di sarax su ñu jébbal Yàlla te neex ko ni xetu latkoloñ .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Waaye naka njaaloo ak bépp sobe mbaa bëgge , jéllale naa jëf ji sax , waaye bu ko làmmiñ tudd , ni mu jekke ci gaayi Yàlla yu sell yi .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Dawleen it yu jekkadee , ni wax ju ñaaw mbaa waxi caaxaan ak kaf yu bon , te ngeen sax ci sant Yàlla .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Na leen wóor ne , kenn ku jikkowoo ndoxaan , sobe mbaa bëgge , maanaam bokkaale Yàlla , kooku du am cér ci nguuru Kirist ak Yàlla .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Bu leen kenn nax ci ay waxi neen , ndaxte jëf yooyooy tax meru Yàlla di wàcc ci kureelu ñi ko déggadil .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Kon nag buleen séq ak ñoom dara .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Lëndëm ngeen woon , waaye léegi leer ngeen ndax seen bokk ci Boroom bi . Dundeleen nag ni ay guney leer .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Leer , mbaax lay meññ , njub ak dëgg .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Dëggal - leen ci seeni jëf li neex Boroom bi ,

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: te daw lépp luy jëfi lëndëm yu amul njariñ , bay weer sax ku koy def .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Ndaxte waxtaane sax li ñuy def ci nëbbu , lu ruslu la ;

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: waaye leer , lu mu ëmb , fésal ko .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Ndaxte lu jaxasoo ak leer di leer . Looloo tax ñu ne : « Yeewul , yaw mi nelaw , te jóge ci biir néew yi , kon Kirist dina ne ràññ ci yaw , ni leeru jant buy fenk . »

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Noonu sàmmleen seen dundin , waxuma ni ñu amul xel , waaye ni ñu am xel ,

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: tey jariñoo jot gi , ndaxte nu ngi ci jamono ju bon .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Buleen ñàkk bopp nag , waaye xamleen liy coobareg Boroom bi .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Buleen màndi it ci sangara , liy ndeyi ñaawteef , waaye feesleen ak Xel mu Sell mi ;

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: di waxante ci seen biir ci ay taalifi Sabóor , ci ay woy ak ay cant yu tukkee ci Xelum Yàlla , di woy ak a kañ Boroom bi ci seeni xol .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Gërëmleen Yàlla Baay bi ci turu Yeesu Kirist Boroom bi , fu ngeen man a tollu , ci lu mu man a doon ;

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: teg ca nangul sa moroom ci biir wegeelu Kirist .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Naka yéen jigéen ñi , nangeen nangul seeni jëkkër , ni su doon Boroom bi .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Ndaxte góor mooy kilifag jabaram , ni Kirist nekke kilifag mbooloom ñi gëm , muy jëmmam ji muy sàmm .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Ni mbooloo mi nag jiitale Kirist , noonu la jigéen ji war a jiitale jëkkëram ci lépp .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Yéen nag góor ñi , na ku nekk bëgg jabaram , ni Kirist bëgge mbooloo mi , ba joxe bakkanam ndax moom ,

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: ngir sellal ko ak kàddoom , ba mu laab ni ku sangu set .

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: Noonu dina ko jël , mu mel ni séet bu ñu waajal , di mbooloom mu soloo ndam , te gàkkul , rasul , taqul leneen , waaye mu sell te amul sikk .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Na góor bëgg jabaram , ni mu bëgge boppam . Bëgg sa jabar , bëgg sa bopp la .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Ndaxte kenn musul a bañ sa yaram . Waaye danga koy dundal , di ko fonk . Noonu it la Kirist fonke mbooloo mi ;

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: ndaxte noo di céri jëmmam .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Mbind mi nee na : « Moo tax góor dina beru ndeyam ak baayam , di taq ci jabaram , ñoom ñaar doon benn . »

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Loolu ëmb na mbóot mu xóot ; man maa ngi wax ci lu jëm ci Kirist ak mbooloo mi .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Waaye li teew , na góor gu nekk bëgg jabaram , ni mu bëgge boppam , te jigéen ji weg jëkkëram .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Naka yéen xale yi , nangeen déggal seeni waajur , ci li ngeen bokk ci Boroom bi , ndaxte looloo rafet .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: « Teralal sa ndey ak sa baay , » mooy ndigal li jëkk a ëmb dige ,

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: maanaa : « ngir nga am gudd fan gu ànd ak jàmm . »

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Yéen baay yi it , buleen bundaxataal xale yi , waaye ngeen yar leen , di leen yemale ak a yee ci Boroom bi .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Yéen jaam yi , nangeen déggal seeni sang yu àddina , boole ci ragal ak wegeel , di ko def ak xol bu laab , ni su doon ngir Kirist .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Buleen ko def rekk ci ngistal , ngir sàkku ngërëmu nit , waaye ni ay jaami Kirist , di jëfe coobareg Yàlla ak seen xol bépp .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Beyleen seen sas nag ak xol bu tàlli , ni su doon ngir Boroom bi te du nit ,

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: xam ne ku def lu baax , Boroom bi delloo la ko , muy jaam , muy gor .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Yéen it sang yi , jëfeleen noonu seen diggante ak seeni jaam , te dëddu gépp raglu , xam ne yéena bokk benn Boroom ci asamaan , te ñépp a yem fi moom .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Léegi nag doolewuleen ci Boroom bi , te soloo kàttanam gu mag gi .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Gànnaayooleen yérey xarey Yàlla yépp , ngir man a jànkoonte ak pexey Seytaane .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Ndaxte ndëndu xare jib na , waxuma sunu diggante ak nit ñi , waaye ak kilifa yiy nëxal àddina si , ñuy kilifa yi ak ay boroom sañ - sañ , di gaayi Seytaane yi ci bérab yu kawe yi .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Kon nag gànnaayooleen yérey xarey Yàlla yépp , ba man a jànkoonte jamono ju xeex bi taree , noot lépp te taxaw temm .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Taxawleen kon temm , geñoo dëgg te sàngoo njub , muy seen kiiraayu dënn .

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Solooleen jàmm , ji xebaar bu baax biy joxe , ni ay dàll ci seeni tànk , ba jekk ci lépp .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Defleen it ngëm , muy seen pakk , ba man a fél jum yi leen Seytaane di fitt .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Defleen mucc , muy seen mbaxanam xare , ak kàddug Yàlla , muy jaasi ji leen Xel mu Sell mi tëggal .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Deeleen ñaan ci xeeti ñaan yépp ci kàttanu Xel mu Sell mi , te sax ci ak farlu gu mat sëkk , di ñaanal gaayi Yàlla yu sell yi yépp .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Te buleen ma ci fàtte , ngir waxtu wu ma ubbee sama gémmiñ , ma am lu ma wax , ba man a xamle ak fit wu dëgër mbóoti xebaar bu baax bi .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Ndaw laa ci , lu ñu jéng ; na ma Yàlla may fit wu ma waxe , ni mu ma ware .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Yónnee naa leen Tisig sama mbokk , mi ma sopp , te muy jawriñ ju takku ci liggéeyu Boroom bi , ngir mu xamal leen lépp li aju ci man ak li may def .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Maa leen ko yónneel sama bopp , ngir ngeen xam li nu nekke , te mu dëfël seeni xol .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yéen bokk yi , na leen Yàlla Baay bi ak Yeesu Kirist Boroom bi may jàmm ak mbëggeel gu ànd ak ngëm .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Na yiwu Yàlla ànd ak ñépp , ñi bëgg Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist ak mbëggeel gu sax .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Nun Pool ak Timote , jaami Kirist Yeesu , noo leen di bind , yéen gaayi Yàlla yu sell yépp ci dëkku Filib , yi bokk ci Kirist Yeesu , yéen ak seeni njiit ak ñiy topptoo yëfi mbooloo mi .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Na leen Yàlla sunu Baay ak Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist may yiw ak jàmm .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Yoon wu ma leen di xalaat , maa ngi sant Yàlla sama Boroom ;

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: te saa su ma leen di ñaanal yéen yépp , duma noppee bég ,

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: ndax seen ànd ak man ci tas xebaar bu baax bi , ca ndoorte la ba tey .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Wóor na ma ne , Yàlla mi tàmbali jëf ju baax jii ci yéen , dina ci sax , ba bésu Kirist Yeesu ñëw .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Te juumuma ci li ma xalaat loolu ci yéen ñépp , ndaxte def naa leen ci sama xol ; ba tax fii ci kaso bi , ci taxawal xebaar bu baax bi ak lawal ko , yéen ñépp am ngeen wàll ak man ci yiwu Yàlla .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ndaxte Yàllaa seede ne , sama xol seey na ci yéen ñépp ci biir cofeelu Kirist Yeesu .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Li ma leen di ñaanal nag mooy lii : na seen mbëggeel di yokku tey gën a tar , jaar ci xam ak xàmmi gu wér ;

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: nangeen sax noonu ci yi gën a rafet , ngeen am xol bu laab te bañ a am benn sikk , ba bésu Kirist ñëw ;

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
