text2: na seen xol meññ njub , ba ne gàññ , jaar ci Yeesu Kirist ci ndamul Yàlla ak cantam .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Damaa bëgg , bokk yi , ngeen xam lii : li ma dal taxul xebaar bu baax dellu gannaaw , waaye da koo jëmale kanam .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Noonu ñiy wottu buur bi ak ñépp gis nañu bu leer ne , turu Kirist rekk a tax ñu jàpp ma .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Te it bokk yu bare takk nañu seeni fit ci li ñu gis samay buum , ba tax ñu gën a ñeme ci wax kàddug Yàlla ci lu àndul ak genn tiit .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Am na ñuy waare ci turu Kirist ci kaw kiñaan ak xëccoo , waaye ñi ci des ci kaw cofeel ak xol bu laab , ndaxte xam nañu ne , Yàlla moo ma teg fii , ngir ma taxawal xebaar bu baax bi .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Waaye ñale amuñu xol bu laab , te seen njariñu bopp rekk a tax ñuy yégle turu Kirist , di wut a feddali samay buum ak coono .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Lu ci génn nag ? Xanaa lii rekk : turu Kirist jolli na ci nii mbaa naa , muy ci naaféq , muy ci dëgg ; bég naa ci te dinaa ci bégati .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ndaxte xam naa ne , loolu lépp mu ngi jëm ci sama mucc , jaar ci seeni ñaan ak ndimbalu Xelum Yeesu Kirist , mi ma Yàllay yéwénal .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Ndaxte sama xënte ak sama yaakaar mooy ma bañ a rus ci lenn , waaye sama yaram feeñal ndamu Kirist , ma ànd ci ak kóolute gu mat , su may dund mbaa may dee ; moom laa daan def démb , te moom laay def tey .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Ndaxte su ma dundee , Kirist laay noyyee , te su ma deeyee , xéewal lay doon ci man .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Su ma Yàlla bàyyee ci àddina , sas wu am njariñ la ci man . Am naa xel ñaar , te xawma bi ci gën . Am naa yéeney jóge fi , fekki Kirist , te looloo gën fuuf ,

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: waaye ma des fi ci àddina moo gën ci yéen .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Loolu wóor na ma ; kon xam naa ne , dinaa fi des , di leen taxawu yéen ñépp , ngir seen ngëm yokku , ànd ak mbég .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Noonu dinaa dellusi ci yéen , ngir sama taxawaay gën a lawal seen mbég ci Kirist Yeesu .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Waaye dénk naa leen lii : na seeni jëf yelloo ak li Kirist digle ci xebaar bu baax bi . Noonu su ma leen seetsee , mbaa ma dégg seen mbir rekk , dinaa xam ne yéena ngi dëgër ci menn xel , bokk benn xalaat ci bëre luy saxal dëggu xebaar bu baax bi ,

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: te bañ a tiit dara ndax noon , yi leen di xëbal . Màndarga la muy wone ne aji sànku lañu , di màndarga it ne aji mucc ngeen , di mucc gu jóge ci Yàlla .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla may na leen , ngeen gëm Kirist , rax - ca - dolli ngeen sonn ndax turam ,

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: di wéy ci bëre , bi ngeen gisoon ci man , te dégg léegi sama mbir .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Su nu Kirist mayee fit nag ak mbëggeel guy dëfël sunu xol , su nu amee cér ci Xel mu Sell mi , su amee cofeel ak yërmande ci sunu bokk ci moom ,

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: kon mottalileen sama mbég , ci bokk benn xalaat ak genn mbëggeel , benn bakkan ak menn xel .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Buleen def dara ci kaw wut aw tur walla wonu , waaye jiital - leen seeni moroom cig woyof .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Buleen yem ci topptoo seen bopp rekk , waaye booleleen ci seeni moroom .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Te ngeen soloo xel mi nekkoon ci Kirist Yeesu :

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Njàlbéen ga fekk na Kirist yor melow Yàlla , waaye aakimowul taxawaayamci li mu mengoo ak Yàlla .

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: Waaye daa wàcce boppam , ba tollook nit ñi , def boppam surga . Te bi mu yoree bindu nit ,

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: daa suufeel boppam , di dégg ndigal , ba joxe boppam , ñu daaj ko sax ci bant .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Moo tax Yàlla kaweel ko lool , jox ko tur wi tiim yépp ,

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: ngir turu Yeesoo tax ñépp sukk , ci asamaan , ci kaw suuf , ci biir suuf ;

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: te ñépp bokk genn kàddu naan : Yeesu Kirist mooy Boroom bi ; ci màggug Yàlla Baay bi .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Noonu samay soppe , xam naa ne , musuleen a jóg ci dégg ndigal , waxuma sax bi ma nekkee ak yéen rekk , waaye rawatina bi ma leen soree . Kon nag maa ngi leen di ñaan , ngeen biral seen mucc ci seeni jëf , te def ko ci ragal Yàlla gu dëggu .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla ci boppam mooy jëf ci yéen , ngir ngeen fonk coobareem te di ko jëfe .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Lépp lu ngeen di def nag , buleen ci boole xultu mbaa xuloo .

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: Noonu dingeen am xol bu laab bu àndul ak ŋàññ , di guney Yàlla yu amul sikk ci biir jamono ju yàqu te rëb . Dangeen di leer ci seen biir ni weer ci àddina si ,

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: di jottali kàddug dund gi . Noonu bu bésu Kirist ñëwee , dinaa man a bég , xam ne dawuma lu amul njariñ , te sonnuma cig neen .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Te bu sama deret waree tuuru sax , ngir seen ngëm mat sëkk , ma mel ni naan gu ñu boole ak sarax su jëm ci Yàlla , ba tey bég naa ci , te dinaa ci bégati .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Yéen itam nag bégleen , waaw fekksileen ma ci sama mbég .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Gannaaw loolu , bu soobee Boroom bi Yeesu , yaakaar naa ne , dinaa leen yónnee Timote balaa yàgg , ngir sama xel dal ci xam nan ngeen def .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Ndaxte amu fi kenn gannaaw Timote , ku bokk ak man xalaat te fonk leen bu wér .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Ñi ci des ñépp , seen bopp lañuy xalaat , waaye du mbiri Yeesu Kirist .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Waaye xam ngeen takkuteg Timote , ci ni mu ànde ak man ci tas xebaar bu baax bi , ni doom di taxawoo baayam .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Moom laa yaakaar a yónni fi yéen nag , waxtu wu ma yégee , nu sama mbir di tëdde .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Waaye wóor na ma ne , Boroom bi dina ma may , man ci sama bopp , ma seetsi leen balaa yàgg .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Ci lu jëm ci sama mbokk Epafrodit nag , miy sama nawle ci liggéey bi ak ci xeex bi , te di seen ndaw ci faj samay soxla , jàpp naa ne , war naa leen koo delloo .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Ndaxte namm na leen lool , te tiisoo na li ngeen yég jagadeem .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Ci dëgg - dëgg woppoon na ba xaw a dee , waaye Yàlla yërëm na ko , ba fëgg boppam , rax - ca - dolli siggil na ma man itam , ngir ma bañ a am tiis ci kaw tiis .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Noonu delloo naa leen ko ci lu gaaw , ngir ñëwam bégal seeni xol , te man itam sama xol féex .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Teeruleen ko teeru bu rafet nag ngir Boroom bi , te teral ñi mel ni moom .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Ndaxte liggéeyal na Kirist , ba riisu dee , te gar na bakkanam ci taxawal leen ci topptoo , bi ngeen yéene woon ci man .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Kon nag samay bokk , bégleen ci Boroom bi . Duma sonn mukk ci di leen ko wax , ndax seen mucc moo ci aju .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Moytuleen xaj yi , waaw moytuleen ñiy jëfe lu bon , ñoom ñi seen xarafal weesul wàññi yaramu nit .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Ndaxte nun noo xaraf tigi , nun ñiy màggal Yàlla ci Xel mu Sell mi , di damu ci Kirist Yeesu , te amunu jenn yaakaar ci matug nit .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Ba tey manoon naa am yaakaar ci sama bopp ; su nit doon damu , maa ciy raw .

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: Xarafoon naa ca ayu - bés ga , bokk ci bànni Israyil ci giiru Ben - yamin , di Ibrë ci deret ak ci meen . Bu dee ci yoonu Musaa ngeen bëgg a wax , ci tariixab Farisen laa bokkoon ;

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: bu dee it ci mbirum farlu , daan naa fitnaal mbooloom ñi gëm Kirist ; bu dee ci njub ci sàmm yoon , awma benn gàkk .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Waaye loolu lépp lu ma tegoon ay njariñ fa kanam Yàlla , dëddu naa ko ngir Kirist .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Rax - ca - dolli dëddu naa lépp ngir xéewali xam Kirist Yeesu sama Boroom , di xam - xam bu xóot , ba xel mënu koo takk . Moo tax ñàkk naa sama lépp , te def ko ni mbalit , ngir am cér ci Kirist .

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: Na ma Yàlla fekk ci moom , waxuma ci njub gu aju ci sàmm yoon , waaye gu aju ci gëm Kirist , maanaam njub gi nu Yàlla sol ci kaw ngëm .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Moom laay ittewoo xam , ak doole ji ànd ak ndekkiteem , ma bokk ci ay coonoom , ba fekki ko ci deeyam ,

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: ngir man a séddu ci ndekkiteem , su ma ko manee am .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Waxuma ne jagoo naa ko ba noppi , waxuma it ne aji mat laa , waaye maa ngi daw , ngir jot li tax Kirist jël ma .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Bokk yi , gëmuma ne jot naa ko ba noppi , waaye lenn lii laay def : fàtte li ma weesu , jublu ci li féete kanam ,

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: di daw yen muj ga , ngir jot li ma Yàlla tax a woo , di cér bi ma Yàlla wooye te dencal ma ko ci asamaan ci darajay Kirist Yeesu .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Nun ñi mat nag , nanu xalaat loolu . Te su ngeen ci amee werantey xol , Yàlla dina leen ko leeralal .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Li am daal , fa seen ngëm tolloo , na fa seen jëf àgg .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Kon nag bokk yi , toppleen ma te xool ñiy roy ci li nu tëral diirub sunu ngan ci yéen .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Ndaxte jëfi ñu bare juuyoo na ak dee gi Kirist dee ; loolu wax naa leen ko ba tàyyi , maa ngi koy waxaat léegi ak i jooy .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Alku lañuy mujje , ñoom ñiy jaami seen biir , di wonoo lu ruslu , tey wut yëfi àddina rekk .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Waaye nun waa asamaan lanu , te noo ngi xaar Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist jóge fa , musalsi nu .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Noonu dina soppi sunu yaram wu toroxlu , def ko ni yaramam wi ànd ak ndam dëppook kàttanam , gi ko man a nootal mbindeef yépp .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Kon nag yéen samay bokk , ñi ma bëgg te namm leen , di sama mbég ak sama kaalag ndam , jàppleen bu dëgër noonu ci Boroom bi , soppe yi !

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Ci lu jëm ci Ewodi ak Santis , maa ngi leen di ñaan , ñu bokk benn xalaat ci Boroom bi .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Te yaw sama nawle bu wér , nanga dimbali jigéen ñooñu xeexoon ci sama wet ci tas xebaar bu baax bi , boole ci Këlemaŋ ak samay yeneeni nawle , ñoom ñi Yàlla bind seeni tur ci téereb dund ba .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Deeleen bég ci Boroom bi ; maa ngi koy waxati : bégleen !

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Na seen lewet leer ñépp . Boroom bi jege na .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Buleen jaaxle ci dara , waaye ci lépp wéetal - leen Yàlla , diis ko seeni soxla ci ñaan gu ànd ak cant .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Noonu jàmmu Yàlla , ji xel mënta takk , dina aar seeni xol ak seeni xalaat ci darajay Kirist Yeesu .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Léegi nag bokk yi , na seen xalaat jublu ci lii : lu dëggu , lu jekk , lu jub , lu sell , lu rafet ak lu faaydawu ; su fi amee lu baax mbaa lu mat a naw , xalaatleen ko .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Li ngeen jànge ci man te nangu ko , li ngeen dégge ci man te gis ko , jëfeleen ko ; kon Yàllay jàmm dina ànd ak yéen .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Sama xol sedd na guyy ci Boroom bi , ci ni ngeen yeesale seen ndimbal ci man . Xam naa ne , amoon ngeen yéene ji , waaye man gi moo fi nekkul woon .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Ba tey soxla taxul ma waxe nii , ndaxte jàng naa doylu ci mbir mu ma man a dab .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Miin naa ñàkk , man naa naataange . Ci fépp ak ci lépp , Yàlla def na ba sama xol toj ci suur ak xiif , barele ak néewle .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Man naa lépp ci ndimbalu Aji Dooleel ji .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Waaye teewul taxawu , bi ngeen ma taxawu ci sama tiis , jëf ju rafet la .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Yéen waa Filib xam ngeen ne , bi ngeen jëkkee xam xebaar bu baax bi , te ma jóge diiwaanu Maseduwan , benn mbooloo àndul woon ak man ci mbirum joqleente ndimbal , mu dul yéen doŋŋ .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Ba ma nekkee dëkku Tesalonig sax , yónnee ngeen ay yooni yoon , ngir faj samay soxla .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Loolu tekkiwul ne , damay sàkku ay ndimbal ci yéen , waaye damaa bëgg rekk seen denc yokku fa Yàlla .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Fi mu ne jot naa li ma aajowoo lépp , ba maa ngi ci naataange ; li ngeen ma yónnee ci loxoy Epafrodit doy na sëkk ; ni xetu latkoloñ la mel ci man , di sarax su neex Yàlla te mu nangu ko .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Te Yàlla sama Boroom , mi denc ci Kirist Yeesu xéewal yu dul jeex , dina ci faj seeni soxla yépp .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Na Yàlla sunu Baay yelloo ndam ba fàww . Amiin .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Nuyul - leen ma gaayi Kirist Yeesu yu sell yépp . Bokk yi ànd ak man , ñu ngi leen di nuyu .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Te it gaayi Yàlla yu sell yépp ñu ngi leen di nuyu , rawatina nag ñi nekk kër buur bi Sesaar .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Na yiwu Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist ànd ak seen xel .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Man Pool , ndawul Kirist Yeesu ci coobareg Yàlla , man ak Timote sunu mbokk ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: noo leen di bind , yéen gaayi Yàlla yu sell , yi dëkk Kolos te di ay bokk ci gëm Kirist . Na leen Yàlla sunu Baay may yiw ak jàmm .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Dunu noppee sant Yàlla , Baayu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist , saa su nu leen di ñaanal ,

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: ndaxte yég nanu seen ngëm ci Kirist Yeesu ak seen mbëggeel ci gaayi Yàlla yépp .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Ngëm googu ak mbëggeel googu ñu ngi sosoo ci yaakaaru ëllëg , jiy cér bi leen Yàlla dencal ca asamaan . Mas ngeen a dégg yaakaar jooju ci kàddug dëgg gi , di xebaar bu baax bi .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Ni xebaar bu baax bi wàcce ci yéen , noonu lay wàcce ci àddina sépp , di meññ te di law . Te noonu lay doxale ci yéen , li dale ci bés , ba ngeen dégge xebaaru yiwu Yàlla , te xam dëggam gi mu ëmb ;

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: moom ngeen jànge ci Epafras , miy sunu nawle ci liggéey bi te nu sopp ko , di jawriñu Kirist bu takku ngir seen njariñ .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Te moo nu yégal it mbëggeel , gi Xelu Yàlla mi sol ci yéen .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Looloo tax ci sunu wàllu bopp , ba nu ko yégee ba tey , jógunu ci di leen ñaanal . Nu ngi ñaan Yàlla , ngeen xam bu baax coobareem ci xel mu mat ak ràññee gu aju ci dooley Xelam .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Noonu dingeen dund dund gu dëppoo ak seen bokk ci Boroom bi , ba neex ko ci fànn gu nekk , di def bépp jëf yu baax , te yokk seen xam - xam ci Yàlla .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Te Yàlla dina leen dooleel ak bépp doole , mu mengoo ak kàttanu ndamam , ngir ngeen man a tegoo coono te muñ , ba fa muñ di yem .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Dingeen gërëm Yàlla Baay bi , ànd ci ak mbég , moom mi leen jagleel , ngeen bokk ci cér , bi mu dencal gaayam yu sell yi ci leer .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Yàlla musal na nu ci dooley lëndëm , yóbbu nu ci nguuru Doomam ji mu bëgg ,

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: moom mi nu jot , maanaam baal nu sunuy bàkkaar .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Doom jooju moo di melokaanu Yàlla , ji kenn gisul . Mooy taaw bi , ki gën a màgg lépp luy mbindeef .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Ndaxte ci moom la Yàlla sàkke lépp lu nekk ci asamaan ak suuf , li ñuy gis ak li ñu mënul a gis , muy buur , njiit , kilifa mbaa boroom sañ - sañ . Lépp lu ñu sàkk , ci moom lañu ko jaarale , ci moom lañu ko jëme .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Laata dara di am , fekkoon na moom mu nekk , te lépp a ngi jàppoo ci moom .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Mooy bopp bi yilif jëmm ji , di mbooloom ñi ko gëm , ndaxte moom mooy njàlbéen gi , di taaw bi , maanaam ki jëkk a dekki , ngir muy kilifa ci bépp fànn .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Ndaxte soob na Yàlla mu dëkkal matam gépp ci moom

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: te jaar ci moom , jubale lépp ak boppam , muy ci kaw asamaan yi mbaa ci suuf , ba mu wàccee jàmm jaarale ko ci deret ji tuuru , bi Doom ji deeyee ca bant ba .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Te yéen ñi sore woon Yàlla te doon ay noonam ci seen xel ak seen jëf yu bon ,

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: léegi nag Yàlla jubale na leen ak boppam jaare ko ci deewu Kirist ci yaramu nitam , ngir taxawal leen ca kanamam , ngeen sell te ñàkk sikk ak i ŋàññ .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Loolu nag na fekk ngeen wéy ci ngëm , sampu ci ba dëgër ci , tey séentu cér , bi leen xebaar bu baax bi jox . Te xebaar bu baax , boobu ngeen dégg te ñu yégal waa àddina sépp , man Pool moom laay yégle .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Léegi nag maa ngi am bànneex ci coono , yi may daj ngir seen njariñ ; te li des sax ci fitnay Kirist , noonu laa koy àggalee ngir njariñu mbooloom ñi gëm , di jëmmam .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Jawriñu mbooloo moomu laa , ndaxte Yàlla sas na ma ngir yéen , may yégle fu nekk kàddoom ,

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: maanaam ma yégle kumpa , gi nëbbu woon ay jamonoy jamono , waaye léegi Yàlla xamal na ko ay gaayam

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: ci xeeti àddina sépp . Ñoom nag la Yàlla bëgg a xamal ni ndamu kumpa googu màgge , maanaam Kirist a ngi dëkk ci yéen , di yaakaar ju wér ci ndamu ëllëg .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Moom Kirist lanuy yégle , di artu te di jàngal ku nekk , ànd ak xel mu mat , ngir jébbal Yàlla ku nekk ni ku mat ci Kirist .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Ci loolu laay jëmale sama liggéey , di bëree dooley Kirist , jiy yengu ci man ak kàttan .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Bëgg naa nag , ngeen xam bëre bu metti , bi may bëre ngir yéen , ngir waa Lawdise ak ñépp ñi ma musul a teg bët . Damay def sama kem - kàttan ,

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: ngir ngeen am fit te nekk benn ci mbëggeel , ngir dajal noonu xam - xam bu mat , ba xam kumpag Yàlla , di Kirist .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Ci moom lañu denc lépp lu ñuy sàkku ci xel ak ci xam - xam .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Maa ngi wax lii , ngir kenn bañ leen a nax ci ay wax yu neex .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Jëmm ji ñëwul waaye sama xel a ngi ci yéen , di bég ci seen doxalin ak ngëm gu dëgër , gi ngeen am ci Kirist .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Kon nag , ni ngeen nangoo Kirist Yeesu ni Boroom bi , dundeleen noonu ci moom .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Saxleen ci moom , di màgg ci moom , tey gën a dëgër ci ngëm , gi ñu leen jàngal , ba seen xol di baawaan ci gërëm Yàlla .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Moytuleen ba kenn bañ leen a fàbbi ci ay xam - xami nit yuy naxi neen . Xam - xam yu mel noonu , ñu ngi soqikoo ci aada yu nit tëral , ci aaday àddina , waaye soqikoowul ci Kirist .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Ndaxte ci Kirist , maanaam ci yaramu nitam , la matug Yàlla gépp dëkk ,

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: te mat ngeen ci moom , miy buuru kilifa yépp ak boroom sañ - sañ yépp .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Ndax seen ngëm ci moom xaraf ngeen xaraf bu loxol nit deful , maanaam Kirist summil na leen dooley bàkkaar , ji moomoon seen yaram . Loolu mooy xaraf , bi Kirist def .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Bi ñu leen sóobee ci ndox , suulaale nañu leen ak moom , te it dekki ngeen ak moom , ndaxte gëm ngeen ci dooley Yàlla , ji ko dekkal ca néew ya .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Te yéen ñi doon ndee fa kanam Yàlla ndax seeni moy ak seen ñàkka xaraf , Yàlla dundalaat na leen ak Kirist , baal nu sunuy bàkkaar yépp .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Mbind mi nu doon tiiñal , te daa nu yey ndax ay sàrtam , Yàlla far na ko , dindi ko , daajaale ko ca bant , ba Kirist deeye .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Futti na kilifa yi ak boroom sañ - sañ yi , weer leen ci kanamu ñépp , sëkktal leen niy jaam ndax ndam la Kirist jële ca bant ba .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Kon nag bu leen kenn teg tooñ ci li jëm ciy ñam mbaa naan , ci màggal mbaa xewu weer wu feeñ , mbaa ci bésu noflaay .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Loolu lépp nag takkandeer la woon buy misaal li waroon a ñëw , waaye lu dëggu li mi ngi ci Kirist .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Kuy bég ci di toroxlu ci ngistal , di jaamu ay malaaka , buleen ko may , mu àtte leen . Kooku dafay jeneer , di seet li koy feeñu , bay tiitaroo xalaatam , fekk xalaatu nit kese la , te neen .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Taqul ci Kirist , miy bopp bi yilif jëmm ji . Bopp bee tax ba jëmm jépp , ji siddit yi ak tenqo yi téye te taqale ko , di màgg màgg gi ko Yàlla di jox .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Ndegam deeyandoo ngeen ak Kirist , ba génne noonu ci aaday àddina , lu tax ngeen di nangu , ñu di leen teg ay sàrt yu mel nii : « Bul fab , bul ñam , bul laal , » ni bu seenug dund aju woon ci àddina si ?

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Sàrt yooyu ñu ngi aju ci ndigali nit ñi ak seen njàngale . Yëf yi ñu tudd yépp , dees na leen jariñoo , ba ñu jeex .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Dëgg la , seeni sàrt dañuy dénkaane pasteef ci jaamu Yàlla , di toroxlu ak di fitnaal seen yaram . Waaye sàrt yooyu nag amuñu benn njariñ , ngir nit ñi noot seen nafsu .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Kon nag ndegam dekkeendoo ngeen ak Kirist , wutleen yëf , ya nekk ca kaw , fa Kirist toog ca ndeyjooru Yàlla .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Fonkleen yëf ya ca kaw , te ngeen bañ a faale yi ci suuf ,

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: ndaxte dee ngeen , te seen dund boole nañu ko ak Kirist , denc ca Yàlla .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Te bés bu Kirist miy seen dund feeñee , yéen itam dingeen feeñ ak moom ci biir ndam .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Kon nag li nekk ci yéen te bokk ci mbiri àddina , jébbal - leen ko dee , yu deme ni ndoxaanu yàqute , sobe , xemmem , bëgg - bëgg yu bon , ak bëgge , maanaam bokkaale Yàlla .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Yooyooy xëcc merum Yàlla .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Yéen itam noonu ngeen daan doxale bu jëkk , ba ngeen daan dunde noonu .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Waaye léegi bàyyileen yii yépp : mer , xadar , kiñaan ak di génne ci seen gémmiñ sos ak wax ju ñaaw .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Bàyyileen di fen seeni moroom , ndaxte summi ngeen jikko ju bon , ji ngeen judduwaale , moom ak ay jëfam ;

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: te sol ngeen dund gu bees , gi Yàlla sàkk te di ko yeesal ba mu mel ni moom , ngir ngeen man koo xam bu wér .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Ci dund gu bees googu , amul Yawut ak ku dul Yawut , ku xaraf walla ku xaraful , jaam walla gor , ku jàngul ni Baarbaar yi , ak ku yeewuwul ni waa Sit , waaye Kirist ay lépp te dëkk ci ñépp .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Kon nag ndegam Yàlla tànn na leen , sellal leen , sopp leen , solooleen boog yërmande , laabiir , woyof , lewet ak muñ .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Muñalanteleen , di baalante , su amee kuy tawat moroomam . Baalanteleen , ni leen Boroom bi baale .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Ci kaw loolu lépp amleen mbëggeel , giy jókkaale lépp , ba mu mat .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Na jàmm ji Kirist di joxe noot seeni xol , ndaxte Yàlla woo na leen ci loolu , mel ni ay cér yu bokk benn yaram ; te gërëmleen Yàlla .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Na kàddug Kirist dëkk ci yéen , bay baawaan , ngeen di jàngalante ak a artoonte ci seen biir ak xel mu mat sëkk , di woy ak a gërëm Yàlla ak seen xol bépp , ay taalifi Sabóor , ay kañ Yàlla ak ay cant yu tukkee ci Xelum Yàlla .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Te lu ngeen man a def , muy ci wax mbaa ci jëf , wéerleen ko ci turu Boroom bi Yeesu , jaare ci moom gërëm Yàlla Baay bi .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Jigéen ñi , na ku nekk nangul jëkkëram , ndaxte looloo jekk ci ñi bokk ci Boroom bi .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Góor ñi , na ku nekk bëgg jabaram te muñal ko .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Xale yi , déggal - leen seeni waajur ci lépp , ndaxte looloo rafet ci ñi bokk ci Boroom bi .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Baay yi , buleen bundaxataal seeni doom , ngir bañ a jeexal seen xol .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Jaam yi , nangul - leen ci lépp seen sang , yi ci àddina . Buleen ko def rekk ci seen kanam , di sàkku ngërëm , waaye na nekk lu dëggu ci yéen , ndax seen ragal Boroom bi .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Lu ngeen man a def , na ci seen xol tàlli ; ngeen def ko ngir Boroom bi , te du ngir nit ,

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: xam ne Boroom bi dina fey seeni jëf , mu di cér bi mu leen dencal . Kirist mooy Boroom , bi ngeen di liggéeyal .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Waaye ku def lu bon , Boroom bi dina la delloo sa jëf , te du gënale .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Sang yi , yorleen seeni jaam ci nu jub te aw yoon , xam ne , am ngeen yéen itam ab Sang ca asamaan .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Dëkkleen ci ñaan Yàlla , farlu ci , boole ci ngërëm .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Te ngeen fasaale nu ci ñaan yi itam , ngir Yàlla ubbil nu bunt , nu man a xamle kàddoom , di yégle kumpa gi di Kirist , muy kumpa gi waral ñu jéng ma .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Ñaanleen ngir ma xamle ko ni mu ware .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Jëfeleen ak xel ci seen diggante ak waa àddina , te fu ngeen ame jot , fexeleen ba jariñoo ko .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Na seen wax jépp fees ak yiw te am xorom , ngir ngeen xam nan ngeen war a tontoo ku nekk .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Tisig , sama mbokk mi ma sopp , di jawriñ ju takku ak sama nawle ci liggéeyu Boroom bi , dina leen yégal lépp lu jëm ci samay mbir .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Lii moo tax ma yebal ko ci yéen : ngeen xam xebaar bi jóge ci nun , te it mu dëfël seen xol .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Onesim lay àndal , sunu mbokk mu takku , mi nu sopp , te mu bokk ci yéen . Dinañu leen xamal lépp lu xew fii .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Aristàrk mi nekk ak man ci kaso bi , mu ngi leen di nuyu , moom ak Màrk rakku Barnabas . Jot ngeen ay ndigal ci mbirum Màrk : bu ñëwee ci yéen , teral - leen ko .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Yeesu mi ñuy dàkkentale Yustus , moom it mu ngi leen di nuyu . Ñoom rekk ñooy Yawut yiy liggéeyandook man ngir nguuru Yàlla , te ñoo féexal sama xol .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Jaamu Kirist , Epafras , mi bokk ci yéen , mu ngi leen di nuyu . Du jóg ci di leen ñaanal , farlu ci ni kuy bëre , ngir ngeen taxaw temm ci coobareg Yàlla gépp , ànd ak ngëm gu mat ak kóolute gu wóor .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Maa ngi koy seedeel ne , mu ngi sonn bu baax ngir yéen , ngir waa Lawdise ak waa Yerapolis .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Luug , doktoor bi ñu sopp , mu ngi leen di nuyu , moom ak Demas .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Nuyul - leen nu mbokk , yi nekk Lawdise . Nuyul - leen nu itam Nimfa ak mbooloom ñi gëm , miy daje ci këram .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Bu ñu jàngee bataaxal bii ci yéen , fexeleen ba ñu jàng ko it ci mbooloom ñi gëm mi nekk Lawdise , te yéen it ngeen jàng bi ma yónnee waa Lawdise .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Te neleen Arkib : « Farlul ci sas , wi la Boroom bi sédde , ba matal ko . »

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Man Pool maa leen di bind nuyoo bii ci sama loxob bopp . Fàttalikuleen ne , dañu maa jéng . Na yiwu Boroom bi ànd ak yéen !

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Nun Pool , Silwan ak Timote noo ngi leen di bind , yéen mbooloom ñi gëm ci dëkku Tesalonig te nekk ci Yàlla Baay bi ak Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist . Na yiw ak jàmm ànd ak yéen .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Bët bu set nu ngi sant Yàlla ndax yéen , di leen boole ci sunuy ñaan .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Dunu noppee fàttaliku ci kanam Yàlla sunu Baay jëf ji juddu ci seen ngëm , liggéey bi tukkee ci seen mbëggeel , ak muñ gi sosoo ci seen yaakaar ci sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist .

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Bokk yi , yéen ñi Yàlla bëgg , xam nanu ne Yàlla tànn na leen ;

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: ndaxte xebaar bu baax , bi nu leen doon yégal , yemul woon ci ay wax rekk , waaye àndoon na ak kàttan ak Xel mu Sell mi ak kóolute gu mag . Xam ngeen sunu taxawaay ci seen biir ngir seen njariñ .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Te aw ngeen sunuy tànk ak yu Boroom bi , ci li ngeen nangu xebaar bi ci biir fitna yu metti , ànd ak mbég ci dooley Xel mu Sell mi .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Noonu ngeen daldi nekk royukaay ngir ñi gëm ñépp ci diiwaani Maseduwan ak Akayi .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Ndaxte kàddug Boroom bi jollee na ci seen biir , te yemul ci Maseduwan ak Akayi rekk , waaye seen gëm Yàlla siiw na fépp . Matul sax nu di ci wax dara ,

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: ndaxte ñoom ci seen bopp ñooy seede li sunu ngan def ci seen biir . Maanaam , ni ngeen dëddoo xërëm yi , jublu ci Yàlla te di ko jaamu , moom miy Yàlla Aji Dund ju dëggu ji ,

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: te ngeen di séentu Doomam bàyyikoo asamaan , moom Yeesu mi mu dekkal te di nu musal ci merum Yàlla , mi nar a ñëw .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Waaw bokk yi , xam ngeen ne , ngan gi nu leen ganesi woon du nganug neen .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Laata nuy ñëw , jaar nanu ci fitna ak toroxte ca dëkku Filib , ni ngeen ko xame ; waaye Yàlla sunu Boroom may na nu fit , ba li tongoonte bi metti lépp it , yégal nanu leen xebaaru Yàlla bu baax bi .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Ndaxte sunu waaraate wéeruwul cig réer walla ci njublaŋ walla ciy nax .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Waaye gannaaw Yàlla moo nu seet , ba wóolu nu te dénk nu xebaar bu baax bi , kon noonu lanuy waaree , du ngir neex nit ñi , waaye ngir neex Yàlla , miy seet xol yi .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Musunoo jey kenn , yéen xam ngeen ko ; sunu waare musul a ëmb bëgge , Yàlla seede na ko ;

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: musunoo sàkku ngërëmu nit , muy ci yéen , muy ci ñeneen .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: Manoon nanoo diis ci seen kaw sax , nun ñiy ndawi Kirist , waaye woyofoon nanu ci seen biir , te lewet ni jaboot buy uuf doomam .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Cofeel gi nu am ci yéen tax na , bëggunu woon a yem ci xamal leen xebaaru Yàlla bu baax bi , waaye jox leen it sunu bakkan , ndaxte sunu xol seeyoon na ci yéen .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Bokk yi , yéena ngi fàttaliku sunu coono ak sunu ñaq ; xam ngeen ni nu liggéeye guddi ak bëccëg , ngir bañ a diis ci seen kaw , ci di leen yégal xebaaru Yàlla .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Naka sunu diggante ak yéen ñi gëm , doxal nanu ko doxalin wu sell te jub te amul sikk : seede ngeen ko , te Yàlla it seede na ko .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Xam ngeen ne , dénk nanu leen kenn - kenn , ni baay di def ak doomam , dëfëlal leen seen xol te dëggal ci yéen , ngeen dund dund gu neex Yàlla , moom mi leen di woo , ngeen séddu ci nguuram ak ndamam .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Te it dunu noppee sant Yàlla ci lii : ba ngeen jotee kàddug Yàlla , gi nu doon waare , nangu ngeen ko , waxuma ni kàddug nit waaye ni kàddug Yàlla , ndaxte moom la ci dëgg - dëgg , te mu ngi jëf ci yéen ñi gëm .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Ndaxte bokk yi , aw ngeen ci tànki mboolooy Yàlla , yi nekk ca réewu Yawut ya tey daje ci turu Kirist Yeesu ; fitna ya ñu daj ca Yawut ya , yéen it seen waa réew teg nañu leen ko .

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: Ñoom Yawut yi rey nañu Boroom bi Yeesu , ni ñu reye woon yonent yi ; teg nañu nu fitna yu metti ; neexuñu Yàlla , ànduñu ak kenn ,

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: di nu teree wax ak ñi dul Yawut , ngir bañ ñu mucc . Duñu noppee xuus ci biir bàkkaar , waaye merum Yàlla xëppu na ci seen kaw .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Nun nag bokk yi , ba ñu ma leen xañee ab diir - - xol yi taxul may wax , waaye jëmm yi rekk — jéem nanu leen a gis ak sunu kem - kàttan , ndax namm nanu leen , ba sunu xol seey ci gis leen .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Kon jàppoon nanu leen a seetsi — man Pool sax ay yooni yoon , waaye Seytaane téq na ma .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Ndaxte bés bu Yeesu sunu Boroom dellusee , te nu fekke ko , kan mooy sunu yaakaar ? Kan mooy sunu mbég ? Kan mooy sunu kaala , gi nuy tiitaroo ?

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Xanaa du yéen ? Waaw yéenay sunu ndam , yéenay sunu mbég .

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Kon nag , ba nu ko mënatul a dékku , nangu nanu ñu bàyyi nu , nun doŋŋ , ca dëkku Aten ,

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: te yónni nanu Timote , sunu mbokk ak sunu nawle ci liggéeyu Yàlla ak ci waareb xebaaru Kirist . Yónni nanu ko , ngir mu dénk leen , tey feddali seen ngëm ,

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: ngir kenn bañ a raf ndax nattu , yi ngeen di jaar . Yéen ci seen bopp xam ngeen ne , nattu mooy sunu cér .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Ba nu nekkee ak yéen sax , waxoon nanu leen , waxati ko ne , fàww nu sonn ; te noonu la ame , yéen xam ngeen ko .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Noonu ba ma ko mënatul a dékku , yónnee naa , ngir xam fu seen ngëm tollu , ngir ragal Seytaane fiir leen , ba sunu ñaq neen .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Waaye léegi Timote bawoo na ci yéen , indaale xebaar yu neex ci seen ngëm ak seen mbëggeel ; xamal na nu ne , yéena ngi am pàttaliku yu rafet ci nun te namm nu lool , ni nu leen namme yéen itam .

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Noonu bokk yi , ci biir tiis ak coono yi nu nekk , seen ngëm dëfël na sunu xol .

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: Ndaxte noo ngi dund dëgg - dëgg , ndegam yéena ngi sax ci Boroom bi .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Ndaw cant yu bare yu nu war a sant Yàlla ndax yéen ! Ndaw mbég mu bare , mi nu am ci kanamam ndax yéen !

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Guddi ak bëccëg nu ngi wàkkirlu ci ñaan Yàlla , ngir gis leen , ba man a mottali seen ngëm .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Na Yàlla sunu Baay moom ci boppam ak Yeesu sunu Boroom jubal sunu yoon ci yéen .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Na leen Boroom bi dolli mbëggeel gu tar , ngeen bëggante te bëgg ñépp , ni nu leen bëgge nun .

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: Na samp seeni xol noonu ci cell gu amul sikk fa kanam Yàlla sunu Baay , ba bés bu Yeesu sunu Boroom dellusee , ànd ak gaayam yu sell yépp .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Léegi nag bokk yi , jot ngeen ci nun , nan ngeen war a dunde ba neex Yàlla , te moom ngeen di def . Waaye ci turu Boroom bi Yeesu nu ngi leen di ñaan ak a dénk , ngeen gën koo feddali .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ndaxte xam ngeen ndigal , yi nu leen jox ci wàllu Yeesu Boroom bi .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Lii nag mooy coobareg Yàlla : ngeen sell , maanaam ngeen moytu njaaloo ;

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: ngeen noot seeni cér ci cell ak tedd ,

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: te xemmem bañ leen a jiital , ni xeeti àddina yi xamul Yàlla .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Ci mbir mii nag , bu kenn ci yéen laal yëfi jaambur , ngir bañ koo tooñ . Ndaxte waxoon nanu leen bu yàgg te artu leen ne , ñiy def loolu , Boroom bi dina leen mbugal .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla woo na nu , nu dund ci cell , waaye du ci sobe .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Ku tanqamlu wax jii nag , defoo ko nit , Yàlla nga ko def , moom mi leen di jox Xel mu Sell mi .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Ci lu jëm ci bëggante ci seen biir , matul nu leen di bind dara , ndaxte Yàlla def na ci seen xol , ngeen bëggante .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Te moom ngeen di def ci bokk yépp , yi ci diiwaanu Maseduwan . Waaye bokk yi , maa ngi leen di xiirtal , ngeen gën cee sax .

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Fullawooleen a dund ci jàmm , di topptoo seen mbiri bopp tey lekk seen ñaq , ni nu leen ko sante woon .

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: Noonu dingeen dund dund gu jekk ci kanamu waa àddina , te it dungeen soxlaal kenn dara .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Ci mbirum ñi nelaw nag bokk yi , bëgguñu ngeen réere mbir , ba tiis ni aji gëmul , yi amul benn yaakaar .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Ndegam gëm nanu ne , Yeesu dee na te dekki , noonu it Yàlla dina indaale ak Yeesu ñépp ñi ko gëm te nelaw .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Nu ngi leen di wax lii tukkee ci Boroom bi : nun ñiy dund te des fi , ba kera Boroom biy dellusi , dunu jiitu ñi nelaw .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Ndaxte ndigal lu jamp dina jib , baatu kilifa ci malaaka yi dégtu , liitu Yàlla jolli , te Boroom bi moom ci boppam dina wàcce ca asamaan . Booba ñi gëm Kirist te dee dinañu jëkk a dekki ;

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: gannaaw loolu nun ñiy dund te des fi , dinañu ne fëyy ak ñoom jëm ci niir yi , taseji ak Boroom bi ci jaww ji . Te noonu dinanu nekk ak Boroom bi ba fàww .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Kon nag na ku nekk di dëfël sa xolu moroom ak kàddu yooyu .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Waaye bokk yi , ci li jëm ci jamono yi ak waxtu , yi loolu di am , matul nu leen ciy bind dara .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Ndaxte xam ngeen bu wér ne , ni sàcc di ñëwe guddi , noonu la bésu Boroom bi di ñëwe .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Fekk nit ñiy naan : « Lépp a ngi ci jàmm , ba ne leww , » booba musiba bett leen , ni aw mat di bette jigéen ju ëmb , te kenn du ci mucc .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Waaye yéen bokk yi , nekkuleen cig lëndëm , ba tax bés boobu bett leen ni sàcc .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Ndaxte yéen ñépp ci leer ak bëccëg ngeen bokk ; bokkunu ci guddi ak lëndëm .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Kon nag bunu nelaw ni ñeneen ñi , waaye nanu xool te maandu .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Ndaxte ñiy nelaw , guddi lañuy nelaw , te ñiy màndi , guddi lañuy màndi .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Waaye nun ñiy waa bëccëg , nanu maandu te ràngoo ngir xare bi : ngëm ak mbëggeel , muy kiiraayu dënn , ak kóoluteg mucc , muy mbaxanam xare .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla jaglewu nu meram , waaye mucc la nu jagleel ndax darajay sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Deeyal na nu , ngir nu man a dund ak moom , bu nu nelawee ak bu nu nelawagul .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Kon nag nangeen dëgëralante te yokkante seen ngëm , ni ngeen koy defe .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Gannaaw loolu bokk yi , ci lu jëm ci njiit , yi Boroom bi teg ci seen kanam te ñuy liggéey ci seen biir , di leen artu , maa ngi leen di ñaan ngeen déglu leen ;

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: rax - ca - dolli ngeen naw leen seen kem - kàttan te bëgg leen ndax seen liggéey . Na jàmm am ci seen biir .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Bokk yi , nu ngi leen di dénk , ngeen yedd ñi feñaag , dëfël ñi seen yasara yàcciku , dimbali ñi néew doole , tey muñal ñépp .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Saxleen ci baax ci seen biir ak ci ñépp , te bañ a feyantoo .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Deeleen bég

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: te sax ciy ñaan Yàlla ,

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: di ko gërëm ci lépp , ndaxte loolu mooy coobareg Yàlla ci yéen ci seen bokk ci Kirist Yeesu .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Buleen fey taalu Xelum Yàlla ,

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: di xeeb waxu yonent yi .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Waaye seetleen mbir yépp , jàpp ci li baax ,

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: dëddu lépp lu ci bon .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Na leen Yàlla Boroom jàmm sellal , ba ngeen mat sëkk ; na sàmm seen xel mépp , seen xol bépp ak seen yaram wépp , ngir dara bañ cee am sikk , ba bés bu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist dellusee .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Yàlla , mi leen woo ci loolu , kuy sàmm kóllëre la , te dina ko def .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Bokk yi , buleen nu fàtte ci seeni ñaan .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Nuyul - leen nu bokk yépp ak saafoonte bu laab .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Maa ngi leen di dénk ci kanamu Boroom bi , ngeen jàngal bataaxal bii bokk yépp .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Na yiwu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist ànd ak yéen .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Nun Pool ak Silwan ak Timote noo leen di bind , yéen mbooloom ñi gëm ci dëkku Tesalonig te nekk ci Yàlla sunu Baay ak Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Na leen Yàlla Baay bi ak Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist may yiw ak jàmm .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Bokk yi , mënunu lu dul sax ci sant Yàlla ndax yéen . Loolu jaadu na , ndax seen ngëm di gën a sax , te mbëggeel gi ngeen am ci seen biir , ku nekk ci sa moroom , di yokku lu bare .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Noonu nu ngi damu ci yéen ci kanamu mboolooy Yàlla yi , ndax seen muñ ak seen ngëm ci biir mboolem fitnay noon , ak coono , yi ngeen di dékku .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Loolu mooy firndeel àtteb Yàlla bu jub bi , di wone ne yelloo ngeen nguuru Yàlla , gi tax ngeen di sonn .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Ndaxte jub na ci Yàlla , mu delloo coono ñi leen di sonal ,

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: te it yéen ñiy dékku coono , mu boole leen ak nun , tàbbal nu ci noflaay , bés bu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist jógee asamaan , feeñ fi . Keroog dina ànd ak malaakaam yu am kàttan ,

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: safara su yànj wër ko , mu feeñ ngir mbugal ñi xamul Yàlla te bañ a déggal xebaar bu baaxu sunu Boroom Yeesu .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Seen pey mooy alku ba fàww , ñu dàq leen fu sore Boroom bi ak ndamam lu réy .

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: Dina ñëw bés booba , ngir ndamam jolli ci biir gaayam yu sell yi , te ñépp ñi ko gëm yéemu ci moom — te ci ngeen bokk , ndaxte gëm ngeen li nu leen seede .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Moo tax dunu noppeek di leen ñaanal , ngir Yàlla sunu Boroom def leen , ngeen yeyoo li tax mu woo leen , te yeggali ak doole ci yéen bépp yéene ju baax ak bépp jëfu ngëm .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Noonu turu Yeesu sunu Boroom dina màgg ci yéen , te yéen it dingeen màgg ci moom , aju ci yiwu sunu Yàlla ak Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Ci lu jëm ci ñëwu Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist nag , bokk yi , ak sunu daje ak moom , am na lu ma leen di ñaan :

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: bu leen kenn gaaw a tàggale ak seen sago , mbaa di leen jaaxal , muy yonent buy wax , muy kàddu mbaa bataaxal bu ñu nu moomaleel , ci ne leen bésu Boroom bi ñëw na xaat .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Bu leen kenn nax ci benn fànn , ndaxte balaa booba , fàww Xiiroo bu mag bi ak Yàlla am , te Nitu ñaawteef ki feeñ , moom aji alku ji .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Day weddi lépp lu ñu teg Yàlla walla ñu koy jaamu , di yékkati boppam , ba toog sax ca kër Yàlla ga , tudde boppam Yàlla .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Xanaa fàttalikuwuleen ne , waxoon naa leen ko , ba ma nekkee ak yéen .

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Te xam ngeen li ko téye léegi , ba du man a feeñ lu dul ci waxtoom .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Ndaxte fi mu ne ñaawteef gaa ngi jax - jaxi xaat ci kumpa , waaye ki ko téye mi ngi fi ba tey . Bu fi jógee nag ,

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Nitu ñaawteef ki dina feeñ , te Boroom bi Yeesu dina ko rey ak ngelawul gémmiñam , tas ko ak leer giy ànd ak ñëwam .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Bu Nitu ñaawteef kooku feeñee , dina ànd ak kàttanu Seytaane ak doole ju bare , di wone ay firnde ak ay kéemaan yu dul dëgg ;

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: te dina nas bépp naxe buy sànke , ba yéem ñi nar a alku , ndaxte ubbiluñu seeni xol dëgg , gi leen manoon a musal .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Looloo tax Yàlla yónnee leen xelum réer , ba ñu gëm fen .

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: Noonu Yàlla dina mbugal ñépp ñi gëmul woon dëgg te doon bànneexu ci njubadi .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Kon nag bokk yi , yéen ñi Boroom bi bëgg , mënunu lu dul sax ci sant Yàlla ci li mu leen tànn ca njàlbéen ga , ngir musal leen , mu sédde leen boppam jaarale ko ci jëfu Xel mu Sell mi ak seen gëm dëgg gi .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Te Yàlla woo na leen ci loolu jaarale ko ci xebaar bu baax , bi nu leen doon yégal , ngir ngeen bokk ci ndamu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Kon nag bokk yi , taxawleen bu dëgër te jàpp ci dénkaane yi nu leen jottali , muy ci li nu wax , muy ci li nu bind .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Na sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist moom ci boppam ak Yàlla sunu Baay , mi nu bëgg te wone yiwam ci nun , ba ubbil nu buntu jàmm ju sax ak yaakaar ju wér ,

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: dëfël seeni xol te saxal leen ci bépp jëf ju rafet ak gépp kàddu gu baax .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Léegi nag bokk yi , ñaanal - leen nu , ngir kàddug Boroom bi law te ànd ak ndam , ni mu ko ame woon ci yéen .

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Ngeen ñaanal nu it , ngir nu mucc ci ñi bon te soxor , ndaxte du ñépp a gëm .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Waaye Boroom bi kuy sàmm kóllëre la ; dina leen dëgëral te musal leen ci Ibliis .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Te wóor nanu ci kanamu Boroom bi ne , yéena ngi def li nu leen santoon , te dingeen ci sax .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Na Boroom bi gindi seeni xol ci mbëggeelu Yàlla ak muñu Kirist .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Nu ngi leen di sant it bokk yi , ci turu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist , ngeen dëddu bépp mbokk buy wéy ci tayel te bañ a topp dénkaane , yi nu leen jottali .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Xam ngeen bu baax , yéen ci seen bopp , ni ngeen war a awe ci sunuy tànk . Ba nu nekkee ca yéen , wéyunu woon ci tayel

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: te musunoo lekk ñaqu kenn . Waaye guddi ak bëccëg danu daan ñaq , di sonn , ngir bañ a wéeru ci kenn ci yéen .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Waxuma ne amunu sañ - sañu def ko , waaye danoo bëggoon a nekk ay royukaay ci yéen , ngir ngeen aw ci sunuy tànk .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Ndaxte ba nu nekkee ca yéen , lii lanu tëraloon : « Ku liggéeyul , du lekk . »

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Léegi nag dégg nanu ne , am na ci yéen ñuy wéy ci tayel ; liggéeyuñu dara , lu dul di dugg ci lu seen yoon nekkul .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Ñu deme noonu nag , nu ngi leen di sant te di leen dénk ci turu Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist , ñuy liggéey ci jàmm tey dunde seen ñaq .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Yéen nag bokk yi , buleen tàyyi ci def lu rafet .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Su kenn bañee topp li nu bind ci bataaxal bii , ràññeeleen ko te sore ko , ngir mu rus ci .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Waxuma ngeen def ko noon , waaye ngeen yedd ko ni seen mbokk .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Na leen Boroom jàmm may jàmm ci fépp ak ci lépp . Na Boroom bi ànd ak yéen ñépp .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Tàggoo bii maa ko bind ci sama loxo , man Pool . Nii laay binde , te di màndargaale nii sama bataaxal yépp .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Na yiwu sunu Boroom Yeesu Kirist ànd ak yéen ñépp .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Man Pool , ndawul Kirist Yeesu ci ndigalu Yàlla sunu Musalkat ak Kirist Yeesu sunu yaakaar ,

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: maa ngi lay bind Timote , yaw miy sama doomu diine ju wér . Na la Yàlla Baay bi ak Kirist Yeesu sunu Boroom may yiw , yërmande ak jàmm .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Xam nga ne , ba may dem diiwaanu Maseduwan , ñaanoon naa la , nga des dëkku Efes , ngir dénk ña fa doon jàngale luy sànke , ñu bàyyi ko .

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: Te it nga dénk leen , ñu bañ a topp léebi diiney neen ak limi maam yu dul jeex mukk . Loolu werante rekk lay jur , waaye du jëme kanam mbir mi Yàlla tëral , wéer ko ci ngëm .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Waaye li sunuy dénkaane di jur mooy mbëggeel gu jóge ci xol bu laab , ci xel mu dal ak ci ngëm gu wér .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Am na ñu moy loolu , ba jeng jëm ciy waxi neen .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Dañoo sababloo nekk ay jàngalekat ci yoonu Musaa , fekk xamuñu dara sax ci li ñuy wax ak a dëggal .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Ci li aju ci yoonu Musaa nag , xam nanu ne baax na , ci ku koy jëfe ni ko Yàlla tërale .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Xam nanu it ne , tëddul ngir ñi jub waaye ngir ñi jubadi ak ñi déggadi , ñi weddi tey bàkkaar , ñi selladi te fonkadi Yàlla , ñiy dóor ndey walla baay , ak ñiy bóom ;

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: ngir ñiy doxaan , ñi góor - jigéenu ak ñiy def nit jaam , ñiy fen tey wann seen kàddu , ak lépp luy juuyoo ak njàngale mu wér

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
