text2: mu xebaar bu baax bi indaale . Te xamleb xebaar , boobuy feeñal ndamu Yàlla Aji Tedd ji , dénk nañu ma ko .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Maa ngi gërëm sunu Boroom Kirist Yeesu , mi ma dooleel , ci kóolute gi mu am ci man , ba fal ma jawriñ .

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: Moona daa naa suufeel turam , di fitnaal ak a toroxal ñi ko gëm . Waaye Yàlla yërëm na ma , ndaxte ñàkka xam ak ñàkka gëm rekk a taxoon ma def ko .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Te yiwu sunu Boroom baawaan na ci man , ànd ak ngëm ak mbëggeel , yi bawoo ci Kirist Yeesu .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Wax ju wóor a ngii te yelloo gépp kóolute : Kirist Yeesu ganesi na àddina , ngir musal bàkkaarkat yi , te maa ci raw !

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Waaye Yàlla yërëm na ma , ngir Kirist Yeesu jëkk a feeñal ci man muñam gu yaatu gi , ma nekk royukaay ci ñi ko nar a gëm te am dund gu dul jeex .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Yaw Buur bi fiy sax ba abadan , yaw mi bët mënta gis , yaw Yàlla miy kenn , yaa yelloo teraanga ak ndam ba fàww . Amiin !

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Kon nag Timote sama doom , loolu mooy sas wi ma lay dénk , te mu dëppook waxi yonent , yi jëmoon ci yaw . Doolewool wax yooyu , ba xeex xeex bu baax bi ,

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: di sàmm sa ngëm ak xel mu dal . Am na ñu seen xel nëx , ba labal seen ngëm ,

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: naka Imene ak Alegsàndar ; jébbal naa leen Seytaane , ngir ñu réccu li ñu doon sosal Yàlla .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Fii laay tàmbale nag : maa ngi leen di dénk , ngeen yóbbu ñépp fa kanam Yàlla ciy ñaan , ay tinu ak i ngërëm .

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: Ñaanal - leen buur yi ak kilifa yépp , ngir nu man a am dund gu dal te jàmmu , ànd ak ragal Yàlla ak faayda yu mat .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Loolu mooy li rafet te neex Yàlla sunu Musalkat ,

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: bi bëgg ñépp mucc te xam dëgg gi .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Ndaxte jenn Yàlla kepp moo am , ak benn Rammukat kepp diggante Yàlla ak nit ñi , di nit ki Kirist Yeesu ,

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: mi joxe bakkanam ngir jot ñépp . Loolu mooy seede si Yàlla joxe , bi waxtu wi jotee .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Te fal na ma ci ndaw ak jàngalekat , may yégal xeeti àddina yoonu ngëm ak dëgg ; fenuma , dëgg rekk laay wax .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Li ma bëgg kon mooy lii : na góor ñi ñaan ci Yàlla fu nekk , tàllal ko loxo yu sell , te bañ cee boole mer mbaa werante .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Naka noonu itam , na jigéen ñi di sol col gu faaydawu , cig woyof ak maandu . Buñu def seen xel ciy létt ak ci takkaayu wurus , mbaa ciy per ak col gu jafe .

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: Waaye na seen col di jëf yu rafet , ndaxte looloo jekk ci jigéen juy woote ag ragal Yàlla .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Te it na jigéen jàng cig noppi , ànd ak déggal gu mat .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Mayuma jigéen , muy jàngale mbaa muy jiite góor , waaye na noppi .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Ndaxte Aadama la Yàlla jëkk a sàkk , door caa teg Awa .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Te it du Aadama la Seytaane nax , waaye jigéen ja la nax , ba mu jàdd .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Teewul jigéen dina mucc ci wasin , su saxee ci ngëm ak mbëggeel , di ku sell te maandu .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Wax ju wóor a ngii : kuy sabablu yenub sàmm mbooloo mi , mu ngi yóotu liggéey bu rafet .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Sàmm bi nag , nii la war a mel : war na ñàkk ŋàññ , yem ci benn soxna , moom boppam te maandu ; war na am faayda , man gan te am mayu jàngale ;

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: warul di ab màndikat mbaa xeexkat , waaye na lewet te jàmmu , bañ a bëgge ci xaalis .

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: Na yor këram yorin wu rafet , te ay doomam déggal ko ak teggin yu mat .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Ndaxte ku mënta yor njabootam , naka lay man a yore njabootu Yàlla ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Te it bumu nekk kuy door a gëm , ngir mu bañ a yég boppam , bay dajeek mbugalu Yàlla , ni ko Seytaane defe woon .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Te it war na am seede su rafet ci waa àddina , ngir ñu bañ koo diiŋat , ba muy daanu ci fiiru Seytaane .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Kiy topptoo li mbooloo miy jëfandikoo itam na am faayda te fonk kàddoom ; bumu di ku yàqu ci sangara , mbaa ku alal jiital .

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: Na sàmm mbóoti ngëm gi ak xel mu dal .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Moom itam nañu ko jëkk a seetlu , ba mu leer ne amul ŋàññ , ñu door koo fal .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Naka noonu , na jigéen ñi am faayda , bañ a jëw mbaa xér ci dara , waaye nañu takku ci lépp .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Ku ñu dénk sasu topptoo yëfi mbooloo mi nag , nay ku yem ci benn soxna , jiite bu baax këram ak i doomam .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ndaxte ku ci rafetal sasam dina am tur wu tedd ak kóolute gu mat sëkk ci yoonu ngëm , gi ci Kirist Yeesu .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Bëgg naa laa seetsi balaa yàgg ,

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: waaye amaana mu yéex . Moo tax ma lay bind bataaxal bii , ngir xamal la , ni ñu war a nekke ci kër Yàlla gi , maanaam ci mbooloom Yàlla Aji Dund ji , miy kenug dëgg te di sëslaayam .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Ci dëgg - dëgg ragal Yàlla ëmb na mbóot yu xóot : Ki wàcc , yor bindu nit , mu bir ne xelam jub na , te malaaka ya gis ko ; xamlees na ko ci xeet yi , ñu gëm ko ci kaw suuf , te Yàlla teeru ko ci ndamam .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Xelum Yàlla mi wax na bu leer ne , ci mujug jamono dina am ñu bàyyi yoonu ngëm wi , di topp ay xel yuy fàbbee ak xalaati Seytaane .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Ñooñu ay naaféq yuy naxe lañu , te seen xol dërkiis .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Dinañu tere séy , di araamal ay ñam , fekk Yàlla sàkk na leen , ngir ñi gëm te xam dëgg man ciy jëfandiku ak cant .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Ndaxte li Yàlla sàkk lépp baax na , kon wenn ñam araamul ci ku koy jëfandikoo ak cant .

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: Ndaxte kàddug Yàlla ak ñaan ñoo koy sellal .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Saxal ci digal bokk yi loolu nag , kon dinga nekk jawriñu Kirist Yeesu ju baax ju regg ci kàdduy yoonu ngëm wi ak njàngale mu rafet , mi nga xam bu wér .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Tanqamlul ay léebi diiney neen , di ay wax yu amul bopp yu àddina kese ; waaye tàggatal sa bopp ci ragal Yàlla .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Ndaxte tàggat yaram am na fu njariñam yem , waaye njariñu ragal Yàlla dafa daj lépp , ëmb digey àddina ak àllaaxira .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Wax ju wóor a ngii , te mat a nangu ak gépp kóolute .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Danuy ñaq tey bëre , ndaxte wékk nanu sunu yaakaar ci Yàlla Aji Dund ji , di Musalkatu ñépp , rawatina nag ci ñi gëm .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Digal leen yëf yooyu nag ci sa njàngale .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Bu la kenn xeeb ndax say at , waaye defal sa bopp royukaayu ñi gëm ci say wax ak say jëf , ci sa mbëggeel , sa ngëm ak sa cell .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Li feek may dikk , saxal ci jàng di biral Mbind mi ci mbooloo mi , di leen dénk ak a jàngal .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Bul sàggane may gi nekk ci yaw , gi la Yàlla jox jaarale ko ci waxu yonent , keroog bi la njiit yi tegee loxo .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Faaydaalal yëf yooyu te sóobu ci , ba sa jëm kanam bir ñépp .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Sàmmal sa bopp te sàmm sa njàngale , te sax ci ; noonu dinga musal sa bopp , yaw ak ñi lay déglu .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Bul gëdd mag , waaye waxtaanal ak moom ni sa baay . Ndaw it , nga digal ko ni sa rakk ,

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: jigéen ju mag , def ko ni sa yaay ; ju ndaw , ni sa jigéen ak cell gu mat sëkk .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Ci wàllu ñi seen jëkkër faatu nag , ku ci sësul ci kenn , teral ko ngir Yàlla .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Waaye ku ci am ay doom mbaa ay sët , na njaboot googu jëkk a wone seen ragal Yàlla ci seen biir kër , ci delloo njukkal seen waajur , ndaxte loolu lu rafet la fa kanam Yàlla .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Jigéen ju sësul ci kenn day wékk yaakaaram jépp ci Yàlla , sax ci di ko wéetal te di ko ñaan guddi ak bëccëg .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Waaye ki bànneex jiital , ndee luy dox la .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Dénk leen loolu , ngir ñu bañ a am benn gàkk .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Ndaxte ki defalul ay bokkam dara , rawatina ay waajuram , weddi na yoonu ngëm wi , ba yées ku gëmadi .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Ku bëgg a bindu ci ñi seen jëkkër faatu , nii la war a mel : war na wees juróom - benn - fukki at , di jigéen ju yemoon ci jëkkëram ,

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: te mu ràññiku ci jëf yu rafet yu deme ni yar ay guneem , man gan , geestu gaayi Yàlla yu sell yi , dimbali ñi nekk ci tiis ; maanaa di ku takku ci mboolem jëf yu rafet yi .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Waaye bul bind jigéen ju ndaw , ndaxte bu ko ay bëgg - bëggam xiiree ci sore Kirist , dina bëgg a séyaat ,

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: te dina daje ak mbugal ndaxte fecci na kóllëre .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Te du yem ci bëgg a séyaat rekk , waaye ku tayel lay doon ; di ku wër kër ak kër , rax - ca - dolli réy làmmiñ te deñ kumpa , di wax lu yoonam nekkul .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Looloo tax ma bëgg , jigéen yu ndaw yi séyaat , am ay doom , yor seeni kër , ba seen benn noon du leen man a gàkkal .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Ndaxte fi mu ne sax am na ñu jeng xaat , ba topp Seytaane .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Kon nag jigéen ju gëm te am mbokk mu jëkkëram faatu , na ko dimbali te bañ koo bàyyeek mbooloom ñi gëm . Noonu mbooloo mi dina man a dimbali jigéen ñi sësul ci kenn .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Li jëm ci njiiti mbooloo mi nag , joxal teraanga ju mat sëkk ñi ciy rafetal seen liggéey , rawatina ñi sax dàkk ci waare bi ak njàngale mi .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Ndaxte Mbind mi nee na : « Bul sunjuñ gémmiñu nag wu ñu takk bojjukaay , » nee na it : « Ku ñaq , jariñu . »

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Kuy tuumaal njiit fi yaw , bu ko gëm , li feek ñaar walla ñetti seede dëggaluñu ko .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Waaye ñiy bàkkaar , yedd leen fa kanam ñépp , ngir artu ñi ci des .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Léegi nag maa ngi lay dénk fa kanam Yàlla ak Kirist Yeesu ak malaaka yu tedd ya , nga sàmm loolu ma wax te bañ cee gënale walla di ci parlàqu .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Bul gaaw a teg loxo kenn , ba fal ko , di séddu noonu ci bàkkaari jaambur , waaye dëkkal cig sell .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Ba tey bul yemati ci ndox mu ñuul rekk , waaye nangay naan tuuti biiñ , ngir faj say metiti biir ak say jagadi yu bare .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Am na , ñu seeni bàkkaar fés ci kanamu ñépp , ba jiitu leen ca àtte ba ; ñi seeni bàkkaar nëbbu nag , bés baa ngi leen di xaar .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Naka noonu it am na , ñu seen jëf yu rafet leer , te yi feeñul mënuñoo nekk kumpa ba fàww .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Ñi nekk ci buumu njaam nag , nañu weg seeni sang wegeel gu mat sëkk ; noonu kenn du am lu muy werante ci turu Yàlla mbaa ci sunu njàngale .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Ku am sang boo bokkal ngëm , bu looloo tax nga yab ko , waaye nga sax ci itteem , ndax kiy jariñu ci sa ñaq , aji gëm la , ku mat a bëgg . Jàngaleel loolu nag , di ko dénkaane .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Waaye su fi amee kuy jàngale leneen , ba jàppul ci kàddu yu wér yu Yeesu Kirist Boroom bi , te fonkul waaraate buy jur ragal Yàlla ,

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: kooku boroom tiitar la , bu xamul dara . Dafa wéradi , ba sóobu ci gëstuy neen ak i werante ciy araf yu dul jur lu dul ñeetaange , xuloo , xaste , ñaaw njort

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: ak ŋaayoo ; ñiy jëfee noonu nit ñu ñaaw xel lañu , ñu xamul genn dëgg te yaakaar ne , ragal Yàlla buntu wërsëg la .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Ba tey ragal Yàlla gu ànd ak doylu , wërsëg la .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Ndaxte indaalewunu fi dara , te dunu yóbbaale dara .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Kon su nu amee lekk ak koddaay , nanu ko doyloo .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Waaye ñiy sàkkoo barele , dinañu jànkoonte ak i nattu , ba dugg ci fiir , di xuus ci bëgg - bëggi neen yuy yóbbe ayib , tey sóob nit cig réer ak sànkute .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Ndaxte bëgge ci xaalis mooy ndeyu ñaawteef yu bare ; am na ñu ko wut , ba moy ci yoonu ngëm , te seen xol di dagg ndax tiis yu bare .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Kon nag yaw waayu Yàlla ji , dawal loolu , te topp njub , ragal Yàlla , ngëm , mbëggeel , muñ ak lewet .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Góor - góorlul ci bëre bu baax bi , ba ub làmbi ngëm , te feddali sag téye ci dund gu dul jeex gi ; ndaxte ci loolu la la Yàlla woo , te looloo waraloon it sa seede su rafet fa kanam mbooloo mu bare .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Noonu fi kanam Yàlla mi jagleel dund ci lépp , ak fi kanam Kirist Yeesu , mi seede woon seede su rafet fa kanam Poñsë Pilaat , maa ngi lay dénk lii :

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: sàmmal ndigal li , bañ a am gàkk mbaa ŋàññ , ba kera Yeesu Kirist sunu Boroom di feeñ ci ndamam , ca waxtu wa Yàlla dogal .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Moom kenn mooy Boroom bu tedd , di Buuru buur yi ak Kilifag kilifa yi .

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: Moom kenn a jagoo dund gu sax , dëkk ci biir leer gu kenn mënta jege ; moom mi nit musul a gis te nit mënu koo gis . Moom kenn a yelloo teraanga ak màggaay ba fàww . Amiin .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Ñi barele alalu àddina nag , dénk leen ñu bañ a réy te bañ a wékk seen yaakaar ci koom - koom yi saxul fenn , waaye ñu wékk ko ci Yàlla , mi nuy may naataange ju mat , ngir nu man ciy bànneexu .

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Dénk leen ñu def lu baax , te bare jëf yu rafet , ñu yéwén , bay sédd ñi amul ,

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: di fàggu dencu ëllëg bu wér . Noonu dinañu feddali seen téye ci dund gu wóor gi .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: Céy yaw Timote , sàmmal li la Yàlla dénk ! Tanqamlul waxi neen yu àddina kese , te dëddu werantey ñi mbubboo xam - xam , fekk dañoo réer .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Am na ñu topp xam - xam boobu , waaye moy nañu ci yoonu ngëm . Na yiwu Yàlla ànd ak yéen .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Man Pool , ndawul Yeesu Kirist ci coobareg Yàlla , ngir xamle dund gi nu Yàlla dig te féete ci Kirist Yeesu ,

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: maa ngi lay bind Timote , sama doomu diine ji ma bëgg . Na la Yàlla Baay bi ak Kirist Yeesu sunu Boroom may yiw , yërmande ak jàmm .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Fu ma tollu maa ngi lay boole ci samay ñaan , di ci sant Yàlla , mi may jaamu ci xel mu dal , ni ko samay maam daan defe . Guddi ak bëccëg , bu sama xel demee ci say rangooñ ,

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: ma bëgg laa gis , ba am mbég mu réy .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Maa ngi fàttaliku sa ngëm gu dëggu , gi nekkoon ci sa maam Lowis ak sa yaay Ënis , te mu wóor ma ne , sax na ci yaw it .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Looloo tax maa ngi lay fàttali , nga xambaat taal bi Yàlla taal ci yaw , di may gi mu la jagleel , bi ma la tegee samay loxo .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Ndaxte Xel mi nu Yàlla sol du ànd ak ragal , waaye day ànd ak kàttan , mbëggeel ak moom sa bopp .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Bul rus ci seedeel sunu Boroom , mbaa ci li ñu ma tëj ndax turam , waaye bokkal ak man tiis ci xamle xebaar bu baax bi , wéeru ci kàttanu Yàlla .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Moo nu musal te woo nu ci dund gu sell , ci lu ajuwul ci sunuy jëf , waaye ci dogalu boppam ak yiwam , wi nu Yàlla may ci Kirist Yeesu , ba àddina sosoogul .

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: Te léegi biral na ko ci feeñug sunu Musalkat Kirist Yeesu , mi nasaxal dee te feeñal dund ci xebaar bu baax bi , te muy dund gu sax .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Te Yàlla fal na ma ndaw ak jàngalekat , ngir may yégle xebaar bi ;

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: looloo tax ma jànkoonte ak tiis yu mel nii . Waaye rusuma ci , ndaxte xam naa Ki ma wékk sama yaakaar , te wóor na ma ne , li ma ko dénk , man na koo denc ba bés ba .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Toppal ci tànki wax yu wér yi nga dégge ci man , jàpp ci ak ngëm ak mbëggeel , yi nu am ci sunu bokk ci Kirist Yeesu .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Te nga sàmm bu baax li la Yàlla dénk , wéeru ci Xel mu Sell , mi dëkk ci nun .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Xam nga ne , waa diiwaanu Asi gépp , won nañu ma gannaaw , ñu deme niki Fusel ak Ermosen .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Waaye Onesifor daa na faral di dëfël sama xol ; na Boroom bi sotti yërmandeem ci këram . Rusul woon sax ci samay jéng ,

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: waaye bi mu ñëwee dëkku Room , wut na ma fu ne , ba gis ma .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: Na ko Boroom bi teeru ak yërmandeem ca bés ba . Umplewoo it coono yi mu daj , ngir dimbali ma ca dëkku Efes .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Kon nag yaw sama doomu diine , doolewool yiw , wi ci Kirist Yeesu .

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: Te wax yi nga dégge ci man fi kanam seede yu bare , nanga leen jottali nit ñu takku , ngir ñoom it ñu man a jàngal ñeneen .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Bokkal ak man tiis , di jàmbaar ci toolu xareb Kirist Yeesu ,

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: xam ne xarekat bu bëgg a neex ka ko solal , du dugg ci yëfi àddina .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Te it ku tàggat yaramam ngir rawante , duñu ko jagleel kaalag ndam mukk , su toppul sàrt ya .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Noonu it beykat bi sonn mooy jëkk a ñam toolam .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Xalaatal bu baax sama wax jii , ndax Boroom bi dina leeral sa xel ci lépp .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Fàttalikul Yeesu Kirist mi dekki , soqikoo ci Daawuda , tukkee ci xebaar bu baax bi may waare .

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Xebaar booboo tax may jànkoonte ak i tiis , ba ñu jéng ma ni defkatu lu bon ; waaye kàddug Yàlla moom , kenn du ko jéng .

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: Te lii tax may muñ lépp , ngir ñi Yàlla tànn it am mucc gi ci Kirist Yeesu , gu ànd ak ndam lu sax .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Kàddu gu wóor a ngii : Su nu deeyaalee ak Kirist , dinanu dundaat ak moom ;

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: su nu takkoo , dinanu nguuru ak moom .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Su nu ko weddee , kon mu weddi nu ; su nu ko ñàkkee kóllëre , moom dina sax ci kóllëreem , ndax mënul a weddi boppam .

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Saxal ci di leen fàttali mbir yooyu , di leen dénk fa kanam Yàlla , ñu moytoo werante ciy araf , ndax loolu jëmul fu dul ci yàq ngëmu ñiy déglu .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Góor - góorlul ba teew fa kanam Yàlla , nekk liggéeykat bu mu nangul te rusoo ci dara , di faramfàcce bu jub kàddug dëgg gi .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Moytul bépp jataayu waxi neen yu àddina kese , ndax ña fa toog dinañu gën a xuus cig weddi ,

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: te seen kàddu day burux ni ngal . Imene ak Filet , ci ñoom lañu bokk ;

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: dañoo moy dëgg , di wax ne ndekkite wees na , ba yàq ngëmu ñenn ñi .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Waaye teewul fondamaa bu dëgër , bi Yàlla tabax , nee na kekk , te lii lañu ci tàmpe : « Boroom bi xam na ñi bokk ci moom , » te it : « Ki tudd turu Boroom bi , na daw lu bon . »

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Ci kër gu mag nag , du ndabi wurus walla xaalis rekk a fa am , waaye itam yoy dénk walla ban ; yii tedd nañu , yee ñàkk solo .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Kon nag ku laabal sa bopp ci yooyu yépp , dinga nekk ndab lu tedd te sell , nga am njariñ ci Boroom bi te jekk ci bépp jëf ju rafet .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Dawal bépp bëgg - bëggu ngune , te sóobu ci njub , ngëm , mbëggeel , jàmm , ànd ak ñépp ñiy tudd turu Boroom bi ak xol bu sell .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Tanqamlul bépp weranteb neen bu amul njariñ , xam ne xuloo rekk lay jur .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Te jaamu Boroom bi warul a xuloo , waaye na lewet ci ñépp , jekk ngir jàngale tey muñ fitnay noon .

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: Na jubbanti cig suufe ñi koy diiŋat , tey yéene Yàlla xiir leen ci réccu , ba ñu xam dëgg ;

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: ñu rëcc ci fiirug Seytaane , mi leen jàpp niy jaam , te ñu dellusi ci seen xel yu rafet , ba sóobuwaat ci coobareg Yàlla .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Nanga xam lii : bési tiis yu tar ñu ngi nuy tëru ci muju jamono .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Ndaxte nit ñi dinañu siis te fonk xaalis , di ñu réy tey yég seen bopp , ñuy xaste tey xëtt ndigalu waajur ; duñu am kóllëre , sellaay

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: mbaa cofeel ; dañuy jàpp mer ak a sos ; ñu xér lañuy doon , ñu soxor te bañ lu baax ;

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: ay workat lañuy doon , di ñu ëppal te bare tiitar ; seen bànneex a leen gënal Yàlla .

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: Dañuy mbubboo diine waaye nanguwuñu koo dugal seen xol . Ñu deme noonu , dëddu leen .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Nit ñu mel noonu ñooy yoxoosu ci biir kër yi , ba fàbbi jigéen ñu ñàkk pasteef , ñi seeni bàkkaar ub seen bopp , te bëgg - bëgg yu wuute jiital leen .

text: Ever learning , and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Duñu noppee gëstu , waaye duñu man a yegg ci xam - xamu dëgg mukk .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Nit ñooñu dañuy bëreek dëgg , ni Sànnes ak Sàmbares bëree woon ak Musaa ; ay boroom xel yu gumba lañu , yu seen ngëm tekkiwul dara .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Waaye duñu dem fu sore , ndax seen ñàkk xel dina bir ñépp , ni mu dale woon Sànnes ak Sàmbares .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Waaye yaw nag xam nga bu baax sama njàngale , sama dund , sama takkute , sama ngëm , sama muñ , sama mbëggeel ak sama dékku tiis .

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: Xam nga li ma daj ciy fitna ak i coono ci dëkki Ancos , Ikoñum ak Listar . Céy li ma jànkoonteel ciy fitna ! Waaye Boroom bi musal na ma ci lépp .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Te ku bokk ci Kirist Yeesu , te bëgg dund dund gu ànd ak ragal Yàlla , alamikk ñu fitnaal la .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Waaye nit ñu bon ñi ak naaféq yi dinañu fi yées , di naxe ak a nax seen bopp .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Yaw nag saxal ci li nga jàng te mu wóor la , xam fi nga tibbe .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Li dale ci sa ngune xam nga Mbind mu sell , mi la man a yee ci yoonu mucc , jaar ci gëm Kirist Yeesu .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Mbind mu sell mépp , ci gémmiñu Yàlla la jóge , te am na njariñ ngir jàngal nit ñi , yedd leen , jubbanti leen te yee leen ci njub .

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: Noonu waayu Yàlla ji dina mat , ba jekk ci bépp jëf ju rafet .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Kon nag maa ngi lay dénk fa kanam Yàlla ak Kirist Yeesu , miy àtte ñiy dund ak ñi dee , di la dénk ci feeñam ci biir ndam ak ci nguuram , nga def lii :

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: xamleel kàddug Yàlla , sax ci , su neexee ak su naqaree ; yeyal ñi tooñ , di yedd ak a dénk ñépp , def ko ci muñ gu yaatu ak njàngale mu mat .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Ndaxte jamono dina ñëw , joo xam ne nit ñi dootuñu xajoo njàngale mu wér mi , waaye dinañu jublu ci seeni bëgg - bëgg , di fortaatu jàngalekat yu leen di jey .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Dinañu tanqamlu dëgg , jeng jëm ci léebi diiney neen .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Waaye yaw nanga foog ci lépp , dékku tiis , tey tas xebaar bu baax bi , ba matal sag yónnent .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Ndaxte maa ngi ci tànki joxe sama bakkan ni sarax , te sama waxtuw dem jot na .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Bëre naa ba ub làmbi ngëm , daw naa ba àkk , sàmm naa mboolem dëgg , gi ñu ma dénk .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Fi mu ne Yàllaa ngi may xaare añu ku jub , di kaalag ndam gi ma Boroom , biy Àttekat bu jub , di jox ca bés ba , te jéllale naa sama bopp , waaye képp ku def sa xol cig feeñam .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Defal sa kem - kàttan , ba fekksi ma ci ni mu gën a gaawe .

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: Ndaxte Demas topp na àddina , ba bàyyi ma , dem dëkku Tesalonig ; Kereseñsë dem na diiwaanu Galasi , Tit dem diiwaanu Dalmasi .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Luug rekk a des fi man . Indaaleel Màrk , ndaxte amal na ma njariñ ci liggéey bi .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Tisig moom yebal naa ko dëkku Efes .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Te sooy ñëw , indaaleel mbubb , ma ma dénkoon Karpus ca dëkku Torowas , te it bul fàtte téere yi , rawatina téere yu am maana , yi ñu bind ci der .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Alegsàndar tëgg bi def na ma ñaawteef yu ne , waaye Boroom bi dina ko fey ay jëfam .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: Moytu ko bu baax , ndaxte bëre na ak sunuy wax ba tàyyi .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Keroog bi ma jëkkee taxaw , di làyyil sama bopp , awma woon kenn ku ma taxawu , ñépp dañu maa daw — bu leen ko Yàlla jàppe nag .

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: Waaye Boroom bi moo ma taxawu te dooleel ma , ma jollil kàddu gi , ba xeet yépp dégg ko . Te Boroom bi musal na ma ci selli gaynde .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Rax - ca - dolli dina ma musal ci bépp jëf ju ñaaw , tette ma ci jàmm , ba tàbbal ma ci nguuram gu kawe ga . Na yelloo ndam ba fàww . Amiin .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: Nuyul ma Piriska ak Akilas ak waa kër Onesifor .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: Erast des na dëkku Korent . Torofim dafa woppoon , ma bàyyi ko dëkku Mile .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: Gaawal a ñëw , bala lolli di gàllankoor sa yoon . Ëbulus , Pudeñsë , Linus , Këlójaa ak yeneen bokk yépp ñu ngi lay nuyu .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Na Boroom bi aar sa xel . Na yiwu Yàlla ànd ak yéen ñépp .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Man Pool maa lay bind , man miy jaamu Yàlla ak ndaw li Yeesu Kirist yónni , ngir xamle ngëm , gi lal yoonu ñi Yàlla tànn , tey yokk xam - xamu dëgg , giy meññ ragal Yàlla ;

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: mu sukkandiku ci yaakaar ju dëggu , ji nu am ci dund gu dul jeex , gi Yàlla dige ba dara sosoogul , moom mi dul tebbi waxam .

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Te léegi , ci jamono ji ko soob , feeñal na xebaaram boobu ci waaraate , bi ma Yàlla sunu Musalkat dénk te digal ma , ma xamle ko .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Maa ngi lay bind , Tit , yaw sama doomu diine ju wér ci ngëm , gi nu bokk nun ñépp . Na la Yàlla Baay bi ak Kirist Yeesu sunu Musalkat may yiw ak jàmm .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Bàyyi naa la ca réewu Kereet , ngir nga mottali la desoon ci liggéey bi , te samp ay njiiti mbooloo ca dëkk bu nekk , ni ma la ko sante woon .

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Njiit nag nii la war a mel : war na ñàkk ŋàññ , yem ci benn soxna , am ay doom yu gëm yu amul baatu gannaaw cig yàqute mbaa déggadi .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Ndaxte kuy sàmm mbooloo mi mooy jawriñu Yàlla , kon warul am ŋàññ , walla di ku dëgër bopp mbaa ku tàng bopp ; warul dib màndikat walla xeexkat mbaa ku bëgge ci alal ju lewul .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Waaye war na man gan te bëgg lu baax , di ku maandu te jub , ku sell te noot boppam .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: War na jàpp ci xebaar bu dëggu , bi lal sunu yoon , ba man a dénkaane ci njàngale mu wér mi , tey yey ñi weddi .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Loolu war na , ndaxte am na ñu bare ñu déggul lenn ndigal , rawatina ci Yawut yi , ñuy yàq xeli nit ñi ak seen waxi neen .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Fàww nga wedamloo leen , ndax dañuy tas këri lëmm , ciy jàngale li warul ngir sàkku alal ju lewul .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Am na nitu Kereet , di yonent ci ñoom , mu ne : « Waa Kereet , ay fenkat lañu mas a doon , ñu soxor ni ay rabi àll , fuqle te tayel . »

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Te li mu wax dëgg la . Looloo tax nga war leen a yey bu wóor ci seeni bàkkaar , ngir ñu am ngëm gu wér

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: te bañ a topp léebi diiney neen yu Yawut yi , mbaa tegtali nit , ñi dëddu dëgg .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Ñi sell seen lépp a sell , waaye ñi selladi te gëmadi seen dara sellul , du seeni xalaat , du seeni xel .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Dañoo mbubboo xam - xamu Yàlla , waaye seeni jëf weddi na ko ; ñu sikk lañu te déggadi , ba tële ci jëf lenn lu baax .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Yaw nag nangay waare li dëppook njàngale mu wér mi .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Maanaa , na góor ñu mag ñi foog , am faayda te maandu , di ñu wér ci seen ngëm , seen mbëggeel ak seen muñ .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Jigéen ñu mag ñi itam , na seen doxalin ànd ak faayda ; buñuy jëw mbaa xér ci sangara . Waaye nañuy jàngale lu baax ,

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: bay sol ci boppu jeeg yu ndaw yi , ñu bëgg seeni jëkkër ak seeni doom ,

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: di ñu maandu , sell te fonk seen kër , ñu neex deret te déggal seeni jëkkër , ngir kenn bañ cee gàkkal kàddug Yàlla .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Naka noonu itam nanga xiir waxambaane yi cig maandu .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Te yaw , ci lépp lu mu man a doon , nekkal ab royukaay ci jëf yu baax . Na sa njàngale wér te am faayda ,

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: ànd ak wax yu wér yu kenn mënta diiŋat , ngir sunuy noon rus ba wedam , ci li ñu amul dara lu ñu nu tuumaal .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Waxal it jaam ñi , ñu déggal seeni sang ci lépp , te liggéeyal leen ba seral seen xol , bañ cee boole werante

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: mbaa sàcc . Waaye nañu wone takkute gu mat , ba rafetal ci lépp njàngalem Yàlla sunu Musalkat .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Ndaxte yiwu Yàlla feeñ na te ubbil na ñépp buntu mucc .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Moo nu digal , nu dëddu weddi ak bëgg - bëggi jamono , tey dund ci àddina cig maandu , njub ak ragal Yàlla ,

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: di séentu bés bu tedd bi nu yaakaar , maanaa Yàlla ju màgg ji , di sunu Musalkat Yeesu Kirist , feeñ ci biir ndamam .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Joxe na bakkanam ngir nun , ba jot nu ci lépp lu bon , te beral nu boppam , di xeet wu sell te ràññiku ci jëf yu baax .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Jàngaleel loolu , di leen dénk ak a yedd ak fulla ju mat . Bu la kenn yab .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Fàttali leen ñuy déggal kilifa , yi yore nguur gi , tey jëfe seeni ndigal , ñu taxaw temm ci lépp luy jëf ju baax .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Buñu jëw kenn mbaa ñuy ŋaayoo , waaye nañu yiwe te won ñépp lewet gu mat sëkk .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Ndaxte nun itam ñu ñàkk xel lanu woon te déggadi , nu réer bay jaamu ay bëgg - bëgg ak i bànneex yu wuute , nu dëkk ci coxorte ak ñeetaange , di ñu sikk tey sikkante .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Waaye naka noona Yàlla sunu Musalkat feeñal na mbaaxam ak cofeelam ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: ba musal nu ; ajuwul ci jëf yu jub yu nu def , waaye ci yërmandeem rekk . Mu juddulaat nu ci laabal sunu xol , te yeesalaat nu ci dooley Xel mu Sell ,

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: mi mu nu sotti ba mu baawaan , ci darajay Yeesu Kirist sunu Musalkat .

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: Ci noonu Yàlla àtte na nu jub ci kaw yiwam , te sédd nu ci dund gu dul jeex , gi nuy séentu .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Wax jooju ju wóor la , te damaa bëgg nga dëggal loolu , ngir ñi gëm Yàlla sax ci jëf lu rafet . Loolu moo baax te am njariñ ci nit .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Waaye moytul yu deme ni werantey neen ak limi maam , ay xuloo ak i xëccoo ci doxalinu yoonu Musaa , ndax loolu waxi neen la , te amul benn njariñ .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Kuy féewale , nanga ko yedd , yeddaat ko ; bu tëwee , nga dàq ko ,

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: xam ne nit ku ñaaw xel la te ay bàkkaaram fés ci ñépp .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Bu ma la yónnee Artemas walla Tisig , gaawantul fekksi ma ci dëkku Nikopolis , ndax fa laa bëgg a lollikooji .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Naka Senas àttekat bi nag ak Apolos , waajal leen bu jekk ci seen tukki , ba seen aajo yépp faju .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Na sunuy bokk it takku ci jëf yu rafet , ba man a faj aajo yépp , te bañ a yaafus .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ñiy ànd ak man ñépp ñu ngi lay nuyu . Nuyul nu sunuy soppey ngëm . Na yiwu Yàlla ànd ak yéen ñépp .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Man Pool , mi ñu tëj kaso ngir Kirist Yeesu , ak sunu mbokk Timote , noo lay bind , yaw Filemon sunu soppe ak sunu nawle ci xeex bi ;

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: te fàttewunu sunu jigéen Afiya , ak sunu àndandoo ci xeex bi Arkib , yéen ak mbooloom ñi gëm , miy dajee sa kër .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Na leen Yàlla sunu Baay ak Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist may yiw ak jàmm .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Duma la noppee boole ci samay ñaan , di ci sant Yàlla sama Boroom ,

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: ndaxte dégg naa sa ngëm ci Boroom bi Yeesu , ak sa mbëggeel ci gaayam yu sell yépp .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Li may ñaan nag a ngi nii : nga xam bu wér ngëneel , yi nu am yépp ci sunu bokk ci Kirist , ba tax bokk gi nga am ci Yàlla ci kaw ngëm meññ i njariñ .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Ci dëgg - dëgg sa mbëggeel bégal na ma bu baax , ba dëfël sama xol ; ndaxte xam naa , sama mbokk , ni nga féexale xoli gaayi Yàlla yu sell yi .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Am na lu ma la bëgg a ñaan ; teguma ko ci sañ - sañ bu mat bi ma Kirist may , ci teg la ndigalu def sa warugar ,

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: waaye dama lay ñaan ci mbëggeel gi nu séq , man Pool màggat , mi ñu tëj kaso ci turu Kirist .

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: Maa ngi tinul sama doomu diine Onesim , mi ma jur ci Kirist fii ci kaso bi .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Amul woon sa njariñ démb , waaye tey amal na nu njariñ , yaw ak man .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Maa koy yebal fi yaw , waaye xamal ne , mooy sama reeni xol .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Dama koo bëggoon a téye fi sama wet , ngir mu taxawal la , di ma dimbali , li feek maa ngi ci kaso bi ngir xebaar bu baax bi .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Waaye bëggumaa def dara loo àndul ; noonu ndimbal li nga may defal du nekk sañul - bañ , waaye mu ànd ak xol bu tàlli .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Xëy na sax dafa tàggoo woon ak yaw diir bu gàtt , ngir nga jotaat ci ba fàww ;

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: waxuma léegi ni jaam rekk , waaye lu ko sut , xanaa mbokk mu dëggu ci xol , fekk looloo raw ag njaam . Mbokk la ci man , rawatina ci yaw , muy sa jaam ci aada , di sa mbokk léegi ci Boroom bi .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Soo ma jàppee ni nawle nag , teeru ko , ni su ma la doon ganesi .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Soo ko naree topp genn tooñ mbaa benn bor , topp ma ko .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Man Pool maa ngi lay bind ak sama loxob bopp ne , dinaa la ko fey ; bëggumaa yegg ci ne , sag dund sax ci man la jaar !

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Waaw yaw sama mbokk , dimbali ma ci Boroom bi , te seral sama xol ci sunu bokk ci Kirist .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Noonu bind naa la , ndax wóor na ma ne , dinga ma déggal , ba weesu sax li ma la sant .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Te itam nanga ma waajal néeg , ndaxte yaakaar naa ne , Yàlla dina nangu seeni ñaan , ba delloosi ma leen .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Sama mbokk Epafras , mi ma nekkal fi ci kaso bi ci turu Kirist , mu ngi lay nuyu .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Samay àndandoo ci liggéey bi , Màrk , Aristàrk , Demas ak Luug , ñu ngi lay nuyu .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Na yiwu Boroom bi Yeesu Kirist ànd ak seen xel .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Li jiitu tey Yàlla waxoon na ak maam ya ci wàll yu bare ak ci tëralin yu wuute jaarale ko ca yonent ya .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Waaye ci mujug jamono jii nu tollu , Yàlla wax na ak nun jaarale ko ci Doom ji . Doomam jooju la Yàlla jagleel lépp , te ci moom la Yàlla jaar , sàkk àddina .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Doom ji moo di leer giy jollee ci ndamu Yàlla , di ki dippeekoo ci Yàlla . Moo téye àddina ci kàddoom gu am doole gi . Te bi mu ubbee bunt ba nit di selle ci ay bàkkaaram , dafa toog fa ñu koy terale ca ndeyjooru Aji Màgg ji ca kaw ,

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: wone noonu ne , moo gën a màgg malaaka yi . Te it Yàlla jox na ko tur wu sut seen tur .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla musul a wax kenn ci malaaka yi ne : « Yaa di sama Doom , maa di sa Baay tey . » Musul ne ci mbirum kenn ci ñoom it : « Man Yàlla , dinaa doon Baay ci moom , mu nekk Doom ci man . »

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Waaye bi muy yónni Doom jooju di taaw bi ci àddina , da ne : « Na ko malaakay Yàlla yépp jaamu . »

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Ci wàllu malaaka yi , lii la ci Yàlla wax : « Def na malaakaam yi , ñu mel ni ay ngelaw , ñooñu koy liggéeyal , mu def leen niki safara . »

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Waaye ci wàllu Doom ji , lii la ko Yàlla wax : « Yaw Yàlla , dinga toog ci jal bi ba fàww , ci njubte ngay nguuru .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Sopp nga njub te bañ lu bon . Looloo tax yaw Yàlla , sa Yàlla sol la mbég mu gën a réymi mu jagleel say àndandoo . »

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Newaat na it : « Yaw Boroom bi , yaa sàkk àddina ca njàlbéen ga , defar asamaan yi ci sa loxoy bopp .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Yëf yooyu dinañu wéy , waaye yaw dinga sax , dinañu màggat ñoom ñépp ni ay yére .

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: Dinga leen taxañ ni malaan , ñu furi ni ay yére , waaye yaw doo soppiku , te sa dund amul àpp . »

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Waaye Yàlla musul a teral kenn ci malaaka yi , ba di ko wax : « Toogal ci sama ndeyjoor , ba kera may daaneel say noonci sa kanam . »

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Malaaka yépp ay xel lañu rekk yuy liggéeyal Yàlla , mu di leen yónni ñuy dimbali nit , ñi nar a jot mucc gi .

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Moo tax kon nu war a gën a faaydaal wax yi nu dégg , ngir bañ a bayliku .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Xam nanu ne kàddug yoon , wi Yàlla yégle jaarale ko ci malaaka yi , wareef la woon , te képp ku ko mas a moy , walla mu mas koo tanqamlu , jot na mbugal gi mu yelloo .

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: Kon nun ñi dégg mucc gu mag gi , bu nu ko sàgganee , nan lanuy man a rëcce mbugalu Yàlla ? Boroom bi moo xamle woon mucc googu ca njàlbéen ga , te gannaaw gi , ñi ko dégg , ñoo nu ko wóoralal .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Te it Yàlla dëggal na seen seede ci ay firnde ak ay kéemaan , ay jaloore yu bare ak ci ay may yu jóge ci Xelam mu Sell , te mu séddale leen ni mu ko bëgge .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Yàlla jébbalul malaaka yi benn sañ - sañ bu jëm ci jamonoy ëllëg ji nuy wax ; keneen la ko jébbal ,

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: ndaxte am na fu ñu wax ci Mbind mi ne : « Lan mooy nit , yaw Yàlla , ba nga di ko xalaat ? Lan mooy doomu nit , ba nga koy topptoo ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: Wàcce nga ko , def komu gën a suufe tuuti malaaka yi . Kaalaa nga ko teraanga ak ndam ,

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: nootal ko lépp , mu teg ci tànk . » Bi ko Yàlla nootalee lépp nag , bàyyiwul dara . Fi mu nekk gisagunu ne , lépp a ngi ci sañ - sañam ;

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Waaye gis nanu Yeesu . Wàcce nañu ko , def ko mu gën a suufe tuuti malaaka yi , ngir mu dee ci wàllu ñépp , ndaxte loolu la Yàlla dogal ci yiwam . Waaye léegi Yàlla kaalaa na ko teraanga ak ndam ndax coono bi mu daj ba dee .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Ndaxte Yàlla mi yelloo lépp te sàkk lépp , dogal na def ñu bare ay doomam , boole leen ci ndamam . Jekk na nag mu matal Yeesu ci coono bi mu daj , moom mi leen xàllal yoonu mucc gi .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Moom Yeesu miy sellal , ak ñi muy sellal , ñoom ñépp genn njaboot lañu . Moo tax Yeesu rusu leen a wooye ay doomi baayam .

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: Nee na : « Yaw Yàlla , dinaa xamle sa turci samay doomi baay , dinaa la tagg ci biir mbooloo mi . »

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Newaat na : « Dinaa am ci Yàlla kóolute . » Dellu na waxaat ne : « Maa ngi nii , man ak doom yi ma Yàlla jox . »

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Doomam yooyu muy wax , nit kese lañu . Looloo tax Yeesu it moom ci boppam , wàcc na , jëmmoo ni ñoom , ngir dee , ba man caa daaneel Ibliis , mi yore dooley dee .

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: Noonu mu yiwi nit , ñi meloon ni ay jaam seen giiru dund gépp ndax ragal a dee .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Leer na ne , Yeesu xettalisiwul malaaka yi , waaye askanu Ibraayma lay xettalisi .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Looloo taxoon mu war a mel niy doomi baayam ci bépp fànn , ngir doon seen saraxalekat bu mag fa kanam Yàlla , bi leen yërëm te di sàmm kóllëre , te ci liggéeyu saraxaleem joxe na bakkanam ngir dindi bàkkaari nit ñi , ba Yàlla baal leen .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Gannaaw sonn na ci nattu yi mu daj , man na dimbali ñiy jaar ciy nattu .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Kon nag yéen bokk yu sell yi , yéen ñi Yàlla woo , ngeen bokk ci nguuram gu kawe ga , seetleen ci Yeesu , moom miy ndawu Yàlla li , di saraxalekat bu mag bi ci yoon wi nu gëm .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Ku takku la ci liggéey bi ko Yàlla sas , ni ko Musaa nekke woon ci lépp lu jëm ci waa kër Yàlla .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Waaye Yeesu yelloo na ndam lu sut lu Musaa , ni kiy tabax kër ëppe maana kër ga muy tabax .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Ndaxte kër gu nekk am na ku ko sos , waaye ki sos lépp mooy Yàlla .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Musaa moom ku takku la woon ci lépp lu jëm ci waa kër Yàlla . Waaye jawriñ rekk la woon , ngir seede li Yàlla waroon a yégle .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Yeesu nag ku takku la it , waaye Doom la , juy yilif kër Baayam . Nun nooy këram googu , bu nu saxee ci sunu kóolute te di bég ci li nuy séentu .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Moo tax Xel mu Sell mi wax lii ci Mbind mi : « Bu ngeen déggee tey jii baatu Yàlla bi ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: buleen dëgër bopp , ni seeni maam defoon ca màndiŋ ma , keroog ba ñu dëddoo Yàlla di ko diiŋat . »

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Yàlla ne : « Foofa seeni maam diiŋat nañu ma fa , di ma fexee fiir , te gis nañu samay jëf

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: diirub ñeent - fukki at . Looloo tax gennliku naa leen , daldi ne : “ Seeni xalaat a leen di réeral saa su nekk , xamuñu yoon yi ma neex . ”

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Giñ naa kon ci sama mer ne : “ Duñu dugg mukk ci sama noflaay . ” »

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Bokk yi , wottuleen ba kenn ci yéen bañ a am xol bu bon te gëmadi , bay dëddu Yàlla jiy dund .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Waaye bés bu nekk , deeleen soññante ci lu jëm ci Yàlla , fi ak bés boobu ñu wax wéyul , ngir ragal bàkkaar nax kenn , ba xolam tëju .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Am nanu wàll ci Kirist , su nu wéyee fii ba muj ga ci sunu kóolute , gi nu amoon ca njàlbéen ga .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Lii la Mbind mi wax : « Bu ngeen déggee tey jii baatu Yàlla bi , buleen dëgër bopp , ni seeni maam defoon , ba ñu dëddoo Yàlla . »

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: Ñan ñoo dégg baatu Yàlla bi nag te di ko dëddu ? Xanaa ña Musaa génne woon Misra ñépp .

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: Te ñan la Yàlla mere lu mat ñeent - fukki at ? Xanaa ñi daan bàkkaar te seeni néew tëdd ca màndiŋ ma .

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: Te it bi Yàlla defee ngiñ lii : « Duñu dugg mukk ci sama noflaay , » booba ñan ñoo ko taxoon di wax ? Xanaa ña ko déggadil .

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Noonu gis nanu sax ne , jotuñoo dugg ci noflaay boobu ndax seen gëmadi .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Yàlla dige na ne , dina am ñu dugg ca noflaayam . Kon ndegam dige boobu mi ngi taxaw ba tey , moytuleen ba kenn ci yéen réer ba du dugg ci noflaay boobu .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Nun jot nanu xebaar bu baax bi ni ñoom , waaye kàddu , ga ñu déggoon , jariñu leen dara , ndaxte boolewuñu ci ngëm , ba ñu koy déglu .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Nun ñi gëm nag nooy dugg ci noflaayam , ni ko Mbind mi waxe : « Giñ naa kon ci sama mer ne : “ Duñu dugg mukk ci sama noflaay , ” » doonte sax liggéeyam bépp matoon na , ca ba mu sàkkee àddina ak léegi . Ci lu jëm ci juróom - ñaareelu fan ba ,

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: am na fu ñu wax ci Mbind mi ne : « Yàlla noppalu na ci liggéeyam béppca juróom - ñaareelu fan ba . »

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Te it waxoon na ci baat yi nu jot a lim ba noppi : « Duñu dugg mukk ci sama noflaay . »

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Kon am na ñu ci war a dugg ba tey . Te ñi jëkkoon a jot xebaar bu baax bi , dugguñu ci ndax seen déggadi .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Noonu ay ati at gannaaw ga , Yàlla àppaat na beneen bés , def ko « tey jii , » bi mu waxee ci gémmiñu Daawuda ci baat yii ñu jot a lim : « Bu ngeen déggee tey jii baatu Yàlla bi , buleen dëgër bopp . »

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Su Yosuwe duggaloon sunu maam ya ca noflaayu Yàlla ba , kon gannaaw gi Yàlla du wax dara ci lu jëm ci beneen bés .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Kon ba tey Yàllaa ngi dencal ay gaayam noflaay bu nirook noflaayu Yàlla ca juróom - ñaareelu fan ba .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Ndaxte képp ku mas a dugg ca noflaayu Yàlla , noppalu na ci ay jëfam ni Yàlla .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Nanu farlu boog , ngir dugg ci noflaay boobu , ba kenn bañ a déggadi , ba daanu ni maam ya ca màndiŋ ma .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Xam nanu ne , kàddug Yàlla mi ngi dund te am na doole . Moo gën a ñaw jaasiy ñaari boor . Day dagg ba fa xol ak xel digaloo , ba fa yax yi ak yuq gi di teqalikoo , te man na àtte xalaat yi ak mébéti xol .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Te itam amul mbindeef mu man a nëbbu Yàlla , waaye lépp a ubbiku , ba ne fàŋŋ ci bëti ki nu war a àtte .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Gannaaw am nanu saraxalekat bu mag - a - mag bu àgg ba ca kanam Yàlla , di Yeesu Doomu Yàlla ji , nanu jàpp bu dëgër yoon wi nu gëm .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Saraxalekat bu mag bi nu am , du ku mënul a bokk ak nun sunuy naqar ; moom sax far jaar na ci nattu ni nun ci bépp fànn , waaye deful bàkkaar .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Kon nag nanu am kóolute ci jege jalu Yàlla bu yiw ba , ngir jot yërmandeem ak yiwam , ngir mu wallu nu fu soxla taxawe .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Saraxalekat bu mag bu nekk nag , ci biir nit ñi lañu ko jële , te fal ko muy dox seen diggante ak Yàlla . Noonu dina jébbal Yàlla ay sarax , tey rendi ay mala ngir dindi seeni bàkkaar .

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: Te ndegam moom ci boppam nit kese la , man na muñal ñiy moy ndax seen ñàkka xam .

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Li mu ñàkk doole moo tax mu war a def ay sarax ngir mbaalug bàkkaaram , ni mu ko tàmmee defal mbooloo mi .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Kenn mënul a teral sa bopp ba doon ab saraxalekat , su dul ne Yàllaa la woo , ni mu ko defe woon Aaroona .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Kirist itam yékkatiwul boppam , ba doon saraxalekat bu mag , waaye Yàlla moo ko woo , bi muy wax ne : « Yaa di sama Doom , maa di sa Baay tey . »

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Am na feneen fu mu wax ne : « Doon nga saraxalekat ba fàwwmel ni Melkisedeg . »

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Giiru dundam gépp ci àddina , Kirist da daan ñaan wall ci Yàlla , di ko dénku , boole ko ak i jooy ak i rangooñ . Da doon ñaan ci Yàlla , mi ko man a musal ci dee . Te ñaanam nangu na , ndax ni mu jébbale boppam Yàlla .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Waaye li muy nekk - nekk doom , teewul mu jàng déggal Yàlla , jaare ko ci coono bi mu daj .

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: Noonu la àgge cig mat , ñu def ko ki waral mucc gi dul jeex , ngir ñi ko déggal ñépp .

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Fekk na Yàlla tudde ko saraxalekat bu mag ni ko Melkisedeg nekke .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Ci fànn googu , am na lu bare lu nu ci bëgg a wax , waaye tekkil leen ko dina jafe , ndaxte dangeen a naqari xel .
